<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

                    <a href="#" title="Share" class="st_sharethis_custom">
                        <span class="sprites-icon-share-fushia" st_image='http://www.concordia.ca/content/concordia/en/iits/get-started/guests.img.png/1376572971549.png'>Share</span>
                    </a>
                </li>
            </ul>

            <hr>

            <ul>
                <li>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Guests</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2>Wireless internet</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Welcome to Concordia! We have two methods that allow guests to access our wireless network.</p>
<h3>Eduroam</h3>
<p>If you are visiting from a university that is part of <b>Eduroam</b>, you can connect to Concordiaâs wireless via your universityâs credentials. Visit the Eduroam page for more information.</p>
<h3>Temporary account</h3>
<p>If you are on a short-term visit, you may wish to purchase a temporary wireless account to use during your stay.</p>
<p><b>To purchase a temporary account</b></p>
<ol>
<li>Visit an IITS Depot: <a adhocenable="false" href="/maps/loyola-campus.html">CC207</a> or <a adhocenable="false" href="/maps/sgw-campus.html">H421</a>.</li>
<li>Configure your wireless device. <a adhocenable="false" href="/iits/services/internet-phones/wireless-network.html#content-main_accordion_panel">Hereâs how</a>. &nbsp;</li>
</ol>

</div></div>
<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2>Service desk</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Having trouble? Need help? Contact the IITS Service Desk for any IT-related issues. Weâll do our best to fix your problem as soon as possible.</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">


<div class="parbase section reference"><div style="display:inline;" class="cq-dd-paragraph"><div class="parbase box">









<div class="c-sidebar-calltoaction bloc link-color-dark " style=" color: # !important;   ">


    <h2 class="section-header" style='color: # !important; '></h2>
    <div class="parsys">


<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2 class="section-header ">Service Desk</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Get user support and technical help</p>
<p><b>Email:</b><br>
<a href="mailto:help@concordia.ca">help@concordia.ca</a></p>
<p><b>Contact form:</b><br>
<a href="/iits/services/web-form.html" adhocenable="false">Support Request Form</a></p>
<p><b>Phone:</b><br>
514-848-2424, ext. 7613</p>
<p><b>In person:</b><br>
H-925 (Hall Building)<br>
1455 de Maisonneuve Blvd. West</p>
<p><b>Hours:</b><br>
Mon.-Fri.: 8 a.m.-11 p.m. EST</p>

</div></div>

					            <a tabindex="-1" href="/iits/services/computers-equipment.html">Computers &amp; equipment</a>
				            </li>

				            </li>
                    </ul> 
	            </li>

                    <a href="/iits/support.html" role="button" class="dropdown-toggle" data-toggle="">Support</a>
                    <ul class="dropdown-menu">
                    		<li class="">

                    <ul class="dropdown-menu">

	            </li>

                    <ul class="dropdown-menu">
                    		<li class="">

	            </li>
        </ul>
	</div>
</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Software &amp; applications</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Learn more about the standard software packages on campus computers, how to optimize your web browser, how to get tips on anti-virus software and the list of custom applications available to the Concordia community.</p>

</div></div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Accounts &amp; passwords</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Your <b>MyConcordia netname</b> and password opens doors to the following IT services on campus: &nbsp;</p>

</div></div>
<div class="link-list section">





    <div class="c-bloc-links class="">

        <ul class="">
	                    <li class=""><a href="/iits/services/myconcordia-portal.html"  >MyConcordia portal</a></li>
	                    <li class=""><a href="https://m.myconcordia.ca/"  >Mobile web registration,schedule and grades</a></li>
	                    <li class=""><a href="/iits/services/computers-equipment/labs-equipment.html"  >IITS classroom computers and labs</a></li>
	                    <li class=""><a href="http://library.concordia.ca/services/computers/"  >Library computers</a></li>
	                    <li class=""><a href="/iits/services/internet-phones/wireless-network.html"  >Wireless network</a></li>
	                    <li class=""><a href="/iits/services/internet-phones/vpn.html"  >Virtual Private Network</a></li>
	                    <li class=""><a href="/iits/services/digital-printing.html"  >DPrint (Xerox)</a></li>
	                    <li class=""><a href="/iits/services/email-collaboration/email-for-students/office365-faq.html"  >Office365 email for students</a></li><li>File server space</li> </ul> 
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h2>Student email accounts</h2>
<p>Find out how to <a href="/iits/services/email-collaboration/email-for-students.html" adhocenable="false">activate your Concordia email account</a>.</p>

</div></div>


</div>

                <div class="parsys sidebar">

    <div class="main">
        <div class="wrap">
            <div class="row">
                <div class="span6">        
		            <div class="row-fluid">
			            <div class="span6">
			                <div class="generic parsys iparsys"><div class="section"><div class="new"></div>
</div><div class="iparys_inherited"><div class="generic parsys iparsys"><div class="link-list section">

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

    
    <div class="container">    
        





<div class="breadcrumb breadcrumbs">

                    Home
                </a>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Workshops &amp; training</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>IITS is committed to serving the Concordia community as an educational resource. We provide a wide variety of free computer workshops to students on all university supported software. The majority of these sessions are offered twice a year (fall and winter) and span the entire computing spectrum, from PC-based applications to operating systems, the web and other internet topics. The IITS Training and Development Group offers various methods of training and is extremely adaptable to different learning needs and styles.</p>
<p><a href="/iits/support/training/workshops.html" adhocenable="false">Take a look at the kinds of courses we offer</a> and register today!</p>
<p>Want to learn a few Microsoft Outlook tricks? You'll find them on&nbsp;<a href="/iits/services/email-collaboration/email-for-students/outlook/outlook-resources-windows-mac.html" adhocenable="false">our resources page</a>.</p>
<h3>Computer-based Training</h3>
<p>We offer a large selection of courses, including Access, Dreamweaver and Powerpoint.</p>
<h3>Specialized Workshops</h3>
<p><b>Group sessions:</b> For a minor fee, we also offer group instruction for those interested. For further details, please contact us.</p>
<h3>Contact Information</h3>
<p>Training line: 848-2424, ext. 7688<br>
E-mail: <a href="mailto:IITS.Training@concordia.ca">IITS.Training@concordia.ca</a></p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">




</div>

            </div>

        </div>

    </div>
    
</section>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Computers &amp; equipment</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h4>Purchasing Computers</h4>
<p>The University has developed a selection of standard Dell and Apple computer models to fulfill all acquisition requirements by faculty and staff. To choose a standard client computer to meet your computing requirements, access the Metafore-Dell or Apple catalog from the MyConcordia portal in Other Services and save the quote in a PDF file.&nbsp; &nbsp;<br>
<br>
To purchase computer hardware, attach the above quote to a web requisition, available in the Millennium menu in the MyConcordia portal, and then follow the established approval process flow for web requisitions.&nbsp; For web requisitioning authorization, please contact Mario Paradis at <a adhocenable="false" href="mailto:mario.paradis@concordia.ca">mario.paradis@concordia.ca</a>. For all other purchasing questions contact Aurelia Munteanu at <a adhocenable="false" href="mailto:aurelia.munteanu@concordia.ca">aurelia.munteanu@concordia.ca</a>.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>Find the computer lab nearest you, borrow equipment and learn about our cinema facilities.</p>

</div></div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Safe computing</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Keep viruses from eating through your term papers or system files. Be smart and learn how to:</p>
<ul>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="/iits/services/software-applications/anti-virus.html">Protect your computer</a></li>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="/iits/services/protect-your-identity.html">Protect your identity</a></li>
</ul>
<p>&nbsp;</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h3>Related links</h3>
<ul>
<li><a href="http://www.getcybersafe.gc.ca/index-eng.aspx">Visit the GetCyberSafe website</a></li>
</ul>

</div></div>


</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

            <ul>
                <li>
                    <a href="#" title="Facebook" class="st_facebook_custom">
                    	<span class="sprites-icon-social-1" displayText="Facebook" st_image='http://www.concordia.ca/content/concordia/en/iits/services/software-applications/anti-virus.img.png/1376573545572.png'>Facebook</span>
                    </a>
                </li>
                <li>
                    <a href="#" title="Twitter" class="st_twitter_custom">
                    	<span class="sprites-icon-social-2" displayText="Twitter" st_image='http://www.concordia.ca/content/concordia/en/iits/services/software-applications/anti-virus.img.png/1376573545572.png'>Twitter</span>
                    </a>
                </li>
                <li>
                    <a href="#" title="LinkedIn" class="st_linkedin_custom">
                        <span class="sprites-icon-social-5" displayText="LinkedIn" st_image='http://www.concordia.ca/content/concordia/en/iits/services/software-applications/anti-virus.img.png/1376573545572.png'>LinkedIn</span>
                    </a>
                </li>
            </ul>   
        </div>

        <script type="text/javascript">
            jQuery(function() {  
                $ = jQuery;
                socialbar.init();
                jQuery(window).scroll(function(){
                    socialbar.scroll();
                });
    
            });
        </script></div>


            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Anti-virus</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>If a university becomes infected by viruses and spyware, repercussions can be felt off campus as well. As a result, IITS has purchased Sophos Anti-Virus, which is proven to deliver superior and proactive protection to safeguard our university's IT environments.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open About Sophos Anti-Virus">
					
                    About Sophos Anti-Virus
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>Sophos Anti-Virus is a program that runs in the background of the operating system to protect your computer from malicious software and viruses. There are many ways Sophos helps protect your computer:</p>
<ul>
<li>Whether you're using your computer to browse the Internet, edit documents, or send email, Sophos will automatically scan all files for viruses before any actions are taken. For example, if you attempt to open a document that contains malicious software, Sophos will prevent it from opening and warn you of the possible threat.</li>
<li>It runs numerous scans for viruses and malicious software throughout the week.&nbsp;</li>
<li>It's controlled and monitored centrally by IITS. As a result, clients receive proper monitoring and their virus definitions remain up-to-date at all times. If any problems occur, they are easy to diagnose and resolved in a timely manner.</li>
</ul>
<p>&nbsp;</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Installing Sophos Anti-Virus">
					
                    Installing Sophos Anti-Virus
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_0" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>Sophos Anti-Virus can be obtained from IITS via email at&nbsp;<a href="mailto:license@concordia.ca">license@concordia.ca</a>. Please include the following information in your request:</p>
<ul>
<li>Full Name</li>
<li>Phone number</li>
<li>Department</li>
<li>Location of computer</li>
</ul>
<p>Students, faculty and staff can also install Sophos remotely.&nbsp; To access the download please follow these steps:</p>
<ul>
<li>Log in to <a href="https://www.myconcordia.ca/">myconcordia.ca </a>with your netname and password</li>
<li>Click on Personal Services followed by Sophos Antivirus</li>
<li>Select your Operating System and follow the download steps</li>
</ul>
<p>&nbsp;</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Sophos Anti-Virus Interface">
					
                    Sophos Anti-Virus Interface
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_1" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>Once Sophos has been installed on your computer, you will notice a blue shield in the toolbar.</p>
<p><img src="/content/dam/concordia/images/IITS/antivirus1.jpg"></p>
<p>Right click on the blue shield and select Open Sophos Anti-Virus to view the main control panel.</p>
<p><img src="/content/dam/concordia/images/IITS/antivirus2.jpg"></p>
<p>Right-click on the blue shield and select Open Sophos Anti-Virus to view the main control panel.</p>
<p><img src="/content/dam/concordia/images/IITS/antivirus3.jpg"></p>
<p>If, for some reason, the updates fail, the user will notice a grey shield with a red X. Contact the IITS Service Desk at 514-848-2424, ext. 7613.</p>
<p><img src="/content/dam/concordia/images/IITS/antivirus4.jpg"></p>
<p>Users may also schedule their own regular scans or go directly into Sophos and click on Scan my computer.</p>
<p><img src="/content/dam/concordia/images/IITS/antivirus5.jpg"> <img src="/content/dam/concordia/images/IITS/antivirus6.jpg"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">


<div class="parbase section reference"><div style="display:inline;" class="cq-dd-paragraph"><div class="parbase box_6 box">









<div class="c-sidebar-calltoaction bloc link-color-dark " style=" color: # !important;   ">


    <h2 class="section-header" style='color: # !important; '></h2>
    <div class="parsys">


<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2 class="section-header ">Safe Computing</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="link-list section">





    <div class="c-bloc-links class="">

        <ul class="">
	                    <li class=""><a href="/iits/services/protect-your-identity.html"  >Protect your identity</a></li>
	                    <li class=""><a href="/iits/services/software-applications/anti-virus.html"  >Protect your computer</a></li></ul> 
</div></div>


</div>



</div>

</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="parbase section reference"><div style="display:inline;" class="cq-dd-paragraph"><div class="box_1 parbase box">









<div class="c-sidebar-calltoaction bloc link-color-dark " style=" color: # !important;   ">


    <h2 class="section-header" style='color: # !important; '></h2>
    <div class="parsys">

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
$(document).ready(function() {
	$(".btn.show-more").click(function(){
		var showMoreButton = $(this);
		var htmlList = showMoreButton.parents('.list-news'); 
	    var url = "/content/concordia/en/iits/news-alerts/jcr:content/content-main/list_news.html?src=showmore&content-main_list_news_start=" + htmlList.find('.item').length;
	    console.log(url);
	    showMoreButton.html("Loading...").addClass('disabled');

	    // AJAX call is here:
	    $.get(url, function(data) {
	        // trim the response html (http://stackoverflow.com/q/14347611/1232792)
	        var htmlString = data.trim();
	        var stories = $( htmlString ).find('.item');
	        if ( stories.length > 0 ) {
	            $(stories).insertBefore(showMoreButton);
	        }

            if(stories.length < 10){
	            showMoreButton.hide();
	        }
	        showMoreButton.html("Show more news").removeClass('disabled');
	    });
	});
});
</script>


<div class="btn show-more">Show more news <i class="icon-chevron-down icon-white"></i></div>
</div></div>

$=jQuery;

    var check = mobilecheck();

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>About IITS</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Instructional and Information Technology Services (IITS) provides services that are essential to a functioning university. Setting up user accounts and configuring desktop systems are only a small part of what we do to fulfill the diverse needs of Concordiaâs students, faculty and staff members.</p>
<p>Our wide-ranging services include:</p>
<ul>
<li>Training to employees</li>
<li>Developing applications to streamline administrative tasks</li>
<li>Managing and maintaining Concordiaâs network infrastructure.&nbsp;</li>
<li>Staying on top of the latest technological trends to plan for long-term strategies and goals</li>
<li>Dispensing advice on audio-visual matters and individual IT needs &nbsp;</li>
</ul>

</div></div>
<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2 class="section-header ">Departments</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>To learn more about what we do, browse through one of our five departments.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="link-list section">





    <div class="c-bloc-links class="">

        <ul class="">
	                    <li class=""><a href="/iits/about-iits/departments.html#admin"  >Administrative & Training Services</a></li>
	                    <li class=""><a href="/iits/about-iits/departments.html#application"  >Application Portfolio Management</a></li>
	                    <li class=""><a href="/iits/about-iits/departments.html#IT"  >IT Architecture, Security and Planning</a></li>
	                    <li class=""><a href="/iits/about-iits/departments.html#infra"  >IT Infrastructure & Operations</a></li>
	                    <li class=""><a href="/iits/about-iits/departments.html#user"  >User Services</a></li></ul> 
</div></div>


</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Protect your identity</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Protecting your digital identity is as important as protecting your physical self. So here are a few things to know about emails, spam and how hackers can get your personal details.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Choose a secure password">
					
                    Choose a secure password
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Why do you need a secure password? Because as a Concordia student, you have accounts on several university systems â thatâs why. Even though your accounts are password-protected, they can and do get hacked from time to time â leaving you with a tampered account. Choosing a secure password is the first step to protecting yourself against these kinds of security threats.</p>
<h4>MyConcordia password criteria</h4>
<p>Keep in mind the following criteria when you choose your MyConcordia password:</p>
<ul>
<li>It must be eight to 16 characters long</li>
<li>It must include at least one lower case letter, one upper case letter and one digit</li>
</ul>
<h4>Additional tips on choosing a secure password</h4>
<ul>
<li>Change your password every three to six months.</li>
<li>Avoid using dictionary words, names of people or places, phone numbers and birthdates. Hackers have created software to guess passwords, and these are the most commonly guessed.</li>
<li>Your username, the word âpasswordâ, or 123456 are the easiest passwords for anyone to guess âdonât use them!</li>
<li>Always keep your password a secret. Donât share it, and donât write it down on a sticky-note.</li>
<li>If an application like a web browser or an email client asks if it should save your password, say no. Anyone with access to your computer could very easily â even accidentally â log in as you.</li>
<li>Use a password for your Concordia accounts that is different from your other accounts, such as online banking or social media accounts. Choose a different password for each account.</li>
</ul>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Email Spam">
					
                    Email Spam
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_0" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Spam is unsolicited commercial e-mail â and nobody likes it. Spammers send out these messages only to get you to see their advertising. They send these messages to thousands of people, slowing down the network and causing headaches for the user. Our email filters can block out the vast majority of spam, but unfortunately, itâs not possible to block all spam without blocking legitimate emails.</p>
<p><b>If you get spam</b></p>
<p>If spam does get through to your computer, you can set up filters in your email client that block further messages.</p>
<p>If you receive a questionable or suspicious email, please forward it to the Service Desk. Be sure to include the email headers, which help us figure out where the spam is coming from.</p>
<p>If you need instructions on setting filters or how to obtain email headers please contact the IITS Service Desk at <a href="mailto:help@concordia.ca">help@concordia.ca</a> or 514-848-2424 ext. 7613.</p>
<p><i><b>Note: </b>Concordia University will never ask you for your account password. <a adhocenable="false" href="/iits/services/protect-your-identity/phishing.html#content-main_accordion_panel">Read about email phishing</a> as well.</i></p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Email phishing">
					
                    Email phishing
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_1" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Phishing is an email scam designed to trick you into disclosing your sensitive information such as account usernames, passwords, credit card numbers and more. Often these emails appear to be sent from a trusted source â such as your bank â but they are in fact sent from someone with criminal intentions.</p>
<p>Donât get caught! Learn more about <a href="/iits/services/protect-your-identity/phishing.html" adhocenable="false">email phishing</a>.</p>
<p><i>Note: Concordia University will never ask you for your account password.</i></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">


<div class="parbase section reference"><div style="display:inline;" class="cq-dd-paragraph"><div class="parbase box_6 box">









<div class="c-sidebar-calltoaction bloc link-color-dark " style=" color: # !important;   ">


    <h2 class="section-header" style='color: # !important; '></h2>
    <div class="parsys">


<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2 class="section-header ">Safe Computing</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="link-list section">





    <div class="c-bloc-links class="">

        <ul class="">
	                    <li class=""><a href="/iits/services/protect-your-identity.html"  >Protect your identity</a></li>
	                    <li class=""><a href="/iits/services/software-applications/anti-virus.html"  >Protect your computer</a></li></ul> 
</div></div>


</div>



</div>

</div>
</div>
</div>


</div>

            </div>

        </div>

    </div>
    
</section>

				            </li>
                    		<li class="">
					            <a tabindex="-1" href="/iits/services/internet-phones.html">Internet &amp; phones</a>
				            </li>
                    </ul> 
	            </li>

            	
            	<li class="dropdown ">
					
                    <a href="/iits/support.html" role="button" class="dropdown-toggle" data-toggle="">Support</a>
                    <ul class="dropdown-menu">
                    		<li class="">
					            <a tabindex="-1" href="/iits/support/training.html">Workshops &amp; training</a>
				            </li>
                    </ul> 
	            </li>

            	
            	<li class="dropdown ">
					
                    <a href="/iits/safe-computing.html" role="button" class="dropdown-toggle" data-toggle="">Safe computing</a>
                    <ul class="dropdown-menu">
                    		<li class="">
					            <a tabindex="-1" href="/iits/safe-computing/protect-your-computer-redirect.html">Protect your computer</a>
				            </li>
                    		<li class="">
					            <a tabindex="-1" href="/iits/safe-computing/protect-your-identity-redirect.html">Protect your identity</a>
				            </li>
                    </ul> 
	            </li>

            	
            	<li class="dropdown ">
					
						<a href="/iits/news-alerts.html" role="button">News &amp; alerts</a>
	            </li>

            	
            	<li class="dropdown active">
					
                    <a href="/iits/about-iits.html" role="button" class="dropdown-toggle" data-toggle="">About IITS</a>
                    <ul class="dropdown-menu">
                    		<li class="active">
					            <a tabindex="-1" href="/iits/about-iits/departments.html">Departments</a>
				            </li>
                    </ul> 
	            </li>
        </ul>
	</div>
</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

    
    <div class="container">

                    Home
                </a>
	        </li>

                    IITS
                </a>

<section id="content-main">

    <div class="container">
    
        <div class="row with_socialbar">

            <div class="share-this">

        <div class="c-socialbar-cta">
            <ul>
                <li>
                    <a href="javascript:window.print();" title="Print">
                        <span class="sprites-icon-print-fushia">Print</span>

                <li>
                    <a href="#" title="Email" class="st_email_custom">
                    	<span class="sprites-icon-email-fushia" st_image='http://www.concordia.ca/content/concordia/en/iits/about-iits/departments.img.png/1376574619826.png'>Email</span>

                </li>
                <li>
                    <a href="#" title="Share" class="st_sharethis_custom">
                        <span class="sprites-icon-share-fushia" st_image='http://www.concordia.ca/content/concordia/en/iits/about-iits/departments.img.png/1376574619826.png'>Share</span>

            <hr>

            <ul>
                <li>
                    <a href="#" title="Facebook" class="st_facebook_custom">
                    	<span class="sprites-icon-social-1" displayText="Facebook" st_image='http://www.concordia.ca/content/concordia/en/iits/about-iits/departments.img.png/1376574619826.png'>Facebook</span>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Departments</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        <a name="admin"></a>
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open  Administrative and Training Services">
					
                     Administrative and Training Services
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>The Administrative and Training Services group provides a range of integrated IITS services, technology systems, and supports the operation of the IITS department.</p>
<h3>Reception &amp; Switchboard &nbsp;</h3>
<p>Reception &amp; Switchboard Services provides information and directory assistance to the university community and general public. Their operators respond to inquiries and direct callers or visitors to the appropriate staff, faculty or university resource. Operators also set up, administer and monitor operator-assisted conference calls with multiple parties in various locations, facilitating meetings with IITS staff members.</p>
<h3>Administrative &nbsp;</h3>
<p>The Administrative Services group facilitates the procurement of goods and services requested by the department, tracks delivery of orders and ensures the timely payment of invoices. They are also responsible for billing and accounting for the services IITS provides the university community.</p>
<h3>Training &nbsp;</h3>
<p>The IITS Training and Support team helps faculty and staff to effectively use the Moodle system by administering the application itself, delivering instructor-led training, creating and maintaining documentation and advising--over the phone or through individual sessions</p>
<p>The team also helps with the development of Moodle sites in partnership with individual site owners, identifying, technical solutions for the presentation and delivery of course materials. Addressing particularly complex requests may call for a special initiative. Workshops, which are regularly scheduled, are also designed to educate staff and faculty about the technical aspects of Moodleâs features and functions.</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        <a name="application"></a>
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Application Portfolio Management">
					
                    Application Portfolio Management
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_0" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>The Application Portfolio Management team is made up of the following five development and support groups:</p>
<ul>
<li>Administrative Systems</li>
<li>Student Systems</li>
<li>Faculty Systems</li>
<li>Human Resources Information Systems (HRIS) &nbsp;</li>
<li>Database Administration group</li>
</ul>
<p>These groups work with the Concordia community to enhance the user experience by creating or improving current application functionality. Each team provides analytic, development, support and project management expertise to their respective areas. They are also responsible for continuously improving service delivery by staying abreast of technological or process-oriented changes and facilitating information access and sharing across the university.</p>
<h3>Student Systems</h3>
<p>The Student Systems group develops and provides support for various student applications that include:</p>
<ul>
<li>Web registration</li>
<li>Student accounts</li>
<li>Student transcripts and records</li>
<li>Moodle</li>
<li>Student Information System&nbsp;</li>
</ul>
<h3>Faculty Systems</h3>
<p>The Faculty Systems group develops and provides support for all systems that serve faculty needs, including:</p>
<ul>
<li>The Faculty Resource Information System&nbsp;</li>
<li>Grade entry</li>
<li>Admission reports</li>
<li>Course evaluations</li>
<li>Provotrack</li>
</ul>
<h3>Human Resources Information Systems&nbsp;</h3>
<p>The HRIS group manages and supports the Human Resources application and works closely with the HR team to ensure the smooth operation of the HRIS. The group also develops interfaces to and from the HRIS as well as custom screens.</p>
<h3>Administrative Systems</h3>
<p>The Administrative Systems group develops and supports all systems that serve faculty and staff, except for HRIS. Examples include:</p>
<ul>
<li>Banner finance</li>
<li>Banner alumni</li>
<li>Millennium</li>
<li>Digital Store systems</li>
</ul>
<h3><span style="font-size: 12px;">Database Administration Group (Quality Assurance)</span></h3>
<p>The Database Administration and Quality Assurance group ensures that all central databases are backed up, optimized and up to date with the latest patches. The group also ensures that source code or database objects are secure and tested before migration to production systems.</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        <a name="IT"></a>
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open IT Architecture, Security and Planning">
					
                    IT Architecture, Security and Planning
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_1" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>The IT Architecture, Security, &amp; Planning group is responsible for the development and maintenance of a university-wide IT strategic plan, IT security governance and control, and IT standardization, including the management of a software license master agreement.</p>
<p>The group represents IITS at all levels of project planning and development as part of the IT strategic plan. This includes the financial plan and governance bodies, providing authoritative advice on current and potential maintenance issues to senior administrators, and evaluating the overall effectiveness of the plan to ensure goals and objectives are met and in line with the universityâs mission. The group, which stays on top of the latest IT trends, also oversees the development and implementation of initiatives that support the university's strategic direction.</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        <a name="infra"></a>
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open IT Infrastructure and Operations">
					
                    IT Infrastructure and Operations
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_2" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>The IT Infrastructure &amp; Operations unit is divided into the following groups:</p>
<h3>IT Infrastructure Services</h3>
<p>This group is responsible for the management and support of server and storage infrastructure. It also manages computer data centers and university-wide, IT infrastructure services.</p>
<h3>Network Services</h3>
<p>The Network Group oversees the university's wired and wireless network infrastructure and security.</p>
<h3>Voice Services</h3>
<p>The Voice Services group is responsible for all telecommunications within the University, including phone lines, fax lines, and voicemail.</p>
<h3>Production Services</h3>
<p>Production Services is in charge of IITS server operations.</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        <a name="user"></a>
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open User Services">
					
                    User Services
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_3" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>IITS User Services comprises the following teams who provide support services to the university community:</p>
<h3>Service Desk</h3>
<p>The Service Desk provides support by phone, email, or in person (H925) to identify and resolve technical issues with equipment, software, email, web applications, and more. The Service Desk answers how-to questions, reports technology-related incidents, and ensures requests are resolved. It also manages IITS computer labs on the Hall Building's 5th floor and 9th floor.</p>
<h3>Classroom Support</h3>
<p>The Classroom Support teams provide technical assistance and troubleshooting support for equipment installed in classrooms and amphitheatres. They maintain and repair classroom equipment and operate equipment depots in the Hall Building, John Molson School of Business building and Loyola Campus CC building for equipment loan and rental. They also provide audio visual set-up and technical support for on-campus events held. The Loyola depot manages the PC and Macintosh computer labs and Media Lab in the CC Building for student use.</p>
<h3>Desktop Support</h3>
<p>The Desktop support group provides on-site support to faculty and staff members to resolve technical issues with equipment and software. The team also handles new computer installations and manages assets and user services' internal toolsets.</p>
<h3>Cinemas</h3>
<p>IITS Cinemas provides professional technical support and event planning for both the Concordia community and external clients in four venues located on the Sir George Williams Campus (downtown). The team provides support for academic classes, screenings, conferences, film festivals and other multimedia events.</p>
<h3>Audio Visual Team</h3>
<p>The team of audio-visual specialists provide the consultation, design and coordination services required during the creation or renewal of classrooms, amphitheaters, conference rooms, research centers or any other areas that require audio visual/ multimedia facilities. They work hand-in-hand with internal project managers and external equipment and service providers to deliver quality environments for professors and students alike.</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">




</div>

            </div>

        </div>

    </div>
    
</section>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>MyConcordia Portal</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase image section">




<div class="" id="cq-image-jsp-/content/concordia/en/iits/services/myconcordia-portal/jcr:content/content-main/image"><img title="portalheader" alt="portalheader" class="cq-dd-image" src="/iits/services/myconcordia-portal/_jcr_content/content-main/image.img.jpg/1375093606614.jpg"></div>
</div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>MyConcordia portal is a secure, self-serviced, central web point that provides content and services to its users based on their relationship with the university.</p>
<p><b>Students</b> can access their personalized class schedule, course registration, online fee payment, exam schedule, student record, book list, and more.</p>
<p><i>Note: Undergraduate students can also log into the <a href="/iits/services/myconcordia-portal/mobile.html" adhocenable="false">MyConcordia mobile web registration page</a> to access their class schedule, grades, and web registration.</i></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>

</div></div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        <a name="netname"></a>
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open How to activate your MyConcordia portal netname">
					
                    How to activate your MyConcordia portal netname
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<ul>
<li>Visit: <a href="http://myconcordia.ca">myconcordia.ca</a></li>
<li>Click the 'activate' link above the &quot;Netname&quot; field at the top</li>
<li>Select your account type (student)</li>
<li>Fill out the required information to complete the activation process</li>
</ul>
<ul>
<li><b>Students: </b>Your netname will have an underscore in it.</li>
</ul>
<p>After filling out the required information, visit <a href="http://myconcordia.ca">myconcordia.ca</a> to log in with your new netname and password. Your password is case sensitive and must be typed exactly as displayed.</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        <a name="reset"></a>
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open How to reset your MyConcordia portal password">
					
                    How to reset your MyConcordia portal password
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_0" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<ul>
<li>Visit: <a href="http://myconcordia.ca">myconcordia.ca</a></li>
<li>Click the 'forgot' link above the &quot;Password&quot; field at the top</li>
<li>Select your account type (student)</li>
<li>Fill out the required information. An email will be sent to the email address listed in your student account. Click on the URL provided in the email to create a new MyConcordia password.</li>
</ul>
<p>After filling out the required information, visit <a href="http://myconcordia.ca">myconcordia.ca</a> to log in with your new netname and password. Your password is case sensitive and must be typed exactly as displayed.</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Common MyConcordia activation problems">
					
                    Common MyConcordia activation problems
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_1" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h5>You do not know your ID number</h5>
<ul>
<li>Visit the IITS Service Desk in person (<a adhocenable="false" href="/maps/sgw-campus.html">H925</a> or <a adhocenable="false" href="/maps/loyola-campus.html">CC207</a>) for support. Out-of-town students must contact the Office of the Registrar at 514-848-2424 ext. 2668.</li>
</ul>
<h5>The system is not accepting your personal information (ex. ID, date of birth, postal code)</h5>
<ul>
<li>Please verify your personal student information with the Office of the Registrar at 514-848-2424 ext. 2668</li>
</ul>
<h5>You do not have access to the email address that the system is emailing the reset procedure to (students)</h5>
<ul>
<li>Contact the IITS Service Desk in person (H925 or CC207) for support.</li>
</ul>
<p>&nbsp;</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2 class="section-header ">FAQ</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Netnames and passwords">
					
                    Netnames and passwords
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_2" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><b>How do I create my netname and password for MyConcordia?</b><br>
For instructions on activating your netname and password please see <a href="/content/concordia/en/iits/services/myconcordia-portal/#netname" adhocenable="false">How to activate your MyConcordia portal netname</a>.</p>
<p><b>I don't know my student ID number. How can I obtain it?</b><br>
Your student ID can be found on your ID card, your admissions e-mail, as well as on any official documents you may have received from Concordia. It is required to activate your MyConcordia portal. If you have lost/forgotten your student ID number you will need to visit the Birks Student Service Centre in LB 185 (1440 de Maisonneuve blvd.) with photo ID. IITS is unable to give out personal student information via phone or e-mail.</p>
<p><b>Why is the MyConcordia portal not accepting my personal information?</b><br>
If you are trying to activate your netname, or reset your password, and the system is not accepting your information, you will have to verify your personal student information with the Office of the Registrar by calling 514-848-2424 ext. 2668.</p>
<p><b>How do I reset the password for my portal?</b><br>
See <a href="/content/concordia/en/iits/services/myconcordia-portal/#reset" adhocenable="false">How to reset your MyConcordia portal password</a></p>
<p><b>How can I change my netname?</b><br>
Unfortunately, netnames cannot be changed. They are automatically computer generated upon acceptance to Concordia.</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open MyConcordia features">
					
                    MyConcordia features
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_3" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase textimage section">



<div class="image right" id="cq-textimage-jsp-/content/concordia/en/iits/services/myconcordia-portal/jcr:content/content-main/accordion_panel_3/parsys-accordion/textimage" style="width:auto;"><img title="faq4" alt="faq4" class="cq-dd-image" src="/iits/services/myconcordia-portal/_jcr_content/content-main/accordion_panel_3/parsys-accordion/textimage/image.img.jpg/1375093604103.jpg"></div>
        
<script type="text/javascript">
    (function() {
        var imageDiv = document.getElementById("cq-textimage-jsp-/content/concordia/en/iits/services/myconcordia-portal/jcr:content/content-main/accordion_panel_3/parsys-accordion/textimage");
        var imageEvars = '{ imageLink: "/", imageAsset: "/content/dam/concordia/images/IITS/faq4.jpg", imageTitle: "faq4" }';
        var tagNodes = imageDiv.getElementsByTagName('A');
        for (var i = 0; i < tagNodes.length; i++) {
            var link = tagNodes.item(i); 
            link.setAttribute('onclick', 'CQ_Analytics.record({event: "imageClick", values: ' + imageEvars + ', collect:  false, options: { obj: this }, componentPath: "concordia/components/textimage"})');
        }
        
    })();
</script>
        <div class="rte"><div class="text"><p><b>How do I start registering for courses?</b><br>
After receiving academic advising from your department, you may start registering for courses by selecting the Registration option in your MyConcordia portal.</p>
</div></div>
<div class="clear"></div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><b>Why canât I drop a course?</b><br>
You should be able to add or drop courses until the date posted on the <a href="http://registrar.concordia.ca/calendar/">academic calendar</a>.</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><b>Why canât I view âMy Class Scheduleâ?</b></p>
<p>To consult your class schedule, simply click on My Class Schedule to view another menu:<img src="/content/dam/concordia/images/IITS/faq2.jpg" style="float: right;"></p>
<p><img src="/content/dam/concordia/images/IITS/faq1.jpg" style="float: left;"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><b>How can I access my course websites?</b><br>
Class websites are available via Moodle, as of the first day of classes.</p>
<p><b>Why haven't my grades been posted yet?</b><br>
Although your professor may have stated that he/she submitted your grade, the process is quite lengthy as each grade must be approved by the department chair. Please contact your department directly to verify why your grades have not been posted.</p>
<p><b>How can I change my e-mail address in the MyConcordia portal?</b><br>
To ensure you receive important information from Concordia, please enter your e-mail address in your MyConcordia portal. Correspondence from Professors (and Moodle), Administrators and other Concordia departments will be sent to this e-mail address.</p>
<ul>
<li><b>Students:</b> Your e-mail address should be set in the Academic &gt; Change My E-Mail Address section of the portal.</li>
<li><b>Employees:</b> Your e-mail address should be set in the Employee Self Service &gt; MyHR Profile section of the portal.<ul>
<li>The full path is: Employee Self Service &gt; MyHR Profile &gt; my empath &gt; personal &gt; contacts &gt; phone and email.</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<p><b>What is a Permanent Code, and how do I obtain one?</b><br>
The purpose of the permanent code is to individually identify students in the Quebec education system. It is a 12 character significant code that consists of the first 3 letters of the family name, the first letter of the given name, the date of birth (day, month [the female gender is identified by adding 50], year) and 2 validation numbers as determined by the ministÃ¨re de lâÃducation, du Loisir et du Sport. The number 62 is added to the day of birth of all students born after 1999. Students who do not provide a valid permanent code or acceptable documents to create one by the deadline date will be billed a permanent code surcharge. For additional Permanent Code questions, please write to: <a href="mailto:codeperm@alcor.concordia.ca">codeperm@alcor.concordia.ca</a></p>
<p><b>What is the Quebec Residency form for?</b><br>
For information and forms related to Quebec Ministry of Education Requirements (Quebec Provincial Residency). If you have additional questions regarding Quebec Provincial Residency please write to&nbsp;<a href="mailto:quebec.residency@concordia.ca">quebec.residency@concordia.ca</a>.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase textimage section">



<div class="image right" id="cq-textimage-jsp-/content/concordia/en/iits/services/myconcordia-portal/jcr:content/content-main/accordion_panel_3/parsys-accordion/textimage_0" style="width:auto;"><img title="faq3" alt="faq3" class="cq-dd-image" src="/iits/services/myconcordia-portal/_jcr_content/content-main/accordion_panel_3/parsys-accordion/textimage_0/image.img.jpg/1375093604009.jpg"></div>

        <div class="rte"><div class="text"><p><b>How do I access the application centre in the MyConcordia portal?</b><br>
Once logged into your MyConcordia portal, select Application Center from the left menu.</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
</div></div>
<div class="clear"></div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open MyConcordia Errors">
					
                    MyConcordia Errors
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_4" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><p><b>My name is spelled incorrectly in MyConcordia. <br>
How can I change it?</b><br>
To correct your personal information please contact the Office of the Registrar at 514-848-2424 ext. 2668.</p>
<p><b>I'm getting a weird error in the portal, what do I do?</b><br>
If you experience an unknown error in the portal, please copy and paste the full error into the following webform.</p>
<p><b>I'm not able to access the portal through my browser. What browsers are compatible?</b><br>
View a list of compatible browsers.</p>
</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2 class="section-header ">Troubleshooting - Login Problems</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open 'Your User ID and/or Password are invalid.'">
					
                    'Your User ID and/or Password are invalid.'
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_5" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>If you receive an error that your netname or password is invalid, please note the following:</p>
<ul>
<li>Your netname should be entered in lower-case. If you are a student, it will include an underscore (_).</li>
<li>MyConcordia Portal passwords are <b>case sensitive</b>. There is a difference between uppercase characters and lowercase characters.</li>
</ul>
<p>If you continue to experience difficulties, please reset your credentials. To do so:</p>
<ul>
<li>Visit <a href="http://myconcordia.ca">myconcordia.ca</a></li>
<li>Next to Password click on <a href="https://fcms.concordia.ca/netname/net01.asp">(forgot?)</a></li>
<li>You will be asked to enter information so we may verify your identity.</li>
<li>The following page will ask you to answer a secret question* for further verification and to receive a new password.</li>
<li>Once completed, you may access the portal page once more and log in with your new username and password.</li>
</ul>
<p>* If you are unable to answer your secret question you will have to come in person to an IITS Service Desk (<a adhocenable="false" href="/maps/sgw-campus.html">H925</a> or <a adhocenable="false" href="/maps/loyola-campus.html">CC206</a>). IITS is unable to reset passwords via e-mail or phone.</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Problems caused by web-browsers">
					
                    Problems caused by web-browsers
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_6" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><p>Note: You must be using a supported browser to access the MyConcordia portal.</p>
<p>If you are experiencing difficulty logging in to the portal, your internet browser may be the problem. Internet browsers often save information (such as passwords and copies of previously visited web pages) in order to load pages more quickly. Please try clearing your browser's cache and cookies and then try logging into MyConcordia once more. If you are unfamiliar with this procedure, see our web browser information page for instructions.</p>
</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Support">
					
                    Support
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_7" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h3>Students</h3>
<ul>
<li>FAQs</li>
<li><b>Webform:</b> Submit a support request via webform</li>
<li><b>Phone:</b> 514-848-2424 ext. 7613</li>
<li><b>E-mail:</b> <a href="mailto:help@concordia.ca">help@concordia.ca</a></li>
</ul>
<p><b>Note:</b> IITS is unable to provide assistance for non-technical registration issues (ex. pre-requisites, advising requirements, full courses, etc.) These issues are handled by the Office of the Registrar: 514-848-2424 ext. 2668</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
