        <div class="span8">
            <div class="post highlighted">            
                <h1 class="article-title">Understanding Concordia policies</h1>
                
                <div class="subtitle">Concordia employees are asked to accept policy agreement when accessing &lt;em&gt;my empath&lt;/em&gt; on the MyConcordia portal</div>
                
                <div class="clearfix"></div>
                <div class="infos">
	                <div class="date">Posted on October 30, 2012</div>
	                <div class="separator">|</div>
	                <div class="author">
	                   <div class="author parbase picker">






	<span>By: Isabel Rut</span>
</div>

	                </div>
	                <div class="source">
	                   <div class="single source">





</div>
                
                    </div>
                </div>
                
                <div class="rte">
                    <div class="parbase details wysiwyg">



<div class="rte">
<p>Over the past seven weeks, there has been a series of articles about Concordia&rsquo;s policies published in the NOW web and e-newsletter for employees. Moreover, weekly emails were sent to managers and academic leaders, highlighting seven additional policies.<br /> <br /> &ldquo;These policies were selected for their relevance to a wide range of our academic and non-academic personnel,&rdquo; says Carolina Willsher, associate vice-president of Human Resources. &ldquo;Our policies are meant to ensure that governance is applied equally to all members of the Concordia community and that our rights are protected and upheld.&rdquo;</p> <div class="img_wrapper" style="float:right; display:inline; margin:0 0 1em 15px; width:350px;"><div class="inner_shadow"><img width="350" height="233" src="understanding-concordia-policies/_jcr_content/images/image_jpg_0.img.jpg" alt="Caption"/></div> <div class="caption">As of November 5, when employees access <i>my empath</i> on the MyConcordia portal, they will be asked to confirm that they have read the Concordia  University Policies.</div></div> <p>Willsher says employee reactions to the policy stories have been positive. &ldquo;It is generating dialogue and, by extension, is increasing awareness of important policies,&rdquo; she says. &ldquo;Even though the policy awareness campaign is over, I encourage the Concordia community to continue in these discussions.&rdquo;<br /> <br /> As stated throughout the policy awareness campaign, there will be a new agreement generated automatically when employees access the <i>my empath</i> section of the MyConcordia portal as of November 5. This agreement requests confirmation from employees that they understand that they have a responsibility to read and respect Concordia University Policies.<br /> <br /> Concordia personnel will not be hindered from accessing the portal if they have not read the policies. A &ldquo;remind me later&rdquo; button is available to defer accepting the agreement to when the employee is better prepared.<br /> <br /> &ldquo;This policy acceptance simply acknowledges that our faculty and staff understand that they have a responsibility to familiarize themselves with the policies that are relevant to them,&rdquo; says Willsher. &ldquo;There will be an annual reminder to confirm their understanding of the policies and any changes that may have occurred throughout the year.&rdquo;<br /> <br /> <b>Related links:</b><br /> &bull;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &quot;Code exists to protect&quot; &mdash; NOW, September 12, 2012 <br /> &bull;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &quot;Policy awareness campaign highlights employee Code of Ethics&quot; &mdash; NOW, September 19, 2012 <br /> &bull;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &quot;Protecting personal information&quot; &mdash; NOW, September 26, 2012<br /> &bull;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &quot;Safety first&quot; &mdash; NOW, October 3, 2012&nbsp; <br /> &bull;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &quot;Promoting a culture of safety&quot; &mdash; NOW, October 10, 2012&nbsp; <br /> &bull;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &quot;Shining a light on harassment&quot; &mdash; NOW, October 17, 2012&nbsp; <br /> &bull;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &quot;Signing on the dotted line&quot; &mdash; NOW, October 24, 2012<br /> &bull;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Official Concordia policies website and Q&amp;A<br /> <br /> <br /> <br /> &nbsp;</p> 
</div></div>

                </div>
                <div class="parsys">




</div>

                <hr>
                <div class="related-links parbase picker">






</div>

            </div>
        </div>
        <div class="c-sidebar span4">
            <div class="parsys story-parsys">


<div class="join-the-conversation section">








</div>


</div>

            <div class="parbase list list-related-stories related-stories">


</div>

	        </a>
	    
    </div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Senior administration</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open <h3>Dean, Faculty of Engineering and Computer Science</h3>">
					
                    <h3>Dean, Faculty of Engineering and Computer Science</h3>
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_3" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Concordia University invites expressions of interest, nominations and applications for the position of Dean, Faculty of Engineering and Computer Science, with the appointment to be effective July 2014.</p>
<p>Located in the heart of cosmopolitan and vibrant Montreal and home to over 46,000 students and 7,200 staff, Concordia University is one of Canada's most innovative urban universities. Over the past decade, Concordia has invested significantly to renew its faculty, improve and expand its infrastructure and create state-of-the-art facilities for teaching, learning and research. Concordia has 7,400 graduate students enrolled in more than 200 graduate programs and over 6,300 international students from more than 150 countries. Concordiaâs research profile continues to grow as it fosters multidisciplinary approaches to finding solutions to a broad range of societal challenges. For more information, please visit <a href="http://www.concordia.ca/">www.concordia.ca</a>.<b></b></p>
<p>The Dean, Faculty of Engineering and Computer Science will provide strategic direction, academic planning leadership and administrative oversight to achieve the highest possible standards in engineering and computer science education and research. With more than 255 full and part-time faculty members, the Faculty offers over 100 programs to more than 6,000 students, including Concordiaâs largest graduate student enrollment of 2,700. Reporting to the Provost and Vice-President, Academic Affairs and a member of Concordiaâs senior administration, the Dean will lead in promoting innovative approaches to program and professional training development and delivery, increasing funding support, and facilitating partnerships with other Faculties. He or she will ensure sustainable growth and competitiveness, expand the Facultyâs large-scale interdisciplinary research programs and overall research portfolio, and work collaboratively with academic, industry and public sector partners to further enhance its national and international stature. Please visit <a href="http://www.encs.concordia.ca/">www.encs.concordia.ca</a> for more information.</p>
<p>The successful candidate will be an accomplished academic and visionary leader with a record of building strong teams, fostering academic innovation, managing resources, and promoting multi-disciplinary initiatives. Extensive academic leadership experience will enable the new Dean to relate to a range of internal and external partners and promote excellence, equity, diversity and inclusion among faculty, staff and students. She or he will possess an open and collegial style, outstanding management, communication and interpersonal skills, a creative approach to problem solving, and a strong commitment to academic excellence in research and teaching. Registration as a Professional Engineer and the ability to function in both English and French are preferred.</p>
<p>The Search Committee will begin to consider potential candidates immediately and will continue until the position is filled. The initial appointment is for five years, renewable for an additional five years. Concordia University hires on the basis of merit and is committed to employment equity. Applications should include a letter of introduction, curriculum vitae, and the names of three references (who will not be contacted without consent of the candidate) and be forwarded electronically in confidence to:</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><b>L</b><b>a</b><b>v</b><b>e</b><b>r</b><b>n</b><b>e Smith &amp; Associates Inc.</b></p>
<p>1 Yonge Street, Suite 1801</p>
<p>Toronto, ON &nbsp;M5E 1W7</p>
<p><a href="mailto:ConcordiaENCSdean@lavernesmith.com">ConcordiaENCSdean@lavernesmith.com</a></p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">

            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">

<p>Le comitÃ© de recrutement entamera immÃ©diatement lâexamen des candidatures et le poursuivra jusquâÃ  ce que le poste soit pourvu. <p>&nbsp;</p>

<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        <a name="dean-Faculty-of-arts-and-science"></a>
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open <h3>Dean, Faculty of Arts and Science</h3>">
					
                    <h3>Dean, Faculty of Arts and Science</h3>
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_1" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Concordia University invites expressions of interest, nominations and applications for the position of Dean, Faculty of Arts and Science, with the appointment to be effective July 2014.&nbsp;</p>
<p>Located in the heart of Montreal and home to over 46,000 students and 7,000 staff, Concordia University is one of Canada's most innovative urban universities. Over the past decade, Concordia has invested significantly to renew its faculty, improve and expand its infrastructure and create state-of-the-art facilities for teaching, learning and research. Concordia has 7,400 graduate students enrolled in more than 200 graduate programs and over 6,300 international students from more than 150 countries. Concordiaâs research profile continues to grow as it fosters multidisciplinary approaches to finding solutions to a broad range of societal challenges. For more information, please visit <a href="http://www.concordia.ca/">www.concordia.ca</a>.<b></b></p>
<p>The Dean, Faculty of Arts and Science will provide strategic direction, academic planning leadership and administrative oversight to the 21 academic departments and six colleges of the Faculty. With over 18,000 students, the Faculty of Arts and Science offers 314 undergraduate and graduate programs encompassing and crossing the disciplines of sciences, humanities, and social sciences, and has experienced remarkable growth, renewal and success in the past decade. Reporting to the Provost and Vice-President, Academic Affairs and a member of Concordiaâs senior administration, the Dean will lead in promoting innovative approaches to program and professional training development and delivery and lead in efforts that enable the Faculty and University to achieve the highest possible standards in education. He or she will ensure sustainable growth and competitiveness, intensify cross-disciplinary programs and enhance the external stature of the Faculty.</p>
<p>The successful candidate will be an accomplished academic and dynamic leader with a record of building strong teams, promoting and supporting research, fostering academic innovation, managing resources, and advancing multi-disciplinary initiatives. Extensive academic leadership experience will enable the new Dean to relate to a range of internal and external partners and promote excellence, equity, diversity and inclusion among faculty, staff and students. She or he will possess an open and collegial style, outstanding management, communication and interpersonal skills, a creative approach to problem solving, and a strong commitment to academic excellence in research and teaching. The ability to function in both English and French is preferred.</p>
<p>The Search Committee will begin to consider potential candidates immediately and will continue until the position is filled. The initial appointment is for five years, renewable for an additional five years. Concordia University hires on the basis of merit and is committed to employment equity. Applications should include a letter of introduction, curriculum vitae, and the names of three references (who will not be contacted without consent of the candidate) and be forwarded electronically in confidence to:</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><b>L</b><b>a</b><b>v</b><b>e</b><b>r</b><b>n</b><b>e Smith &amp; Associates Inc.</b></p>
<p>1 Yonge Street, Suite 1801</p>
<p>Toronto, ON &nbsp;M5E 1W7</p>
<p><a><a adhocenable="false" href="mailto: ConcordiaFASdean@lavernesmith.com">ConcordiaFASdean@lavernesmith.com</a></a></p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">

                    <h3>Doyen de la FacultÃ© des arts et des sciences</h3>
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_2" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>LâUniversitÃ© Concordia lance un vaste appel de candidatures, de propositions de candidats et de manifestations dâintÃ©rÃªt afin de pourvoir le poste de doyen de la FacultÃ© des arts et des sciences. La personne choisie entrera en fonction en juillet&nbsp;2014.</p>
<p>Au nombre des Ã©tablissements universitaires urbains les plus innovants du Canada, Concordia accueille 46 000 Ã©tudiants et compte 7 000 employÃ©s. Au cours de la derniÃ¨re dÃ©cennie, lâUniversitÃ© a investi largement dans le renouvellement de son corps professoral; a dÃ©veloppÃ© et optimisÃ© ses infrastructures; et sâest dotÃ©e dâinstallations pÃ©dagogiques et scientifiques ultramodernes. LâUniversitÃ© attire en outre 6&nbsp;300&nbsp;Ã©tudiants internationaux venus de quelque 150&nbsp;pays. Par ailleurs, elle favorise lâemploi dâapproches multidisciplinaires pour rÃ©soudre une vaste gamme de questions sociales, ce qui confÃ¨re un prestige grandissant Ã  ses programmes de recherche. Pour en savoir plus, consultez le site <a href="http://www.concordia.ca/">www.concordia.ca</a>.<b></b></p>
<p>Le doyen assure lâencadrement stratÃ©gique et administratif des 21&nbsp;dÃ©partements et des 6&nbsp;collÃ¨ges de la facultÃ©, dont il supervise en outre la planification pÃ©dagogique. La facultÃ© compte plus de 18&nbsp;000&nbsp;Ã©tudiants, Ã  qui elle offre 314&nbsp;programmes de 1<sup>er</sup>&nbsp;cycle et des cycles supÃ©rieurs en sciences, en lettres et sciences humaines de mÃªme quâen sciences sociales. Au cours des dix derniÃ¨res annÃ©es, elle a connu un essor, un renouveau et un succÃ¨s des plus remarquables. Le doyen est membre de lâadministration supÃ©rieure de Concordia. Sous la direction du vice-recteur exÃ©cutif aux affaires acadÃ©miques, il encourage activement lâadoption dâapproches novatrices en matiÃ¨re dâÃ©laboration et de prÃ©sentation de programmes ainsi que de formation professionnelle. Il prend Ã©galement des mesures concrÃ¨tes pour aider la facultÃ© et lâUniversitÃ© Ã  atteindre les normes pÃ©dagogiques les plus Ã©levÃ©es. Enfin, il intensifie les programmes interdisciplinaires, assure la croissance durable et la compÃ©titivitÃ© de la facultÃ©, et en rehausse le profil auprÃ¨s du grand public.</p>
<p>Leader dynamique et universitaire accompli, le candidat retenu doit pouvoir dÃ©montrer, par son parcours, sa capacitÃ© Ã  former des Ã©quipes solides, Ã  promouvoir et Ã  soutenir la recherche, Ã  stimuler lâinnovation pÃ©dagogique, Ã  gÃ©rer des ressources et Ã  diriger des initiatives multidisciplinaires. Fort dâune vaste expÃ©rience en direction universitaire, il doit Ã©galement savoir entretenir des liens avec une foule de partenaires internes et externes ainsi que promouvoir lâexcellence, lâÃ©quitÃ©, la diversitÃ© et lâinclusion auprÃ¨s du corps professoral, du personnel et des Ã©tudiants. Il doit en outre avoir un style axÃ© sur lâouverture et la collaboration; un sens exceptionnel de la gestion, de la communication et des relations interpersonnelles; une approche crÃ©ative de la rÃ©solution de problÃ¨mes ainsi quâun profond engagement Ã  lâÃ©gard de lâexcellence en recherche et en enseignement. Une prÃ©fÃ©rence sera accordÃ©e aux candidats maÃ®trisant lâanglais et le franÃ§ais.</p>
<p>Le comitÃ© de recrutement entamera immÃ©diatement lâexamen des candidatures et le poursuivra jusquâÃ  ce que le poste soit pourvu. Le mandat initial de cinq ans est renouvelable pour une durÃ©e Ã©quivalente. Le recrutement se fait au mÃ©rite, et lâUniversitÃ© souscrit au principe de lâÃ©quitÃ© en matiÃ¨re dâemploi. Le dossier de candidature â qui comprendra un curriculum vitÃ¦, une lettre de prÃ©sentation et trois rÃ©fÃ©rences (qui ne seront contactÃ©es quâavec le consentement du candidat) â doit Ãªtre envoyÃ© par courriel, en toute confidentialitÃ©, Ã  lâadresse ci-dessous.</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><b>L</b><b>a</b><b>v</b><b>e</b><b>r</b><b>n</b><b>e Smith &amp; Associates Inc.</b></p>
<p>1, rue Yonge, bureau 1801</p>
<p>Toronto (Ontario)&nbsp; M5E 1W7</p>
<p><a adhocenable="false" href="mailto: ConcordiaFASdean@lavernesmith.com">ConcordiaFASdean@lavernesmith.com</a></p>

</div></div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>

</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        <a name="university-librarian"></a>
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open <h3>University Librarian</h3>">
					
                    <h3>University Librarian</h3>
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>This opening is a unique opportunity for a forward-looking University Librarian to play a critical role in fostering active and collaborative learning within one of Canada's most innovative and premier urban universities.</p>
<p>With 7,000 faculty and staff, along with 46,000 students, Concordia University in Montreal boasts a unique legacy for supporting and developing individuals and their aspirations to contribute to the worldâs wealth of knowledge, bridge communities and make it possible for individuals to grow academically, professionally and personally.&nbsp; Looking towards the future, Concordia has invested significantly to renew its faculty, improve its facilities and promote its sustainability efforts.</p>
<p>Concordia University is seeking as its new University Librarian a visionary leader who is committed to excellence in librarianship and has a well-regarded reputation for advancing research, learning and teaching at a university.</p>
<p>Candidates must have:&nbsp; a Masterâs degree in Library and Information Science from an ALA accredited program, or equivalent education and training; a scholarly profile and career consistent with the vision of a modern academic library; and experience in delivering outstanding library services that reflect the aspirations and trends in higher education.&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>
<p>The ideal candidate has a broad knowledge and understanding of current issues in academic librarianship, a successful track record in managing and shaping change, strong collaborative skills, and experience in managing human resources, preferably in a unionized environment. &nbsp;&nbsp;The candidate has demonstrated, above all, a passion for creating an intellectually stimulating learning environment and cultivating a positive high-service culture.&nbsp; Excellent communication in English is essential, and French language skills are a distinct advantage.</p>
<p>To apply, please submit your <i>curriculum vitae</i> and cover letter online at www.odgersberndtson.ca/en/careers/11986.&nbsp; Individuals who wish to nominate a candidate for this position should submit a letter of nomination, including the name, position, address, telephone number and e-mail address of the nominee to <a href="mailto:maryk.bouchard@odgersberndtson.ca">maryk.bouchard@odgersberndtson.ca</a> Inquiries may be directed to <a href="mailto:maryk.bouchard@odgersberndtson.ca">maryk.bouchard@odgersberndtson.ca</a> or at 514-937-1000, ext. 223.&nbsp; Consideration of candidates begins in October 2013 and will continue until the successful candidate is selected.</p>
<p><i>Concordia University hires on the basis of merit and is committed to employment equity. All qualified candidates are encouraged to apply. In accordance with immigration requirements, Canadian citizens and permanent residents of Canada will be given priority.&nbsp;</i></p>
<p><i>We thank all applicants and will personally contact only those individuals whose backgrounds best match the requirements for the role. </i></p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        <a name="bibliothecaire-universitaire"></a>
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open <h3>BibliothÃ©caire universitaire</h3>">
					
                    <h3>BibliothÃ©caire universitaire</h3>
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_0" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Cet appel de candidatures reprÃ©sente une occasion unique pour tout bibliothÃ©caire universitaire tournÃ© vers l'avenir. En effet, le candidat sÃ©lectionnÃ© jouera un rÃ´le clÃ© dans la mise en place d'un milieu d'apprentissage axÃ© sur l'action et la collaboration, au sein d'une universitÃ© urbaine de premier plan qui figure parmi les plus novatrices du Canada.</p>
<p>Comptant quelque 46&nbsp;000&nbsp;Ã©tudiants et 7&nbsp;000&nbsp;professeurs et autres membres du personnel, l'UniversitÃ© Concordia de MontrÃ©al se dÃ©marque par sa feuille de route impressionnante en matiÃ¨re de soutien et de dÃ©veloppement. Ainsi, elle offre son appui aux personnes dÃ©sireuses d'enrichir les connaissances Ã  l'Ã©chelle mondiale, elle rallie les communautÃ©s et elle permet aux gens de s'accomplir sur les plans scolaire, professionnel et personnel. Toujours prÃªte Ã  Ã©largir ses horizons, l'UniversitÃ© Concordia a consacrÃ© des ressources considÃ©rables au renouvellement de son corps enseignant, Ã  l'amÃ©lioration de ses installations et Ã  l'affirmation de son engagement en matiÃ¨re de durabilitÃ©.</p>
<p>L'UniversitÃ© Concordia est Ã  la recherche d'un nouveau bibliothÃ©caire universitaire, Ã  la fois meneur et visionnaire. VouÃ©e Ã  l'excellence en bibliothÃ©conomie, cette personne est reconnue pour avoir fait progresser la recherche, l'apprentissage et l'enseignement dans une universitÃ© donnÃ©e.</p>
<p>Le candidat recherchÃ© possÃ¨de une maÃ®trise en bibliothÃ©conomie et sciences de l'information, dÃ©cernÃ©e dans le cadre d'un programme accrÃ©ditÃ© par l'ALA, ou encore une formation ou un diplÃ´me Ã©quivalent; son profil scolaire et professionnel reflÃ¨te une vision moderne de la bibliothÃ©conomie universitaire; et son expÃ©rience dÃ©montre une aptitude Ã  fournir un service remarquable, en accord avec les objectifs et les tendances du milieu universitaire.</p>
<p>Le candidat idÃ©al prÃ©sente une solide comprÃ©hension et une connaissance approfondie des enjeux actuels en matiÃ¨re de bibliothÃ©conomie universitaire; son parcours tÃ©moigne d'une capacitÃ© Ã  gÃ©rer et Ã  orienter le changement; il dÃ©montre de solides aptitudes en matiÃ¨re de collaboration; il possÃ¨de de l'expÃ©rience en gestion de ressources humaines, prÃ©fÃ©rablement dans un milieu de travail syndiquÃ©; et, surtout, il aspire Ã  mettre en place un environnement d'apprentissage stimulant sur le plan intellectuel, et Ã  promouvoir une culture de service positive de haut niveau. Enfin, ce candidat communique parfaitement en anglais. La connaissance du franÃ§ais s'avÃ¨re un atout important.</p>
<p>Pour soumettre votre candidature, soit votre curriculum&nbsp;vitae et une lettre de prÃ©sentation, rendez-vous Ã  www.odgersberndtson.ca/en/careers/11986. Pour recommander la nomination dâun candidat Ã  ce poste, veuillez nous faire parvenir une lettre de recommandation, indiquant le nom de la personne que vous recommandez, son poste actuel, son adresse, son numÃ©ro de tÃ©lÃ©phone et son adresse courriel, Ã  <a href="mailto:maryk.bouchard@odgersberndtson.ca">maryk.bouchard@odgersberndtson.ca</a>. Vous pouvez Ã©galement soumettre vos questions par Ã©crit Ã  cette adresse, ou tÃ©lÃ©phoner au 514&nbsp;937-1000, poste&nbsp;223.</p>
<p>Lâexamen des candidatures dÃ©bute en octobre&nbsp;2013 et se poursuivra jusqu'Ã  la nomination d'un candidat.</p>
<p><i>L'UniversitÃ© Concordia pourvoit ses postes au mÃ©rite et souscrit aux principes d'Ã©quitÃ© en emploi. Toutes les personnes possÃ©dant les qualifications requises sont invitÃ©es Ã  postuler; la prioritÃ© sera toutefois accordÃ©e aux citoyens canadiens et aux rÃ©sidents permanents, conformÃ©ment aux exigences relatives Ã  lâimmigration.</i></p>
<p><i>Nous remercions tous les candidats, toutefois, nous ne communiquerons qu'avec ceux dont le profil correspond le mieux aux exigences dÃ©finies pour ce poste.</i></p>
<p><i>Le masculin est utilisÃ© dans ce texte dans le seul but dâen allÃ©ger la lecture.</i></p>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

                    socialbar.scroll();

        </script></div>


            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Pick up your student ID card</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parsys_column row-fluid cq-colctrl-lt7"><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt7-c0 span4"><div class="parbase image section">




<div class="" id="cq-image-jsp-/content/concordia/en/offices/birks/student-id/jcr:content/content-main/image"><img title="student-id-sample-small" alt="student-id-sample-small" class="cq-dd-image" src="/content/concordia/en/offices/birks/student-id/_jcr_content/content-main/image.img.jpg/1375094139858.jpg"></div>
</div>
</div><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt7-c1 span8"><div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Your student identification card confirms that you are a Concordia University student. You will use it for all kinds of essential everyday campus activities, from using the library, to riding the shuttle bus, and writing exams. For these reasons, please carry your student ID card with you at all times.</p>

</div></div>
</div></div><div style="clear:both"></div><div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2 class="section-header ">Obtain your ID in two steps</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<ol>
<li><b>Register for your courses.</b> Wait at least<b>&nbsp;</b>24 hours<b> </b>before<b> </b>coming to Birks to pick up your ID card.</li>
<li><b>Come to Birks.</b> Simply bring your<ul>
<li><b>Photo ID</b> (e.g., driverâs license, medical insurance card, passport)</li>
<li><b>Student ID number</b> (You will find this on your acceptance letter, class schedule or student record)</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ol>
<p>Initial student ID cards cost $11.50, which will be charged to your student account. Should you need a replacement card, a $15 charge will apply.</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">


<div class="parbase secondary-navigation section">







<div class="c-sidebar-menu c-secondary-navigation" id="secondary_navigation">

<ul style='display:block;'><li class='open'><a class='' href='/offices/birks.html'>Birks</a><div class='arrow '><i></i></div><ul style='display:block;'><li class='open'><a class='active' href='/offices/birks/student-id.html'>Student ID cards</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/birks/opus-transit-card.html'>Reduced-fare public transit cards</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/birks/transcripts.html'>Transcript requests</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/birks/financial-aid.html'>Financial aid & awards services</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/birks/attestation.html'>Official letters and forms</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/birks/final-exams.html'>Final exam conflicts & special requests</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/birks/tuition-and-fees.html'>Tuition and fees</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/birks/certify-diploma.html'>Certification of diploma</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/birks/identity-documents.html'>Studying in QuÃ©bec</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/birks/welcome-centre.html'>Welcome Centre</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/birks/personalized-timetable.html'>Personalized class schedule</a></li></ul></li></ul>
</div>
<script type="text/javascript">
jQuery(function() {
    $ = jQuery;
    $("#secondary_navigation.c-secondary-navigation .arrow").click(function(e) {
        e.preventDefault();
        var $this = $(this);
        $this.toggleClass('open');
        $this.parent().children('ul').slideToggle('fast');
    });
});
</script></div>


</div>

            </div>

        </div>

    </div>
    
</section>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Reduced-fare public transit </h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h5>FULL-TIME STUDENTS ELIGIBLE FOR STUDENT-RATE OPUS CARDs</h5>
</div></div>
<div class="parsys_column row-fluid cq-colctrl-lt1"><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt1-c0 span9"><div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Montrealâs public transit system<i>, <a href="http://www.stm.info">la SociÃ©tÃ© de transport de MontrÃ©al (STM)</a></i>&nbsp;offers a reduced rate for university students. To take advantage of the reduced fare, and to acquire a reduced fare OPUS transit pass, you must prove that you are:<br>
</p>
<ul>
<li>Studying full-time at a university</li>
<li>Between 18 and 25 years of age<br>
</li>
</ul>

</div></div>
</div><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt1-c1 span3"><div class="parbase image section">




<div class="" id="cq-image-jsp-/content/concordia/en/offices/birks/opus-transit-card/jcr:content/content-main/image"><img title="opus-card" alt="opus-card" class="cq-dd-image" src="/offices/birks/opus-transit-card/_jcr_content/content-main/image.img.jpg/1375903839465.jpg"></div>
</div>
</div></div><div style="clear:both"></div><div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2 class="section-header ">ACCESS &amp; PRINT YOUR ATTESTATION LETTER ONLINE</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Great news! You can now obtain an attestation letter that verifies your student status online. Visit <a href="http://myconcordia.ca/">MyConcordia portal</a> to access it.</p>
<ul>
<li>Click on â<b>Attestation Letter</b>â? on the left-hand menu.</li>
<li>Print letter and bring it to an OPUS on-campus Photo ID session (scheduled at Concordia for Sept. 30 and Oct. 1) or to the <a adhocenable="false" target="_blank" href="http://www.stm.info/info/centresac.htm#StudioPhoto">STM photo studio at Berri-UQÃM mÃ©tro station</a>.<br>
You will need proof of age and $14 in cash to cover the cost of the card.</li>
</ul>
<p>For more information on where to have your OPUS card made or to verify on-campus Photo ID session dates, as well as fees and travel fare details, please consult the&nbsp;<a href="http://www.stm.info/en/info/fares/opus-cards-and-other-fare-media/registered-photo-id-opus-card">STM website</a></p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">


<div class="parbase secondary-navigation section">







<div class="c-sidebar-menu c-secondary-navigation" id="secondary_navigation">

<ul style='display:block;'><li class='open'><a class='' href='/offices/birks.html'>Birks</a><div class='arrow '><i></i></div><ul style='display:block;'><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/birks/student-id.html'>Student ID cards</a></li><li class='open'><a class='active' href='/offices/birks/opus-transit-card.html'>Reduced-fare public transit cards</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/birks/transcripts.html'>Transcript requests</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/birks/financial-aid.html'>Financial aid & awards services</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/birks/attestation.html'>Official letters and forms</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/birks/final-exams.html'>Final exam conflicts & special requests</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/birks/tuition-and-fees.html'>Tuition and fees</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/birks/certify-diploma.html'>Certification of diploma</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/birks/identity-documents.html'>Studying in QuÃ©bec</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/birks/welcome-centre.html'>Welcome Centre</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/birks/personalized-timetable.html'>Personalized class schedule</a></li></ul></li></ul>
</div>

jQuery(function() {
    $ = jQuery;
    $("#secondary_navigation.c-secondary-navigation .arrow").click(function(e) {
        e.preventDefault();
        var $this = $(this);
        $this.toggleClass('open');
        $this.parent().children('ul').slideToggle('fast');
    });
});

		_gaq.push(['_trackPageview']);

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Personalized class schedule</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2>Get a hard copy of your schedule</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Do you need a printed copy of your schedule? As long as you are currently registered in courses, you can pick up a copy of your course schedule. The schedule will list the courses you are registered for the current academic year, the days and times of each course and the room number. &nbsp;</p>
<p>All you need to do is to:</p>
<ul>
<li>Come to Birks&nbsp;</li>
<li>Present your Concordia student ID card or any photo ID</li>
</ul>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h3>Fee</h3>
<p>There is <b>no fee</b>&nbsp;for a hard copy of your personalized course schedule.</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">


<div class="parbase secondary-navigation section">







<div class="c-sidebar-menu c-secondary-navigation" id="secondary_navigation">

<ul style='display:block;'><li class='open'><a class='' href='/offices/birks.html'>Birks</a><div class='arrow '><i></i></div><ul style='display:block;'><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/birks/student-id.html'>Student ID cards</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/birks/opus-transit-card.html'>Reduced-fare public transit cards</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/birks/transcripts.html'>Transcript requests</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/birks/financial-aid.html'>Financial aid & awards services</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/birks/attestation.html'>Official letters and forms</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/birks/final-exams.html'>Final exam conflicts & special requests</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/birks/tuition-and-fees.html'>Tuition and fees</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/birks/certify-diploma.html'>Certification of diploma</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/birks/identity-documents.html'>Studying in QuÃ©bec</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/birks/welcome-centre.html'>Welcome Centre</a></li><li class='open'><a class='active' href='/offices/birks/personalized-timetable.html'>Personalized class schedule</a></li></ul></li></ul>
</div>
<script type="text/javascript">
jQuery(function() {
    $ = jQuery;
    $("#secondary_navigation.c-secondary-navigation .arrow").click(function(e) {
        e.preventDefault();
        var $this = $(this);
        $this.toggleClass('open');
        $this.parent().children('ul').slideToggle('fast');
    });
});
</script></div>


</div>

                                 <div class="span6 last" style="border:none;">
                                      <div class="quick-links">Quick links</div>
                                       <ul>
                                               <li><a tabindex="-1" href="/research/units.html">Research units</a></li>

                               	  </div>

                               	  </div>
                              </div>
                         </li>

                         <li class="dropdown ">
                             <a href="/international.html" role="button" class="dropdown-toggle">International</a>

                                           <li><a tabindex="-1" href="/international/students.html">International students</a></li>

                </div>
            </div>    
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Studying in Qu&eacute;bec</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>The government of Quebec requires specific documentation from <b>every student who studies in Quebec</b>. You can submit&nbsp;these documents at Birks.</p>
<p>Birks is also the place to come if you have questions about any of the issues below:<br>
&nbsp;</p>

</div></div>
<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2 class="section-header ">Permanent Code</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<ul>
<li>Everyone needs a permanent code to study in Quebec.&nbsp; You already have one if you previously attended school in Quebec. If you're new to Quebec, <a adhocenable="false" href="/admissions/tuition-fees/permanent-code.html">find out how to obtain your permanent code</a>.<br>
&nbsp;</li>
</ul>

</div></div>
<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2 class="section-header ">Proving citizenship and legal status</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>As per the <i>MinistÃ¨re de lâenseignement superieure, de la recherche, de la science et de la technologie</i>, Canadian citizens, permanent residents of Canada and international students must all provide documentation to prove their legal status in Canada.&nbsp;</p>
<h5><b>Documents to prove legal status in Canada</b></h5>
<ul>
<li><i>Canadian citizen born in Canada</i>: Copy of your birth certificate</li>
<li><i>Canadian citizen born outside of Canada</i>: Copy of both sides of your Canadian citizenship certificate</li>
<li><i>Permanent Resident of Canada</i>: Copy of both sides of your Canadian permanent resident card or immigration form IMM-1000, IMMâ5292 or IMM-5668</li>
<li><i>International student</i>: Various documents may be required. Please visit the link below for more information:<ul>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="http://supportservices.concordia.ca/iso/immigration/">Immigration documents for international students</a></li>
<li>Questions? <a adhocenable="false" href="http://supportservices.concordia.ca/iso/contactus/">Contact the International Students Office<br>
 <br>
 </a></li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>

</div></div>
<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2 class="section-header ">Proving Qu&eacute;bec resident status</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<ul>
<li>To qualify for Quebec tuition rates, students who are Canadian citizens or permanent residents of Canada must also prove their Quebec residency status.&nbsp;<a href="/admissions/tuition-fees/quebec-residency.html" adhocenable="false">Find out if you're eligible to pay Quebec resident tuition</a>.<br>
&nbsp;</li>
</ul>

</div></div>
<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2 class="section-header ">International fee exemptions</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<ul>
<li>Some international students may also qualify for the Quebec tuition rate.&nbsp; <a href="/admissions/tuition-fees/international-fee-exemptions.html" adhocenable="false">Find out if you're eligible for the International Fee Exemption</a>.</li>
</ul>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">


<div class="parbase secondary-navigation section">







<div class="c-sidebar-menu c-secondary-navigation" id="secondary_navigation">

<ul style='display:block;'><li class='open'><a class='' href='/offices/birks.html'>Birks</a><div class='arrow '><i></i></div><ul style='display:block;'><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/birks/student-id.html'>Student ID cards</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/birks/opus-transit-card.html'>Reduced-fare public transit cards</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/birks/transcripts.html'>Transcript requests</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/birks/financial-aid.html'>Financial aid & awards services</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/birks/attestation.html'>Official letters and forms</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/birks/final-exams.html'>Final exam conflicts & special requests</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/birks/tuition-and-fees.html'>Tuition and fees</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/birks/certify-diploma.html'>Certification of diploma</a></li><li class='open'><a class='active' href='/offices/birks/identity-documents.html'>Studying in QuÃ©bec</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/birks/welcome-centre.html'>Welcome Centre</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/birks/personalized-timetable.html'>Personalized class schedule</a></li></ul></li></ul>
</div>
<script type="text/javascript">
jQuery(function() {
    $ = jQuery;
    $("#secondary_navigation.c-secondary-navigation .arrow").click(function(e) {
        e.preventDefault();
        var $this = $(this);
        $this.toggleClass('open');
        $this.parent().children('ul').slideToggle('fast');
    });
});
</script></div>


</div>

            </div>

        </div>

    </div>

			var ga = document.createElement('script'); ga.type = 'text/javascript'; ga.async = true;
			ga.src = ('https:' == document.location.protocol ? 'https://ssl' : 'http://www') + '.google-analytics.com/ga.js';
			var s = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0]; s.parentNode.insertBefore(ga, s);
		})();
		
    </script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Requesting official transcripts</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase target section">








<div class="mboxDefault" id="content-concordia-en-students-records-transcripts-request-official-transcripts-content-main-multi_step">
    
</div>


<script type="text/javascript">
	var mboxId = 'content-concordia-en-students-records-transcripts-request-official-transcripts-content-main-multi_step';
	var mboxName = 'content-concordia-en-students-records-transcripts-request-official-transcripts-content-main-multi_step';
	var mboxLocation = '/content/concordia/en/students/records/transcripts/request-official-transcripts/jcr:content/content-main/multi_step';
	var wcmMode = 'DISABLED';

	if ( typeof mboxDefine == 'function' && wcmMode !== 'ANALYTICS' ) {
		var callParameters = [ mboxId ];
		var callFunction;
		var replaced = false;
	
		
				callFunction = mboxCreate;
		
		
		
		var staticParameters = {};
		
		for ( var key in staticParameters )
			callParameters.push(key  + '=' + staticParameters[key]);
		
		if ( !replaced ) { // do not define the same mbox twice, this leads to additional JS calls
			callFunction.apply(undefined, callParameters);
		}
		
		
		
		if ( callFunction == mboxDefine ) {
		    
		    // if the campaign store is available at this time we are most likely simulating
		    // so trigger an update if the (auto) campaign is selected
            var campaignStore = ClientContext.get("campaign");
            if ( campaignStore && !campaignStore.isCampaignSelected() ) {
                CQ_Analytics.TestTarget.triggerUpdate();
            }
    		
    		// wait for 2 seconds for the T&T answer to come in to prevent page flicker issues
    		// also see the overlay of mbox.protoype.setOffer which completes this
    		setTimeout(function() {
    		    CQ_Analytics.TestTarget.showDefaultMboxContent(mboxId, mboxName);
    		}, 2000);
		}
	}
	
	
		
</script>
</div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Requesting an official transcript consists of three steps:</p>
<ul>
<li>Fill out the form</li>
<li>Submit the form</li>
<li>Arrange for delivery of transcripts</li>
</ul>
<p>Please note: <b>an o</b><b>verdue student account balance at Concordia </b>is the only thing that will prevent you from receiving your transcripts. Your transcripts will not be released if you have an overdue balance. &nbsp;</p>
<ul>
<li>Check your account balance on <a adhocenable="false" href="https://www.myconcordia.ca/">MyConcordia</a>, and pay any outstanding balance if necessary.<b></b></li>
<li>We release transcripts on the first business day after your payment appears on your student account.</li>
<li>If you are a student in a Master's or PhD program, transcripts will be released under <a href="/admissions/tuition-fees/how-fees-are-billed/graduate/obligations.html#transcript" adhocenable="false">special circumstances outlined on the Tuition &amp; fees webpage</a></li>
</ul>

</div></div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        <a name="transcript-request-form"></a>
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Filling out the transcript request form">
					
                    Filling out the transcript request form
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Please download, print, complete and sign the <a href="/content/dam/concordia/offices/registrar/docs/birks/tranform.pdf" adhocenable="false">Transcript of Academic Record Request form</a>.</p>
<ul>
<li>Fill out a separate form for each institution that you would like the transcript(s) sent to. &nbsp;</li>
<li>We normally send Official transcripts directly to the institution requiring them</li>
<li>We can also place the transcript in a sealed envelope and either mail it to you, or</li>
<li>You can pick it up at the Birks Student Service Centre.</li>
</ul>
<p>When you fill out the form, please make sure to:</p>
<ul>
<li>Print clearly and remember to sign both sections of the form.</li>
<li>Your signature is required to release the transcript(s).</li>
</ul>
<p>Incomplete or illegible forms will cause delays in processing your request.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h3>Fees</h3>
<p>The fee for official transcripts is $7.00 per sealed envelope with a maximum of 3 copies per envelope.</p>
<p>If multiple copies are to be placed separately in individually sealed envelopes (i.e one copy per envelope vs multiple copies in the same envelope), please indicate the number of copies and to seal them individually on the request form. The cost for each envelope is $7.00.</p>
<p>If required, a student copy of the transcript is available for an additional $3.00. Please indicate this on your request form. All fees include regular postage and taxes.&nbsp;</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h3>To request transcripts on someoneâs behalf</h3>
<p><b>Written authorization â</b>&nbsp;signed by the Concordia student, alumnus or alumna â must be provided along with the completed request form, if someone plans to make a transcript request by proxy, on someone elseâs behalf.&nbsp;</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        <a name="submit-transcript-request"></a>
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Submit your transcript request">
					
                    Submit your transcript request
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_0" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase table section">




<div class="concordia-table   horizontalLines">
    <table width="100%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="1" border="1">
<tbody><tr><th width="25%">In person</th>
<td><p>Birks Student Service Centre<br>
Room <a href="/maps/sgw-campus.html?building=LB" adhocenable="false">LB 185</a><br>
1400 De Maisonneuve W.</p>
<p><b>Payment:</b> You can pay by money order, VISA, MasterCard, American Express or Debit Card.</p>
</td>
</tr><tr><th width="25%">By fax</th>
<td><p>514-848-2616</p>
<p><b>Payment:</b> Include payment by Visa, MasterCard or American Express (e<i>xcluding debit credit cards, i.e., TD, CIBC, and US Debit Credit Card)</i>. The credit card number, the expiry date and the card holderâs signature are required.</p>
<p>Please note that <b>duplicate fax requests </b>will be considered as individual requests and will be charged accordingly.</p>
</td>
</tr><tr><th width="25%">By mail</th>
<td><p>Concordia University<br>
Att: Transcript Department; Room LB 700<br>
1455 De Maisonneuve Blvd. West<br>
Montreal, Quebec, H3G 1M8</p>
<p><b>Payment:</b> Include payment by cheque or money order (payable to Concordia University), or VISA, MasterCard or American Express (e<i>xcluding debit credit cards, i.e., TD, CIBC , and US Debit Credit Card)</i>. Payment by credit card requires the card number, the expiry date as well as the card holderâs signature.</p>
</td>
</tr></tbody></table>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        <a name="receiving-transcripts"></a>
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Receiving your transcripts">
					
                    Receiving your transcripts
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_1" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h3>Confirming requests</h3>
<p>Unfortunately, we cannot confirm the receipt of each request received. Please contact us&nbsp;directly <a adhocenable="false" href="mailto:transcripts@concordia.ca">by email</a> or phone (514-848-2424, ext. 2630) if you would like confirmation that your request has been received.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h3>Processing time</h3>
<p>It can take up to&nbsp;<b>3 to 5 working days</b> to process transcripts. It may take longer for pre-1980 records and during peak periods (i.e. before an admission application deadline).</p>
<p><b>Be sure to submit your request well in advance of your deadline dates.</b></p>
<h3>Pick-up in person</h3>
<p>Contact us first to confirm that the transcript is ready for pick-up or visit the Birks Student Service Centre after the five-day processing time has passed (unless otherwise specified).</p>
<h3>By mail</h3>
<p>Official transcripts are normally sent by regular mail. If we send you official transcripts, they arrive in a large brown envelope which can be opened. The sealed transcripts are inside.</p>
<h3>Electronic delivery</h3>
<p>Transcripts destined to other universities in Quebec are sent electronically.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h3>By courier</h3>
<p>Courier service can be provided for an additional fee, depending on the destination. Here is the current list of courier companies we use and their fees.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase table section">




<div class="concordia-table   horizontalLines">
    <table width="100%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="1" border="1">
<tbody><tr><th colspan="4" width="25%" style="text-align: center;">Courier Services for Transcript</th>
</tr><tr><th width="25%">Destination</th>
<th width="25%">Cost</th>
<th width="25%">Delivery time</th>
<th width="25%">Courier</th>
</tr><tr><td width="193" valign="bottom"><p>Quebec &amp; Ontario</p>
</td>
<td width="192" valign="bottom"><p>$7.00</p>
</td>
<td width="192" valign="bottom"><p>1 Day</p>
</td>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

                $ = jQuery;
                socialbar.init();

                    socialbar.scroll();
                });
    
            });
        </script></div>


            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<H1>Certified copy of Concordia diploma</H1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Certified diploma copies are sometimes needed for professional or immigration purposes.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h3>Examples</h3>
<ul>
<li>Government departments</li>
<li>Employers</li>
<li>Immigration/embassy officials.&nbsp;</li>
</ul>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Need a certified copy of your diploma? Follow these two steps:</p>
<ol>
<li>Come to Birks with your student ID or photo ID.</li>
<li>Bring your original Concordia diploma and the photocopies you require to be certified.<br>
&nbsp;</li>
</ol>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h3>Fee</h3>
<p>There is a <b>fee of $5</b> to certify your diploma.</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">


<div class="parbase secondary-navigation section">







<div class="c-sidebar-menu c-secondary-navigation" id="secondary_navigation">

<ul style='display:block;'><li class='open'><a class='' href='/offices/birks.html'>Birks</a><div class='arrow '><i></i></div><ul style='display:block;'><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/birks/student-id.html'>Student ID cards</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/birks/opus-transit-card.html'>Reduced-fare public transit cards</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/birks/transcripts.html'>Transcript requests</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/birks/financial-aid.html'>Financial aid & awards services</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/birks/attestation.html'>Official letters and forms</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/birks/final-exams.html'>Final exam conflicts & special requests</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/birks/tuition-and-fees.html'>Tuition and fees</a></li><li class='open'><a class='active' href='/offices/birks/certify-diploma.html'>Certification of diploma</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/birks/identity-documents.html'>Studying in QuÃ©bec</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/birks/welcome-centre.html'>Welcome Centre</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/birks/personalized-timetable.html'>Personalized class schedule</a></li></ul></li></ul>
</div>
<script type="text/javascript">
jQuery(function() {
    $ = jQuery;
    $("#secondary_navigation.c-secondary-navigation .arrow").click(function(e) {
        e.preventDefault();
        var $this = $(this);
        $this.toggleClass('open');
        $this.parent().children('ul').slideToggle('fast');
    });
});
</script></div>

<head>
    <meta charset="utf-8">
    <meta http-equiv="content-type" content="text/html; charset=UTF-8">
    <meta http-equiv="X-UA-Compatible" content="IE=edge,chrome=1">
    <meta http-equiv="keywords" content="final examinations, FAQ">
    <meta http-equiv="description" content="Have an issue regarding your final exam? Birks staff will help diagnose your problem and refer you to someone who can help. We&rsquo;re also the place to drop off forms or documents related to exam requests.">
    <title>Final exam conflicts &amp; special requests</title>

    
    <link rel="shortcut icon" href="/etc/designs/concordia/favicon.ico">
    

        
    <meta property="og:title" content="Final exam conflicts &amp; special requests" />
    <meta property="og:description" content="Have an issue regarding your final exam? Birks staff will help diagnose your problem and refer you to someone who can help. We&rsquo;re also the place to drop off forms or documents related to exam requests." />
    <meta property="og:image" content="/content/concordia/en/offices/birks/final-exams.img.png/1375304565728.png" />

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

                </li>
                <li>
                    <a href="#" title="LinkedIn" class="st_linkedin_custom">
                        <span class="sprites-icon-social-5" displayText="LinkedIn" st_image='http://www.concordia.ca/content/concordia/en/offices/birks/final-exams.img.png/1375304565728.png'>LinkedIn</span>
                    </a>
                </li>
            </ul>   
        </div>

        <script type="text/javascript">
            jQuery(function() {  
                $ = jQuery;
                socialbar.init();
                jQuery(window).scroll(function(){
                    socialbar.scroll();
                });
    
            });
        </script></div>


            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Final exam conflicts &amp; special requests</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2>Resolve an issue related to a final exam</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Have an issue regarding your final exam? Birks staff will help assess your problem and refer you to someone who can help. Weâre also the place to drop off forms or documents related to exam requests.</p>
<p>First, check the list below. Once you identify the your situation, follow the link and read the essential information on the <a adhocenable="false" href="/students/exams.html">Exams section</a> of the Concordia website. Your next steps are to:</p>
<ul>
<li>Download and print out the <a adhocenable="false" href="/students/exams/examination-office-request-forms.html">appropriate form</a>&nbsp;or pick it&nbsp;up at Birks.</li>
<li><b>Complete the form, and bring it to Birks, along with any supporting documentation.</b></li>
<li>If we canât help you, we will put you in touch with someone who can<br>
&nbsp;</li>
</ul>

</div></div>
<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2 class="section-header ">Possible situations</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<ul>
<li>I have&nbsp;<a href="/students/exams/conflicts.html" adhocenable="false">multiple exams scheduled at the same time.</a>&nbsp;</li>
<li>I was&nbsp;<a href="/students/exams/accommodations/def-note.html" adhocenable="false">not able to write my final exam.</a>&nbsp;</li>
<li><a href="/students/exams/accommodations/med-note.html" adhocenable="false">I was sick for several weeks during the past term</a>&nbsp;and I was not able to write my final exam.</li>
<li><a href="/students/exams/accommodations/supplemental.html" adhocenable="false">I failed my final exam and my course, is there anything I can do?</a>&nbsp;</li>
<li><a href="/students/exams/external-exams.html" adhocenable="false">I would like to request that I write my exam at another institution because I unexpectedly cannot be in Montreal.</a>&nbsp;</li>
<li><a href="http://supportservices.concordia.ca/disabilities/" adhocenable="false">I have a disability and may need exam accommodation.<br>
<br>
</a></li>
</ul>

</div></div>
<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2 class="section-header ">Fee</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>A <b>fee of $25</b> will be charged for all final examination requests</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">


<div class="parbase secondary-navigation section">







<div class="c-sidebar-menu c-secondary-navigation" id="secondary_navigation">

<ul style='display:block;'><li class='open'><a class='' href='/offices/birks.html'>Birks</a><div class='arrow '><i></i></div><ul style='display:block;'><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/birks/student-id.html'>Student ID cards</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/birks/opus-transit-card.html'>Reduced-fare public transit cards</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/birks/transcripts.html'>Transcript requests</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/birks/financial-aid.html'>Financial aid & awards services</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/birks/attestation.html'>Official letters and forms</a></li><li class='open'><a class='active' href='/offices/birks/final-exams.html'>Final exam conflicts & special requests</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/birks/tuition-and-fees.html'>Tuition and fees</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/birks/certify-diploma.html'>Certification of diploma</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/birks/identity-documents.html'>Studying in QuÃ©bec</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/birks/welcome-centre.html'>Welcome Centre</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/birks/personalized-timetable.html'>Personalized class schedule</a></li></ul></li></ul>
</div>
<script type="text/javascript">
jQuery(function() {
    $ = jQuery;
    $("#secondary_navigation.c-secondary-navigation .arrow").click(function(e) {
        e.preventDefault();
        var $this = $(this);
        $this.toggleClass('open');
        $this.parent().children('ul').slideToggle('fast');
    });
});
</script></div>


</div>

        </div>

    </div>

					            <a tabindex="-1" href="/students/academic-resources/exams-redirect.html">Exams</a>
				            </li>

				            </li>
                    </ul> 
	            </li>

            	
            	<li class="dropdown ">
					
                    <a href="/students/financial-support.html" role="button" class="dropdown-toggle" data-toggle="">Financial matters</a>
                    <ul class="dropdown-menu">
                    		<li class="">

	</div>
</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>
