            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<H1>Studying in Quebec</H1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2>Quebec regulations that affect tuition</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>All Concordia students, and all university students in Quebec, must register at least once with the&nbsp;<a href="http://www.mesrst.gouv.qc.ca/">MinistÃ¨re de l'Enseignement supÃ©rieur, de la Recherche, de la Science et de la Technologie</a>&nbsp;(MESRST). We can help you with the following tasks, because they affect the tuition you will pay at Concordia:&nbsp;</p>
<ul>
<li><b>Register or obtain a permanent code: </b>all Concordia students must have one, given to them by the MESRST.&nbsp;</li>
<li><b>Qualify for Quebec tuition rates</b>: Only certain students pay Quebec tuition rates. Your qualifcation for this depends on you satisfying MESRST guidelines. &nbsp;</li>
</ul>
<p>It's important that you read these sections and follow the guidelines provided so you can benefit from one, or both, of these conditions for studying in Quebec.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">

</div></div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Permanent code requirement">
					
                    Permanent code requirement
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><b style="font-size: 12px;">Every student studying at a Quebec University</b><span style="font-size: 12px;">&nbsp;must have a permanent code or <i>code permanent.&nbsp;</i></span>This code is assigned by the Ministry. Concordia needs you to have a permanent code. Without one, you will pay an extra differential tuition fee.</p>
<ul>
<li><a href="/admissions/tuition-fees/permanent-code.html">Learn more about your permanent code<br>
&nbsp;</a></li>
</ul>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Quebec Resident Tuition Status">
					
                    Quebec Resident Tuition Status
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_0" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><span style="font-size: 12px;">International students, Canadian Citizens and Permanent Residents in Undergraduate and Graduate programs at Concordia pay higher tuition fees than Quebec residents. </span></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 12px;">To pay <b>Quebec resident tuition fees</b>, you must qualify as a Quebec resident under MESRST definitions.&nbsp;</span></p>
<ul>
<li><a href="/admissions/tuition-fees/quebec-residency.html">Learn how to qualify and register for Quebec resident tuition status</a></li>
</ul>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open French Program Fee Exemption">
					
                    French Program Fee Exemption
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_1" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><span style="font-size: 12px;">If you do not qualify for Quebec Resident Tuition Status (as outlined above), you normally have to pay additional tuition fees. However, <b>if you register in approved French programs or courses, these fees maybe waived.</b></span></p>
<ul>
<li><a href="/admissions/tuition-fees/french-program-exemptions.html">Learn about French program fee exemptions</a></li>
</ul>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open International Fee Exemptions">
					
                    International Fee Exemptions
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_2" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><span style="font-size: 12px;">Some international students qualify for Quebec tuition fee rates under MESRST rgulations. See if you qualify.</span></p>
<ul>
<li><a href="/admissions/tuition-fees/international-fee-exemptions.html">Learn more about International fee exemptions</a></li>
</ul>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">


<div class="parbase textimage section">



<div class="image " id="cq-textimage-jsp-/content/concordia/en/students/records/jcr:content/sidebar/textimage" style="width:auto;"><img title="related-office-63x50" alt="related-office-63x50" class="cq-dd-image" src="/students/records/_jcr_content/sidebar/textimage/image.img.png/1383929140531.png"></div>
        
<script type="text/javascript">

        var imageEvars = '{ imageLink: "/", imageAsset: "/content/dam/common/icons/63x50/related-office-63x50.png", imageTitle: "related\x2Doffice\x2D63x50" }';
        var tagNodes = imageDiv.getElementsByTagName('A');
        for (var i = 0; i < tagNodes.length; i++) {
            var link = tagNodes.item(i); 
            link.setAttribute('onclick', 'CQ_Analytics.record({event: "imageClick", values: ' + imageEvars + ', collect:  false, options: { obj: this }, componentPath: "concordia/components/textimage"})');
        }
        
    })();
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Quebec resident tuition status</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2>Apply and qualify as a Quebec resident</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><br>
Quebec residents <b>pay a lower tuition rate</b> at Quebec Universities than other Canadian or international students. To pay Quebec resident tuition rates, first you must <b>apply for Quebec resident tuition status</b>. If you do not do this, you will pay higher tuition rates. &nbsp;<br>
&nbsp;</p>
<h3>Apply for Quebec resident tuition status now</h3>
<p>You can apply for Quebec Resident status through the <b>MyConcordia</b> portal. In the portal you will find the <i>Quebec Residency Application</i> form under the Student Services tab.</p>
<ul>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="https://www.myconcordia.ca/">Apply now for Quebec Resident status</a></li>
</ul>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h3>Qualify for Quebec resident tuition status</h3>
<p>Find out if you are eligible to pay Quebec Resident tuition in three steps:</p>
<ol>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="/admissions/tuition-fees/quebec-residency/status.html">Prove your legal status in Canada</a>: are you a Canadian citizen or a Permanent Resident of Canada?</li>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="/admissions/tuition-fees/quebec-residency/situations.html">Choose a Quebec resident situations</a>. Submit the necessary documents before the end of the term.</li>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="/admissions/tuition-fees/quebec-residency/guidelines.html">Check deadlines and guidelines</a> before you complete the Quebec residency application.</li>
</ol>
<p>You can also read about your <a adhocenable="false" href="http://www.mesrst.gouv.qc.ca/universites/etudiants-a-luniversite/admission-a-luniversite/statut-de-resident-du-quebec/" target="_blank">eligibility on the Quebec government's website</a> (<b>in French</b>).</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">


<div class="parbase secondary-navigation section">

        e.preventDefault();
        var $this = $(this);
        $this.toggleClass('open');

            	<li class="dropdown ">
					
                    <a href="/students/financial-support.html" role="button" class="dropdown-toggle" data-toggle="">Financial matters</a>
                    <ul class="dropdown-menu">
                    		<li class="">
					            <a tabindex="-1" href="/students/financial-support/costs-budgeting-redirect.html">Costs &amp; budgeting</a>
				            </li>
                    		<li class="">
					            <a tabindex="-1" href="/students/financial-support/government-loans.html">Government student aid</a>
				            </li>
                    		<li class="">
					            <a tabindex="-1" href="/students/financial-support/bursaries.html">Bursaries</a>
				            </li>

					            <a tabindex="-1" href="/students/financial-support/work-study.html">Work-study program</a>
				            </li>

				            </li>
                    		<li class="">
					            <a tabindex="-1" href="/students/financial-support/graduate-funding.html">Graduate awards</a>
				            </li>
                    </ul> 
	            </li>

            	
            	<li class="dropdown ">
					
						<a href="/students/campus-services.html" role="button">Campus services</a>
	            </li>

            	
            	<li class="dropdown ">
					
						<a href="/students/beyond-the-classroom.html" role="button">Beyond the classroom</a>
	            </li>
        </ul>
	</div>
</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

    
    <div class="container">

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Transcripts</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>The <b>Transcripts Department</b> is a unit of the Registrarâs Office at Concordia University that manages official transcripts and related documents for current and past Concordia students.</p>
<p>We will provide official records to you, or other universities and institutions, quickly and efficiently.</p>
<p>Please contact us for any questions you may have.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2 class="section-header ">Official transcripts</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>An official transcript is a complete academic record bearing the University seal and signature of the Registrar. An official transcript includes all courses followed at Concordia (with the exception of courses taken at the Centre for Continuing Education). The official transcript is issued in its entirety.</p>
<p>Students and alumni may request to receive their undergraduate transcript, their graduate transcript or their combined undergraduate and graduate transcript.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase button section">








<a style="margin-bottom:10px;" class="btn  " href="/students/records/transcripts/request-official-transcripts.html" target="_self">Request your official transcript</a>

</div>
<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2 class="section-header ">Other academic records</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>The transcripts department can also provide you with <b>Undergraduate Course Descriptions</b><b>.</b></p>
<p>Although we often receive requests for documents related to academic programs at Concordia, we cannot always provide them â but we will always direct you to someone who can help.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase button section">








<a style="margin-bottom:10px;" class="btn  " href="/students/records/transcripts/other-records.html" target="_self">Learn more about academic records</a>

</div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">


<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2 class="section-header ">How to reach us</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><b>By Telephone:</b> (514) 848-2424, ext. 2630</p>
<p><b>By Email</b>: <a href="mailto:transcripts@concordia.ca">transcripts@concordia.ca</a><u></u></p>
<p><b>By Fax:</b> (514) 848-2616</p>
<p><b>In person inquiries:</b><br>
<a adhocenable="false" href="/students/birks.html">Birks Student Service Centre</a><br>
Room LB-185<br>
1400 De Maisonneuve W.<br>
Montreal, Quebec</p>
<p><b>By mail:</b><br>
Concordia University<br>
Transcripts Department, LB-702<br>
1455 De Maisonneuve Blvd. West<br>
Montreal, Quebec H3G 1M8</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>

        </div>

    </div>
    
</section>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<div class="page-header parbase section"> 






<div class="c-intro row">
    <h1 class="span8 section-header">Exams</h1>

    
    <div class="span8">
        <p>Examinations are an important part of university life. Review this section carefully and you'll successfully navigate your way through this academic rite of passage.</p>

    </div>
	<div class="span4">
                        <a class="btn btn-block btn-large bg-light-grey" href="/students/exams/important-dates.html">
                    
                    Dates you need to know
                    </a>
                        <a class="btn btn-block btn-large bg-light-grey" href="/offices/registrar.html">
                    
                    Contact us
                    </a></div>
</div></div>
<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h4>Writing your exams</h4>
</div></div>
<div class="parsys_column row-fluid cq-colctrl-lt3"><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt3-c0 span4"><div class="parbase button section">

    <hr>
</div>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">

<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2 class="section-header ">Did you know...</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<div style="padding: 10px 0px; line-height: 36px; font-size: 36px; font-family: GillSansMTPro; font-weight: bold; color: rgb(137, 137, 137); text-align: left;">1,200 exams</div>
<div style="padding: 10px 0px; line-height: 30px; font-size: 30px; font-family: GillSansMTProLight; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); text-align: left;">scheduled for each fall and winter term</div>

</div></div>
</div><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt0-c1 span6"><div class="title section">

    <div class="modal-body">
        <p>Thanks for your time. Please select your area of feedback.</p>
        <ul>
            <li><a href="/web/feedback-forms/feedback-bad-link.html">I want to report a bad link</a></li>
            <li><a href="/web/feedback-forms/feedback-cant-find.html">I can't find something on the website</a></li>
            <li><a href="/web/feedback-forms/feedback-tell-us.html">I'd like to share my impressions of the site</a></li>
        </ul>
    </div>
</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
$=jQuery;
$(function() {
    var check = mobilecheck();
    if (!check) {
        $("#feedback-modal").attr("href", "#modal");
        $('a[rel*=leanModal]').leanModal({top: 200, closeButton: ".modal-close"});
    }
});
</script>
</div>


</footer>
    </div>

</body>
</html>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<section id="content-main">

    <div class="container">
    
        <div class="row with_socialbar">

            <div class="share-this">












	<script type="text/javascript">var switchTo5x=true;</script>
	<script type="text/javascript" src="http://w.sharethis.com/button/buttons.js"></script>
	<script type="text/javascript">

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Legal status in Canada</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2>Step one: prove your status in Canada</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>To be eligible to pay Quebec Resident tuition rates&nbsp;<b>you must prove that you are either a:&nbsp;</b></p>
<ul>
<li>Canadian citizen, or&nbsp;</li>
<li>Permanent Resident of Canada&nbsp;</li>
</ul>
<p>Depending on your status, you must submit the following documents:&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase table section">




<div class="concordia-table   horizontalLines table-striped">
    <table width="100%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="1" border="1">
<tbody><tr><th width="50%"><b>Legal status in Canada:</b></th>
<th><b>Required Document:</b></th>
</tr><tr><td width="50%"><p>1. You were born in Quebec</p>
</td>
<td valign="top"><p>Quebec Birth Certificate issued by the Quebec Directeur de l'Ã©tat civil with the mention &quot;Certified&quot; or &quot;certifiÃ© conforme&quot;</p>
</td>
</tr><tr><td width="50%"><p>2. You were born in Canada but not in Quebec</p>
</td>
<td valign="top"><p>Canadian Birth Certificate</p>
</td>
</tr><tr><td width="50%"><p>3. You are a Canadian citizen born outside Canada</p>
</td>
<td valign="top"><p>Certificate of Canadian Citizenship<br>
(both sides)</p>
</td>
</tr><tr><td width="50%">4. You are a Permanent Resident of Canada</td>
<td>Permanent Resident Card (both sides) or IMM-1000/5292/5668 form</td>
</tr></tbody></table>

</div></div>
<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2 class="section-header ">Step 2: Quebec residency situations</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><a adhocenable="false" href="/admissions/tuition-fees/quebec-residency/situations.html">Choose one of the 14 Quebec Residency situations</a> and submit the required documents.&nbsp;</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">


<div class="parbase secondary-navigation section">







<div class="c-sidebar-menu c-secondary-navigation" id="secondary_navigation">

<ul style='display:block;'><li class='open'><a class='active' href='/admissions/tuition-fees/quebec-residency/status.html'>Legal status in Canada</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/admissions/tuition-fees/quebec-residency/situations.html'>Quebec residency situations</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/admissions/tuition-fees/quebec-residency/guidelines.html'>Deadlines & guidelines</a></li></ul>
</div>
<script type="text/javascript">
jQuery(function() {
    $ = jQuery;
    $("#secondary_navigation.c-secondary-navigation .arrow").click(function(e) {
        e.preventDefault();
        var $this = $(this);
        $this.toggleClass('open');
        $this.parent().children('ul').slideToggle('fast');
    });
});
</script></div>


</div>

            </div>

        </div>

    </div>
    
</section>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Quebec residency situations</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2>Choose one of these 14 situations</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Identify which Quebec Residency situation applies to you then follow the instructions we have provided. Each situation gives you detailed instructions on which documents you must provide us. Collect the documents, then submit them in your application.&nbsp;</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>You may qualify to pay Quebec resident tuition if:</p>

</div></div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open 1. You were born in Quebec">
					
                    1. You were born in Quebec
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><b>Submit one of these documents:</b></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 12px;">A birth certificate (either the long or the short form) issued by the Directeur de lâÃ©tat civil du QuÃ©bec after January 1, 1994, with the notation </span><span style="font-size: 12px;">Â«</span><span style="font-size: 12px;">&nbsp;CertifiÃ© conforme </span><span style="font-size: 12px;">Â»</span><span style="font-size: 12px;"> or </span><span style="font-size: 12px;">Â«</span><span style="font-size: 12px;"> Certified </span><span style="font-size: 12px;">Â»</span><span style="font-size: 12px;"> showing that your actual place of birth was in Quebec.</span></p>
<p><b>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; OR</b></p>
<p>A birth certificate (the long form) issued by the Directeur de lâÃ©tat civil after January 1, 1994, with the notation Â«&nbsp;CertifiÃ© conforme Â» or Â«&nbsp;Certified&nbsp;Â» even if the student's actual place of birth was outside Quebec.</p>
<p><b>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; OR</b></p>
<p>A Canadian passport if Quebec is indicated as place of birth and if you already have a Quebec Permanent Code. If you do not have a Quebec Permanent Code then you MUST submit a Quebec Birth Certificate.</p>
<p><b>Order a Quebec Birth Certificate</b></p>
<p>If you were born in Quebec you can order a Quebec Birth Certificate from the <a href="http://www.etatcivil.gouv.qc.ca/en/default.html">Directeur de l'Ã©tat civil du QuÃ©bec</a>.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><b>Unfortunately, these documents will not be accepted:&nbsp;</b></p>
<ul>
<li>Birth Certificates with the notation Â« CertifiÃ© conforme Ã  l'article 137 Â»</li>
<li>Baptismal Certificates</li>
<li>Quebec Birth Certificates issued by a municipality, a court, a religious institution or a hospital.</li>
</ul>
<p>&nbsp;</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open 2. You had Quebec Resident status at CEGEP no more than a year ago">
					
                    2. You had Quebec Resident status at CEGEP no more than a year ago
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_0" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Submit this:&nbsp;</p>
<ul>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="/admissions/tuition-fees/permanent-code.html">Your Quebec Permanent Code</a></li>
</ul>
<p>We will attempt to retrieve your Quebec Resident status from your <b>electronic CEGEP file</b> but if you left CEGEP more than a year ago then you should select a different Quebec Resident situation.</p>
<p>If there is no Quebec Residency information in your electronic CEGEP file then you should select a different Quebec Resident situation.</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open 3. You had Quebec Resident status at another Quebec university no more than a year ago">
					
                    3. You had Quebec Resident status at another Quebec university no more than a year ago
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_1" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Submit this: </p>
<ul>
<li>Your Quebec permanent code</li>
</ul>
<p>We will attempt to retrieve your Quebec Resident status <b>electronically from the Quebec Ministry of Higher Education</b> but if your past University studies were more than a year ago then you should select a different Quebec Resident situation.</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open 4. You immigrated to Canada and have a CSQ">
					
                    4. You immigrated to Canada and have a CSQ
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_3" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Submit one of these documents:</p>
<ul>
<li>A copy of your CSQ.&nbsp;</li>
<li>A copy of an official letter from the MinistÃ¨re des Relations avec les Citoyens et de l'Immigration du Quebec attesting that a CSQ has been issued to you.</li>
<li>A copy of your IMM-1000, IMM- 5292 or IMM- 5668(the landing paper for permanent residents) with a CSQ number appearing.</li>
</ul>
<p>&nbsp;</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open 5. One of your parents lives in Quebec">
					
                    5. One of your parents lives in Quebec
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_4" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>You may fit into one of these two scenarios:</p>
<p><b>One of your parents lives in Quebec</b></p>
<p>Submit these documents:</p>
<ul>
<li>Long form birth certificate showing your name and the names of your parent(s)</li>
<li>Your parentâs valid Quebec Medicare card.</li>
</ul>
<p>Or, this related situation is also valid:&nbsp;</p>
<p><b>The person who sponsored you to immigrate to Canada lives in Quebec.</b></p>
<p>Submit these documents:</p>
<ul>
<li>Your IMM 1000 or IMM 5292 Or IMM 5668 form showing the name of your sponsor.</li>
<li>Your sponsorâs valid Quebec Medicare card.</li>
</ul>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open 6. You lived in Quebec before the start of this semester for a full year and during the <br>past 18 months and you have not been a full-time student.">
					
                    6. You lived in Quebec before the start of this semester for a full year and during the <br>past 18 months and you have not been a full-time student.
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_2" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>If you have held a <b>valid Quebec Medicare for more than a year</b>, submit these documents:</p>
<ul>
<li>Your Quebec Permanent Code</li>
<li>A sworn statement that you were not a full time student for an entire year during the 18 months prior to this semester. &nbsp;<ul>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="/content/dam/concordia/offices/registrar/docs/quebec-residency/SwornStatement21.pdf" target="_blank">Print out a PDF version of this sworn statement</a></li>
<li>Complete it</li>
<li>Have it witnessed by a commissioner of oaths at the Birks Student Services Centre.&nbsp;</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>Your valid Quebec Medicare card that you have held for at least a year. We will have to verify the codes on the card to establish 12 months residence in Quebec.&nbsp;</li>
</ul>
<p><a adhocenable="false" href="/admissions/tuition-fees/quebec-residency/situations/situation-6-rentingowningorsharingresidences.html">Read these guidelines on how to prove your residency</a>&nbsp;if you have<b>&nbsp;<u>not</u>&nbsp;held a valid Quebec Medicare</b>&nbsp;for at least a year.</p>
<p><b>What is a full-time student?</b></p>
<p><a adhocenable="false" href="/admissions/tuition-fees/quebec-residency/guidelines.html">Read our guidelines to confirm your full-time or part-time</a> student status.</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open 7. You receive Quebec Financial Aid (AFE) for Students.">
					
                    7. You receive Quebec Financial Aid (AFE) for Students.
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_5" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Submit these documents:</p>
<ul>
<li>A copy of the Financial Aid letter or Certificate of Guarantee confirming that you are receiving financial aid for the current academic year.</li>
<li>If you received Financial Aid for a previous academic year, please submit that Financial Aid letter or Certificate of Guarantee, as well as transcripts showing that you were continuously registered at a Quebec educational institution since then.</li>
</ul>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open 8. You immigrated to Canada, have lived in Quebec for at least three months and have <br>not lived in another Canadian province of territory for more than three months.">
					
                    8. You immigrated to Canada, have lived in Quebec for at least three months and have <br>not lived in another Canadian province of territory for more than three months.
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_6" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>This situation can be applied in three different ways:</p>
<ol>
<li>You immigrated to Canada, established your residence in Quebec and stayed here.</li>
<li>You immigrated to Canada to get Permanent Resident status. Then you left Canada for a while and returned later to establish your residence in Quebec.</li>
<li>You obtained Canadian citizenship at birth because one of your parents was a Canadian citizen and you have not lived in another Canadian province or territory for more than three months before coming to Concordia. &nbsp;You have come to live in Canada for the first time in your life.</li>
</ol>
<p><a adhocenable="false" href="/admissions/tuition-fees/quebec-residency/situations/situation-8-immigratingtocanada.html">Read more about how to satisfy any of these three situations.</a></p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open 9. Your legal spouse qualifies as a Quebec Resident">
					
                    9. Your legal spouse qualifies as a Quebec Resident
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_7" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>You may fall into one of these two categories for this situation:</p>
<p><b>Your legal spouse qualifies as a Quebec Resident</b></p>
<p>Submit these documents:</p>
<ul>
<li>A clear copy of your marriage or civil union certificate</li>
<li>Proof that your spouse is a Quebec Resident according to one of the other situations.</li>
</ul>
<p>or, this situation is valid as well:</p>
<p><b>Your common-law spouse, with whom you have a child, qualifies as a Quebec Resident</b></p>
<p>Submit these documents:</p>
<ul>
<li>A sworn statement as proof of a common law relationship</li>
<li>A clear copy of the studentâs or spouseâs childâs birth certificate that states the names of both parents of the child</li>
<li>Proof that your spouse is a Quebec Resident according to one of the other situations.</li>
</ul>
<p>&nbsp;</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open 10. You belong to a First Nations group in Quebec.">
					
                    10. You belong to a First Nations group in Quebec.
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_8" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Submit these documents:</p>
<p><b>If you are a First Nations member and your band is located in Quebec.</b></p>
<ul>
<li>A clear copy of both sides of your valid Federal Certificate of Indian Status, OR your valid Makivik Society Card.</li>
<li>A Letter signed by your band council on band letter-head and attesting that you currently reside on the reserve which is in the QuÃ©bec territory.</li>
</ul>
<p><b>If you are a member of the Cree Grand Council (James Bay Treaty beneficiary)&nbsp;</b></p>
<ul>
<li>A clear copy of both sides of your valid Cree Grand Council Card showing your beneficiary number.</li>
</ul>
<p><b>If you are Inuit</b></p>
<ul>
<li>A clear copy of both sides of your valid Makivik Society Card.</li>
<li>A letter from the Makivik Society confirming your residence in Quebec. You may obtain this card by contacting:</li>
</ul>
<p style="margin-left: 40px;">Mme Kaudjak Padlayat<br>
SociÃ©tÃ© Makivik,<br>
C.P. 179, Kuujjuaq<br>
QuÃ©bec<br>
J0M 1C0<br>
Tel: (819) 964-2925</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open 11. You lived in Quebec with your parents. They left Quebec but you have remained here<br> ever since they left.">
					
                    11. You lived in Quebec with your parents. They left Quebec but you have remained here<br> ever since they left.
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_9" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Submit these documents:</p>
<ul>
<li>Long form birth certificate showing your name and the names of your parent(s)&nbsp;</li>
<li>Your parentâs expired Quebec Medicare card.</li>
<li>A copy of the rental agreement or property taxes where your parents last lived in Quebec in the year prior to departing.</li>
<li>Two different pieces of official correspondence addressed to your parents, proving the receipt of mail during the 12-months at the address indicated on the lease. &nbsp;These documents are acceptable:<ul>
<li>public service invoices</li>
<li>driverâs license</li>
<li>official correspondence from a municipal, provincial or federal government</li>
<li>official correspondence from a financial institution</li>
<li>correspondence from an educational institution</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>A clear copy of your parentsâ airline/train/bus tickets and passport stamps indicating the date when your parents left Quebec.</li>
<li>A complete signed legible copy of your lease(s) covering the all the time since your parents left Quebec.</li>
<li>Two different pieces of official correspondence addressed to you, proving the receipt of mail during the time since your parents left Quebec. &nbsp;These documents are acceptable:<ul>
<li>public service invoices</li>
<li>driverâs license</li>
<li>official correspondence from a municipal, provincial or federal government</li>
<li>official correspondence from a financial institution</li>
<li>correspondence from an educational institution</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<p><i>If you lived at more than one address during this time period then you must submit a copy of each lease and one item of correspondence mailed to each address.</i></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open 12. You were adopted by a Quebec Resident.">
					
                    12. You were adopted by a Quebec Resident.
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_10" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Submit these documents:</p>
<ul>
<li>A clear copy of your adoption order issued by a Quebec court.</li>
</ul>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open 13. Both your parents have died and one of them lived in Quebec at the time of his or her death.">
					
                    13. Both your parents have died and one of them lived in Quebec at the time of his or her death.
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_11" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Submit these documents:</p>
<ul>
<li>A clear copy of your long form Birth Certificate</li>
<li>A clear copy of your motherâs death certificate</li>
<li>A clear copy of your fatherâs death certificate</li>
</ul>
<p><i>At least one of the death certificates was issued by the Quebec Directeur de l'Ã©tat civil.</i></p>
<p>Or, this scenario also applies:&nbsp;</p>
<p><b>The person who sponsored you to immigrate to Canada has died. He or she lived in Quebec at the time of his or her death</b></p>
<p>Submit these documents:</p>
<ul>
<li>A copy of your immigration landing paper (IMM-1000, IMM 5292 or IMM5668) naming your immigration sponsor</li>
<li>A clear copy of your sponsorâs &nbsp;death certificate which was issued by the Quebec Directeur de l'Ã©tat civil</li>
</ul>
<p>&nbsp;</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open 14. You have Quebec Resident status at CEGEP or University in the past five years <br> and have lived in Quebec for three out of the past five years.">
					
                    14. You have Quebec Resident status at CEGEP or University in the past five years <br> and have lived in Quebec for three out of the past five years.
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_12" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Submit these:</p>
<ul>
<li>Your Quebec Permanent Code.</li>
<li>A clear copy of your valid Quebec Medicare Card that establishes proof of dwelling in Quebec for thirty-six consecutive months during the last five years. We will have to authenticate your card according to MESRST guidelines to establish 36 months residence in Quebec.</li>
</ul>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2 class="section-header ">Proving Quebec residency tuition status: next step</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<ul>
<li><b>Step 3:</b>&nbsp;<a href="/admissions/tuition-fees/quebec-residency/guidelines.html">Check deadlines and guidelines</a>&nbsp;before you complete the Quebec residency application.</li>
</ul>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">

    });

</div>

            </div>

        </div>

    </div>

<div class="c-quicklinks" >

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Important dates</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2>Keep track of these dates and avoid unneccesary exam stress</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="section tabs">










    <script type="text/javascript">
	$ = jQuery;
	$(document).ready(function() {
	    $('#tabs a:first').tab('show');
	    var hash = window.location.hash;
	    if (hash == undefined || hash == ""){
	      var previouslyActive = getCookie("concordia-component-tab-active-tab");
          if (previouslyActive != undefined) hash = previouslyActive;
	    }
	    hash && $('ul.nav a[href="' + hash + '"]').tab('show');

	    $('.nav-tabs a').click(function (e) {
	        $(this).tab('show');
	        var scrollmem = $('body').scrollTop();
	        window.location.hash = this.hash;
	        $('html,body').scrollTop(scrollmem);
	        setCookie("concordia-component-tab-active-tab", this.hash, 1);
	    });
	});
        /** COOKIE GETTER AND SETTER FUNCTIONS **/
    function setCookie(c_name,value,exdays){
        var exdate=new Date();
        exdate.setDate(exdate.getDate() + exdays);
        var c_value=escape(value) + ((exdays==null) ? "" : "; expires="+exdate.toUTCString());
        document.cookie=c_name + "=" + c_value;
    }
    function getCookie(c_name){
      var c_value=document.cookie;
      var c_start=c_value.indexOf(" " + c_name + "=");
      if (c_start == -1)	{
        c_start=c_value.indexOf(c_name + "=");
      }
      if (c_start == -1){
        c_value=null;
      } else {
        c_start=c_value.indexOf("=", c_start) + 1;
        var c_end=c_value.indexOf(";", c_start);
        if (c_end == -1){
          c_end=c_value.length;
        }
        c_value=unescape(c_value.substring(c_start,c_end));
      }
      return c_value;
    }
	</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
jQuery(function() {
    $ = jQuery;
    $("#secondary_navigation.c-secondary-navigation .arrow").click(function(e) {
        e.preventDefault();
        var $this = $(this);
        $this.toggleClass('open');
        $this.parent().children('ul').slideToggle('fast');
    });
});
</script></div>

<div class="image " id="cq-textimage-jsp-/content/concordia/en/students/exams/schedule/jcr:content/sidebar/box/box-parsys/textimage" style="width:auto;"><img title="related-office" alt="related-office" class="cq-dd-image" src="/students/exams/schedule/_jcr_content/sidebar/box/box-parsys/textimage/image.img.png/1384709434257.png"></div>
        
<script type="text/javascript">
    (function() {
        var imageDiv = document.getElementById("cq-textimage-jsp-/content/concordia/en/students/exams/schedule/jcr:content/sidebar/box/box-parsys/textimage");
        var imageEvars = '{ imageLink: "/", imageAsset: "/content/dam/common/icons/125x100/related-office.png", imageTitle: "related\x2Doffice" }';
        var tagNodes = imageDiv.getElementsByTagName('A');
        for (var i = 0; i < tagNodes.length; i++) {
            var link = tagNodes.item(i); 
            link.setAttribute('onclick', 'CQ_Analytics.record({event: "imageClick", values: ' + imageEvars + ', collect:  false, options: { obj: this }, componentPath: "concordia/components/textimage"})');
        }
        
    })();
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<H1>French study fee exemptions</H1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>If you register in an<b> approved French program or course</b>,<b>&nbsp;</b>you may find your <b>tuition rates lowered</b>. This fee reduction is an encouragement for all out-of-province and international students to take advantage of Montreal's bilingual identity, to perfect your French, and to study Quebec and francophone culture.</p>
<p>Find out how you can take advantage of this <b>benefit of studying in Quebec</b>!<br>
&nbsp;</p>

</div></div>
<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2 class="section-header ">French program fee exemptions</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h3>For international students</h3>
<p>If you are an international students registered in a French Program, you will be exempt from international differential fees for approved French courses taken as part of your program, however all non-French courses will be subject to international differential fees.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h3>For Canadian citizens, Permanent Residents or First Nations</h3>
<p style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px;">If you plan to study in one of the following French programs, here's what you must do to become<b>&nbsp;exempt from non-Quebec Resident differential fees </b>for all your courses:&nbsp;</p>
<ul style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px;">
<li>Register in one of the following programs&nbsp;</li>
<li>Meet the conditions described below</li>
<li>We adjust your fees after the deadline to drop courses with a refund</li>
</ul>
<p style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px;"><b>Note: </b>We evaluate your file each session. &nbsp;</p>
<p style="font-family: tahoma, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 12px;">Any of the following programs might entitle you to some form of tuition fee reduction:</p>

</div></div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Majeure en Ã©tudes franÃ§aises - Option Langue ou littÃ©ratures de langue franÃ§aise">
					
                    Majeure en Ã©tudes franÃ§aises - Option Langue ou littÃ©ratures de langue franÃ§aise
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<ul>
<li>You must be registered in at least 12 credits in the session.</li>
<li>You must have 90 or fewer credits remaining to complete in your program.</li>
<li>You must be registered in French courses each session:<ul>
<li>Fall session: at least&nbsp;<b>6 French credits</b></li>
<li>Winter session: at least&nbsp;<b>6 French credits</b>&nbsp;</li>
<li>Fall and Winter sessions combined: at least&nbsp;<b>12 French credits</b>&nbsp;</li>
<li>Summer session: at least&nbsp;<b>3 French credits</b></li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open SpÃ©cialisation : Ã©tudes franÃ§aises">
					
                    SpÃ©cialisation : Ã©tudes franÃ§aises
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_1" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<ul>
<li>You must be registered in at least 12 credits in the session.</li>
<li>You must have 90 or fewer credits remaining to complete in your program.</li>
<li>You must be registered in French courses:<ul>
<li>Fall session: at least&nbsp;<b>6 French credits</b></li>
<li>Winter session:<b>&nbsp;6 French credits&nbsp;</b></li>
<li>Fall and Winter sessions: at least<b>&nbsp;12 French credits</b></li>
<li>Summer session: at least<b>&nbsp;3 French credits&nbsp;</b></li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<h3>&nbsp;</h3>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open MaÃ®trise en littÃ©rature francophone et rÃ©sonances mÃ©diatiques">
					
                    MaÃ®trise en littÃ©rature francophone et rÃ©sonances mÃ©diatiques
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_0" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<ul>
<li>You must be registered as a full time student in this program in order to benefit from the exemption from non-Quebec Resident tuition.</li>
</ul>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2 class="section-header ">French course fee exemptions</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h3>For international students</h3>
<p>If you are registered in a&nbsp;Bachelors, Masters or PhD program in a given session,<b> </b>then you will be charged:</p>
<ul>
<li><b>Quebec tuition rates for any French course</b>&nbsp;you take, and&nbsp;</li>
<li>International rates for all your other courses.</li>
</ul>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h3>For Canadians, Permanent Residents or First Nations</h3>
<p>If you do not have Quebec Resident status, but you take a French language or literature course, then <b>you will be charged:</b></p>
<ul>
<li><b>Quebec tuition rates for that course</b>.&nbsp;</li>
<li>All other courses will be charged at the non-Quebec resident rate.</li>
</ul>
<p>&nbsp;</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">


<div class="parbase secondary-navigation section">

        var $this = $(this);

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<H1>Exam schedule</H1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2>Consult your tentative and final exam schedules</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>We create two examination schedules, a tentative and final, for students and faculty to consult. Read this page to learn how and when to find out about your exam schedule and what to do in case of a <b>conflict.</b></p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><i>Be sure to review all the university regulations concerning examinations in <a adhocenable="false" href="/academics/undergraduate/calendar/current/sec16/16.html#b16.3.10">Section 16.3.10</a> in the undergraduate calendar.</i></p>

</div></div>
<div class="section tabs">










    <script type="text/javascript">
	$ = jQuery;
	$(document).ready(function() {
	    $('#tabs a:first').tab('show');
	    var hash = window.location.hash;
	    if (hash == undefined || hash == ""){
	      var previouslyActive = getCookie("concordia-component-tab-active-tab");
          if (previouslyActive != undefined) hash = previouslyActive;
	    }
	    hash && $('ul.nav a[href="' + hash + '"]').tab('show');

	    $('.nav-tabs a').click(function (e) {
	        $(this).tab('show');
	        var scrollmem = $('body').scrollTop();
	        window.location.hash = this.hash;
	        $('html,body').scrollTop(scrollmem);
	        setCookie("concordia-component-tab-active-tab", this.hash, 1);
	    });
	});
        /** COOKIE GETTER AND SETTER FUNCTIONS **/
    function setCookie(c_name,value,exdays){
        var exdate=new Date();
        exdate.setDate(exdate.getDate() + exdays);
        var c_value=escape(value) + ((exdays==null) ? "" : "; expires="+exdate.toUTCString());
        document.cookie=c_name + "=" + c_value;
    }
    function getCookie(c_name){
      var c_value=document.cookie;
      var c_start=c_value.indexOf(" " + c_name + "=");
      if (c_start == -1)	{
        c_start=c_value.indexOf(c_name + "=");
      }
      if (c_start == -1){
        c_value=null;
      } else {
        c_start=c_value.indexOf("=", c_start) + 1;
        var c_end=c_value.indexOf(";", c_start);
        if (c_end == -1){
          c_end=c_value.length;
        }
        c_value=unescape(c_value.substring(c_start,c_end));
      }
      return c_value;
    }
	</script>
	
	<div class="c-tabs">
    
	    <ul class="nav nav-tabs" id="tabs">
	        
		          <li><a href="#tentative" data-toggle="tab">Tentative exam schedule</a></li>
		        
	        
		          <li><a href="#final" data-toggle="tab">Final exam schedule</a></li>
		        
	        
	    </ul>
	    <div class="tab-content">
	        <div class="tab-pane" id="tentative">
	           
	           <div class="parsys parsys-tabs-0">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h3><br>
Fall and winter terms only</h3>
<p>Each fall and winter semester we receive information about final exams from the academic departments of each Faculty and School. We use this information to prepare a tentative exam schedule. The tentative schedule gives you an idea of what your exam schedule may be like and helps you set your study priorities.</p>
<p>The tentative schedule is just exactly that â tentative. We do make changes before issuing the final examination schedule. You <b>should not</b> make travel or employment arrangements based on your tentative exam schedule.</p>
<p><i>It is your responsibility to be available for the entire examination period!</i> The range of&nbsp;<a href="/students/registration/term-dates-deadlines.html" adhocenable="false">Final Exam Dates</a>&nbsp;is available online a year in advance. We cannot make special arrangements for examinations that may conflict with travel or employment plans.</p>
<p>You must understand that it is your responsibility to be available during the entire exam period.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h3><br>
When to check your tentative exam schedule</h3>
<p>We issue the tentative exam schedule as follows:</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase table section">




<div class="concordia-table   horizontalLines verticalLines table-striped">
    <table width="100%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="1" border="1">
<tbody><tr><td width="33" valign="top"><p><b>Tentative exam schedule posting</b></p>
</td>
<td width="33" valign="top"><p><b>Exam period</b></p>
</td>
</tr><tr><td width="33" valign="top"><p>Mid-October</p>
</td>
<td width="33" valign="top"><p>December</p>
</td>
</tr><tr><td width="33" valign="top"><p>Mid-February</p>
</td>
<td width="33" valign="top"><p>April</p>
</td>
</tr><tr><td colspan="2" width="33" valign="top">We do not publish a tentative schedule for the two summer sessions.</td>
</tr></tbody></table>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h3><br>
Where to find your tentative exam schedule</h3>
<p>You can review the tentative exam schedule in a print or digital format:</p>
<ul>
<li>Consult the <b>paper copy</b> posted in:<ul>
<li>The Mezzanine of the&nbsp;<a href="/maps/buildings/h.html" title="Henry F. Hall Building: 1455 de Maisonneuve Blvd. W." adhocenable="false">Hall Building</a>&nbsp;(SGW)</li>
<li>The second floor of the&nbsp;<a href="/maps/buildings/mb.html" adhocenable="false">John Molson School of Business building</a>&nbsp;(SGW)</li>
<li>Outside CC214 in the&nbsp;<a href="/maps/buildings/cc.html" title="Central Building: 7141 Sherbrooke St. W." adhocenable="false">Central Building</a>&nbsp;(LOY)</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<p>Check your personalized <b>tentative</b> schedule via the <a adhocenable="false" href="https://www.myconcordia.ca/">MyConcordia portal</a>.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h3><br>
Conflicts in your tentative exam schedule</h3>
<p>If you notice an exam conflict in your tentative schedule, donât panic. The conflict may disappear when we issue the final exam schedule. Check your final exam schedule and <a adhocenable="false" href="/students/exams/conflicts.html">let us know if you still have a conflict</a>.</p>

</div></div>


</div>

	        </div>
	        <div class="tab-pane" id="final">
	           
	           <div class="parsys parsys-tabs-1">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><br>
The final schedule is the official record of courses that hold exams administered by the Examinations Office. The final schedule provides the <b>date, time and location</b> of your exams and we issue the schedule well in advance to help you organize your time.</p>
<p>The examination schedule lists only those examinations scheduled by the Office of the Registrar. If one of your courses is not listed in the final exam schedule, check with your instructor.</p>
<p><i>It is your responsibility to write the correct examination at the indicated time and place.</i> We cannot make special arrangements for examinations that may conflict with travel or employment plans.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h3><br>
When to check your final exam schedule</h3>
<p>We issue the final exam schedule as follows:</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase table section">




<div class="concordia-table   horizontalLines verticalLines table-striped">
    <table width="100%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="1" border="1">
<tbody><tr><td width="33" valign="top"><p><b>Final exam schedule posting</b></p>
</td>
<td width="33" valign="top"><p><b>Exam period</b></p>
</td>
</tr><tr><td width="33" valign="top"><p>Early November</p>
</td>
<td width="33" valign="top"><p>December</p>
</td>
</tr><tr><td width="33" valign="top"><p>Early March</p>
</td>
<td width="33" valign="top"><p>April</p>
</td>
</tr></tbody></table>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Where to find your final exam schedule</p>
<p>You can review your final exam schedule in a print or digital format:</p>
<ul>
<li>Consult the <b>paper copy</b> posted in:<ul>
<li>The Mezzanine of the&nbsp;<a href="/maps/sgw-campus.html?building=H" title="Henry F. Hall Building: 1455 de Maisonneuve Blvd. W.">Hall Building</a>&nbsp;(SGW)</li>
<li>The second floor of the&nbsp;<a href="/maps/sgw-campus.html?building=MB">John Molson School of Business building</a>&nbsp;(SGW)</li>
<li>Outside CC214 in the&nbsp;<a href="/maps/loyola-campus.html?building=CC" title="Central Building: 7141 Sherbrooke St. W.">Central Building</a>&nbsp;(LOY)</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>Check your personalized final schedule via the <a adhocenable="false" href="https://www.myconcordia.ca/">MyConcordia portal</a>.&nbsp;</li>
</ul>
<p>&nbsp;</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h3>Conflicts in your final exam schedule</h3>
<p>Hereâs what to do if you find a&nbsp;<a href="/students/exams/conflicts.html">conflict in your final exam schedule</a>.</p>

</div></div>


</div>

	        </div>
	    </div>
	</div>
	</div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">


<div class="parbase secondary-navigation section">

jQuery(function() {

        e.preventDefault();
        var $this = $(this);

    });

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>
