            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<H1>Final exam regulations</H1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Final examinations at the university level follow strict rules and procedures. You <b>must</b> be familiar with these regulations to succeed in your final exams.&nbsp;Be prepared and you will&nbsp;avoid unnecessary frustration and stress.</p>
<p>If you break any rules you can be charged under the Academic Code of Conduct, fail the course and have the infraction noted on your student record. Please&nbsp;<a href="/students/academic-integrity/code.html">review the types of offenses</a>&nbsp;under the code.</p>
<p><b><i>Be sure to review all the Final Examination Regulations in section 16.3.10 in the undergraduate calendar.&nbsp;</i></b></p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase button section">








<a style="margin-bottom:10px;" class="btn  " href="/academics/undergraduate/calendar/current/sec16/16.html#b16.3.10.html" target="_self">Read section 16.3.10</a>

</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        <a name="before-exams"></a>
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open What you need to know before you write your final exam">
					
                    What you need to know before you write your final exam
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<ul>
<li>You <b>must present identification</b> in order to write any examination. Bring your <b>Concordia ID card</b> or photo-bearing Medicare card or driverâs license.</li>
<li>Double-check your exam day and time â youâll find your exam schedule in your&nbsp;<a href="https://www.myconcordia.ca/">MyConcordia Portal</a>.</li>
<li>You will only be admitted to the exam room if&nbsp;<b>your name appears on the roster</b>&nbsp;of students assigned to write in that room.&nbsp;<b>Before going to your exam, double-check</b>&nbsp;the:<ul>
<li>Course name</li>
<li>Course number and section&nbsp;(e.g.: MATH 203/2 A)&nbsp;</li>
<li>Room number you are assigned. If we hold the exam in multiple rooms go to the room assigned to the first letter of your last name.</li>
</ul>
&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;</li>
</ul>
<div><b><i>If you do not follow these instructions and regulations, you may forfeit the examination.</i></b></div>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<div>&nbsp;</div>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open What to expect at your exam ">
					
                    What to expect at your exam 
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_1" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<ul>
<li>Arrive for your exam in advance.<ul>
<li>You&nbsp;<b>may not enter</b>&nbsp;an examination room after the first third of the examination has elapsed.</li>
<li>You<b> may not leave</b>&nbsp;before the first third of the examination has elapsed.</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>You will be assigned a specific desk/seat location.</li>
<li>You must present your student ID card to write your final examination and&nbsp;<b>place it on the top left-hand corner</b>of the desk. Invigilators will collect it when you sign in and return it when you sign-out.<ul>
<li>A government-issued, photo-bearing Medicare card or driverâs license is an acceptable form or identification.</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>Follow the invigilators/supervisors instructions.</li>
<li>Actively listen and read instructions that are written in exam booklets and seat cards.&nbsp; If you fail to do so, you can get into serious problems.</li>
<li>You&nbsp;<b>must not tear or mutilate the examination booklet</b>&nbsp;in any way and must remain in the examination room.</li>
<li>Use the blank pages on the left-hand side of the booklet for any rough work you need to complete; you may not bring scrap paper into the exam.</li>
<li>You may not bring food or drinks to your exam.</li>
<li>You may&nbsp;not smoke during examinations.</li>
<li>You may not leave the exam room during the last 15 minutes.</li>
</ul>
<p><b><i>If you do not follow these instructions and regulations, you may forfeit the examination.</i></b></p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Exams and communications devices and other materials">
					
                    Exams and communications devices and other materials
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_2" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>You&nbsp;<b>may not bring communication devices</b>&nbsp;into the examination.&nbsp;<i>If you are caught with a cell phone during an exam you will be charged with an offence under the&nbsp;<a href="/students/academic-integrity/code.html" adhocenable="false">Academic Code of Conduct</a>.</i>&nbsp;These devices&nbsp;<b>include but are not limited to</b>:</p>
<ul>
<li>Cell phones and smart phones such as iPhones, Blackberries or Android devices</li>
<li>Pagers</li>
<li>PDAs</li>
<li>iPods</li>
<li>MP3 players</li>
</ul>
<p>You should not bring supplemental materials or devices into the exam unless they are&nbsp;<b>expressly authorized in the examâs instructions</b>. You must leave personal belongings, including materials, devices and backpacks, at the front or rear of the examination room. Small purses must be placed under the your chair. Prohibited devices and materials include but are not limited to:</p>
<ul>
<li>Briefcases</li>
<li>Textbooks</li>
<li>Notes and other papers</li>
<li>Reference books of tables</li>
<li>Graphs</li>
<li>And so on</li>
</ul>
<div><b><i>If you do not follow these instructions and regulations, you may forfeit the examination.</i></b></div>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        <a name="illness-during-exam"></a>
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Serious illness during the exam">
					
                    Serious illness during the exam
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_0" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>If you become <b>seriously</b> ill during your final exam:</p>
<ul>
<li>Report it to the invigilator in the room.</li>
<li>Hand in your unfinished exam.</li>
<li>Go to the Temporary Examinations Office location in the building. University officials will explain your options.</li>
<li>If you decide to cancel your exam, take the <a adhocenable="false" href="/content/dam/concordia/offices/registrar/docs/exams/form4B-med-cert-for-def.pdf">appropriate forms</a>&nbsp;with you to the hospital the same day of your exam. You will need medical documentation when you request to write your exam at a later date.</li>
<li>If you decide to continue the exam, you must be aware that the grade obtained in the course must stand.&nbsp; Petitions on the grounds of illness will not be considered.</li>
</ul>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">


<div class="parbase section reference"><div style="display:inline;" class="cq-dd-paragraph"><div class="parbase secondary_navigation secondary-navigation">







<div class="c-sidebar-menu c-secondary-navigation" id="secondary_navigation">

<ul style='display:block;'><li class='open'><a class='' href='/students/exams.html'>Exams</a><div class='arrow '><i></i></div><ul style='display:block;'><li class=''><a class='' href='/students/exams/schedule.html'>Exam schedule</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/students/exams/conflicts.html'>Exam conflicts</a></li><li class='open'><a class='active' href='/students/exams/regulations.html'>Exam regulations</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/students/exams/accommodations.html'>Accommodations</a><div class='arrow '><i></i></div><ul style='display:none;'><li class=''><a class='' href='/students/exams/accommodations/def-note.html'>DEF notations</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/students/exams/accommodations/med-note.html'>MED notations</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/students/exams/accommodations/supplemental.html'>Supplemental examinations</a></li></ul></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/students/exams/external-exams.html'>External exams</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/students/exams/examination-office-request-forms.html'>Examination office request forms</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/students/exams/important-dates.html'>Important dates</a></li></ul></li></ul>
</div>
<script type="text/javascript">
jQuery(function() {
    $ = jQuery;
    $("#secondary_navigation.c-secondary-navigation .arrow").click(function(e) {
        e.preventDefault();
        var $this = $(this);
        $this.toggleClass('open');
        $this.parent().children('ul').slideToggle('fast');
    });
});
</script></div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="parbase section reference"><div style="display:inline;" class="cq-dd-paragraph"><div class="parbase box">









<div class="c-sidebar-calltoaction bloc link-color-dark " style=" color: # !important;   ">


    <h2 class="section-header" style='color: # !important; '></h2>
    <div class="parsys">


<div class="section separator">

    (function() {
        var imageDiv = document.getElementById("cq-textimage-jsp-/content/concordia/en/students/exams/schedule/jcr:content/sidebar/box/box-parsys/textimage");
        var imageEvars = '{ imageLink: "/", imageAsset: "/content/dam/common/icons/125x100/related-office.png", imageTitle: "related\x2Doffice" }';
        var tagNodes = imageDiv.getElementsByTagName('A');
        for (var i = 0; i < tagNodes.length; i++) {
            var link = tagNodes.item(i); 
            link.setAttribute('onclick', 'CQ_Analytics.record({event: "imageClick", values: ' + imageEvars + ', collect:  false, options: { obj: this }, componentPath: "concordia/components/textimage"})');
        }
        
    })();
</script>

                         </li>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

	</script>




        <div class="c-socialbar-cta">

                    <a href="javascript:window.print();" title="Print">
                        <span class="sprites-icon-print-fushia">Print</span>

            jQuery(function() {  
                $ = jQuery;
                socialbar.init();

                    socialbar.scroll();
                });
    
            });
        </script></div>


            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Deadlines &amp; guidelines</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2 class="section-header ">Deadlines</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Here are the deadlines to apply for and submit all required documents for Quebec Resident status:</p>
<ul>
<li>Summer Session: <b>August 1</b></li>
<li>Fall Session: <b>December 1</b></li>
<li>For Winter Session: <b>April 1</b></li>
</ul>
<p>The Government of Quebec does not allow retroactive Quebec Resident status.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2 class="section-header ">Guidelines</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h3>Submitting application and documents</h3>
<p>Once you have all your documentation together and you are ready to apply:</p>
<ul>
<li>Submit the &quot;Quebec Residency Application&quot; and supporting documents <a adhocenable="false" href="https://www.myconcordia.ca/">at MyConcordia</a>. The <i>Quebec Residency Application</i>&nbsp;form is under the Student Services tab.</li>
<li>Supporting documents can also be submitted to the <a adhocenable="false" href="/students/birks.html">Birks Student Service Centre</a> (LB-185).</li>
</ul>
<p>If you have problems with the online submissions, you can also send your applications by:</p>
<p><b>By Fax:</b><br>
(514) 848-8631</p>
<p><b>In-Person:<br>
</b>Birks Student Service Centre<br>
1400 De Maisonneuve Blvd. West, Room LB-185</p>
<p><b>By Mail:<br>
</b>Concordia University<br>
Office of the Registrar, LB-700<br>
1455 De Maisonneuve W.<br>
Montreal, Quebec<br>
Canada H3G 2S2</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h3>Renewing of your Quebec Residency status</h3>
<p>Once approved, students who are considered permanent Quebec residents never have to renew their Quebec residency status. You are considered a permanent resident if you are:</p>
<ul>
<li>Born in Quebec</li>
<li>Holder of a CSQ (certificat de sÃ©lection du Quebec)</li>
<li>Adopted by a Quebec resident</li>
<li>Parents or sponsor deceased and one of parents was a Quebec resident</li>
</ul>
<p>All other situations are considered temporary categories. If you are considered temporary you only have to renew your residency status if you are absent for more than two sessions (not including Summer sessions).&nbsp;</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h3>If your application is rejected</h3>
<p>You can take a part-time course load for a 12-month period (three consecutive academic terms) and then reapply under situation 6 providing you have a valid Quebec Medicare Card, lease, etc that covers the required reference period.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h3>Full-time versus part-time student status</h3>
<p>For Quebec Residency purposes, full-time and part-time status <b>does not </b>correspond to what is in the Concordia calendar. This is how the Quebec government defines it:&nbsp;</p>
<p>For Undergraduate students</p>
<ul>
<li>Part-Time is defined as registration in fewer than 12.0 credits per session</li>
<li>Full-Time is defined as registration in 12.0 credits or more per session</li>
</ul>
<p>For Graduate students in a Graduate Independent, Diploma or Certificate program:</p>
<ul>
<li>Part-Time is defined as registration in fewer than 8.0 credits per session&nbsp;</li>
<li>Full-Time is defined as registration in 8.0 credits or more per session.</li>
</ul>
<p>Also, when counting the number of credits per term, courses with the grade DISC are included but courses that were withdrawn before the deadline to obtain a refund and that received the grade DNE are not included.</p>
<p>Graduate students in a Masters or PhD program are classified as Full-Time or Part-Time <b>at the time of initial registration</b> in the program. This classification of Masters FT/PT status may be used for Quebec Residency purposes.</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">


<div class="parbase secondary-navigation section">







<div class="c-sidebar-menu c-secondary-navigation" id="secondary_navigation">

<ul style='display:block;'><li class=''><a class='' href='/admissions/tuition-fees/quebec-residency/status.html'>Legal status in Canada</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/admissions/tuition-fees/quebec-residency/situations.html'>Quebec residency situations</a></li><li class='open'><a class='active' href='/admissions/tuition-fees/quebec-residency/guidelines.html'>Deadlines & guidelines</a></li></ul>
</div>
<script type="text/javascript">
jQuery(function() {
    $ = jQuery;
    $("#secondary_navigation.c-secondary-navigation .arrow").click(function(e) {
        e.preventDefault();
        var $this = $(this);
        $this.toggleClass('open');
        $this.parent().children('ul').slideToggle('fast');
    });
});
</script></div>


</div>

            </div>

        </div>

    </div>
    
</section>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<H1>Other records &amp; course descriptions</H1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>The transcripts department can provide you with <a adhocenable="false" href="#ug">Undergraduate Course Descriptions</a><b>.</b></p>
<p>For all other requests, we can help direct&nbsp;you to the appropriate office.</p>
<h3><a name="ug"></a>Undergraduate Course Descriptions</h3>
<p>A course description is a brief description of the course and is not considered as a course outline or syllabus. Course descriptions for the current academic year and the six previous years can be found in our <a adhocenable="false" href="/academics/undergraduate/calendar.html">Undergraduate Calendars available on-line</a>.&nbsp;</p>
<p>We can provide general undergraduate course descriptions for earlier years at a cost of $5.00 per academic year. Please <a adhocenable="false" href="mailto:transcripts@concordia.ca">contact us</a> for information on how to obtain older course descriptions.</p>
<h3>Graduate Course Descriptions</h3>
<p>To obtain Graduate course descriptions please contact the appropriate <a href="/academics/graduate/program-contacts.html" adhocenable="false">graduate department</a>.</p>
<h3>Student Record</h3>
<p>A record is a comprehensive report of a student's academic history at the University. It is a complete academic record and includes all courses followed at Concordia. If only a student record (unofficial transcript) is required, one can be obtained at the <a adhocenable="false" href="/offices/birks.html">Birks Student Service Centre</a> or by faxing a signed request to the Office of the Registrar at 514-848-2621. Students are also able to access their student record through <a href="https://myconcordia.ca/">MyConcordia </a>.</p>
<h3>Centre for Continuing Education Transcripts</h3>
<p>Please visit the <a adhocenable="false" href="http://cce.concordia.ca">Centre for Continuing Education</a> for information on requesting a transcript.</p>
<h3><a name="degree-verification-requests"></a>Degree Verification Requests</h3>
<p>We can provide external organizations with information on degrees conferred to former Concordia students for employment, educational&nbsp; or immigration purposes, etc. You may submit your request by&nbsp;fax (514-848-2621)<b>&nbsp;</b>providing that you include<b> </b>signed authorization from the student.</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">


<div class="parbase box section">









<div class="c-sidebar-calltoaction bloc link-color-dark " style=" color: # !important;   ">


    <h2 class="section-header" style='color: # !important; '></h2>
    <div class="parsys">


<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>

						<a href="/students/campus-services.html" role="button">Campus services</a>
	            </li>

            	
            	<li class="dropdown ">
					
						<a href="/students/beyond-the-classroom.html" role="button">Beyond the classroom</a>
	            </li>
        </ul>
	</div>
</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

    
    <div class="container">

<h1>Examination office request forms</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Download and print these forms to submit your examination requests:</p>
<ul>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="/content/dam/concordia/offices/registrar/docs/exams/form29-external-exam.pdf">External Examination Application</a></li>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="/content/dam/concordia/offices/registrar/docs/exams/form30-write-cu-exam-external.pdf">Request to Write a Concordia University Exam at an External Institution</a></li>

<li><a adhocenable="false" href="/content/dam/concordia/offices/registrar/docs/exams/form4B-med-cert-for-def.pdf">Medical Certificate for a Deferred (DEF) Notation</a></li>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="/content/dam/concordia/offices/registrar/docs/exams/form5-med.pdf">Request for a MED Notation</a></li>
<li><a adhocenable="false" href="/content/dam/concordia/offices/registrar/docs/exams/form10-supplmental%20exam.pdf">Request to Write a Supplemental Examination</a></li>
</ul>

</div></div>

    $ = jQuery;
    $("#secondary_navigation.c-secondary-navigation .arrow").click(function(e) {
        e.preventDefault();
        var $this = $(this);
        $this.toggleClass('open');
        $this.parent().children('ul').slideToggle('fast');
    });
});

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<H1>Examination conflicts</H1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>When we plan the final exam schedule, conflicts may arise for some students. If you have a conflict, follow the steps outlined on this page to report it.</p>
<p>If you have a legitimate exam conflict, you have two options. You may:</p>
<ul>
<li>Write an alternate exam</li>
<li>Defer the exam (depending on the course)</li>
</ul>

</div></div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        <a name="exam-conflict-definition"></a>
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Do you have an exam conflict?">
					
                    Do you have an exam conflict?
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>The university uses the following criteria to define conflicts:</p>
<ol>
<li>Two or more exams scheduled <b>at the same day and time</b></li>
<li><b><span style="font-weight: normal;">Three exams scheduled in&nbsp;</span><b>consecutive time blocks</b><span style="font-weight: normal;">, for example:</span> </b>&nbsp;<ul>
<li>9:00 am, 2:00 pm, 7:00 pm</li>
<li>2:00 pm, 7:00 pm, 9:00 am</li>
<li>7:00 pm, 9:00 am, 2:00 pm</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>An exam scheduled at the same time as a religious observance.</li>
<li>An exam scheduled at a time when an employer will deny time off.</li>
</ol>
<p>For legitimate conflicts, you may write an alternate exam. &nbsp;</p>
<p>The following are <b>not</b> considered exam conflicts:</p>
<ul>
<li>Two exams on the same day</li>
<li>Three exams in 24 or 48 hours</li>
<li>Personal travel plans</li>
</ul>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        <a name="reporting"></a>
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Reporting a conflict and alternate exams">
					
                    Reporting a conflict and alternate exams
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_0" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><b>You must report an exam conflict</b> to be granted an alternate exam. To report a conflict, go to your personal exam schedule in the MyConcordia portal <a adhocenable="false" href="/students/exams/important-dates.html">before the deadline</a>.</p>
<p>In many cases you will be able to select the exam to be written as an alternate, but sometimes you will have no choice. In general, alternates are scheduled for the first Sunday that follows the original exam date.</p>
<p>If you have two exams at the same date and time:</p>
<ul>
<li>Report the conflict</li>
<li>Decide which exam you will write on the originally scheduled day and which one you will write on the alternate day</li>
<li>If you donât decide before the established deadline, the Examinations Office will choose for you.</li>
</ul>
<p>If you have three exams in a row:</p>
<ul>
<li>Decide if you want to write them all at the date and time scheduled, or choose one to write an alternate</li>
<li>Report your conflict and choice by the deadline</li>
<li>If you donât choose an alternate exam before the established deadline, the Examinations Office will not choose for you; you will have to write the exam at the originally schedule date and time.</li>
</ul>
<p><b>If you miss the deadline</b> to report a conflict, you will have to call the Examinations Office at 514-848-2424, ext. 2608, 2609 or 2676 to report it. If we already have an alternate exam available, we will <b>verbally</b> provide you with the date, time and location of the alternate.</p>
<p>If you wait too long to report a conflict, we cannot guarantee you an alternate exam. <b>Please respect the deadlines established.</b></p>
<p>Review the section, <a adhocenable="false" href="/students/exams/conflicts.html#after-report-conflict">What happens after you report a conflict</a>&nbsp;for more information.</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        <a name="other-conflicts"></a>
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Other types of conflicts">
					
                    Other types of conflicts
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_1" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>If you have an exam conflict because of an employment matter or religious nature, report the conflict in the MyConcordia portal. We may be able to resolve the conflict if an alternate exam is available.</p>
<p>You may also have to submit documentation to support your conflict.&nbsp; If your employer will not give you time off to write your exam then you must submit a letter on official company letterhead attesting this. If your conflict is of a religious nature, the university will only request documentation in some exceptional cases.</p>
<p>Please note that these types of conflicts cannot be predicted in advance, we are not always able to resolve them. If we canât find a resolution you may have to <a adhocenable="false" href="/students/exams/accommodations/def-note.html">apply for a deferred exam</a>.</p>
<p>If there are other circumstances that create a conflict and you canât write your exam, you <b>must call</b> the Examinations Office at 514-848-2424. ext. 2608, 2609 or 2676 to discuss your individual situation.<br>
<br>
<b>It is your responsibility</b> <b>to be available during the entire exam period</b>. The range of&nbsp;<a href="/students/registration/term-dates-deadlines.html" adhocenable="false">Final Exam Dates</a>&nbsp;is available online&nbsp;a year in advance.</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        <a name="after-report-conflict"></a>
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open After you report a conflict">
					
                    After you report a conflict
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_2" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>After the <a adhocenable="false" href="/students/exams/important-dates.html">deadline for reporting conflicts</a>&nbsp;has passed, the Examinations Office closes the Conflict Reporting system. We review all the information and then finalize the time and location of the alternate examinations.</p>
<p>Then you will receive a letter that outlines the <b>date, time and location for the alternate exam</b> if one is available. Please note that your personal exam schedule on the MyConcordia portal <b>will not reflect</b> your alternate exam date.</p>
<p>If you miss the deadline to report a conflict, you must call the Examinations Office at 514-848-2424, ext. 2608, 2609 or 2676 to report it. <b>We will not send a letter to you</b>, but we will provide the information verbally or in-person.&nbsp; <b>It is your responsibility to record </b>the correct day, time and location of your exam.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h3>If no alternate examination is available</h3>
<p>We do our best to provide options for alternate exams. If an alternate is not possible, or if your documentation confirms that you canât write on the alternate date, <a adhocenable="false" href="/students/exams/accommodations/def-note.html">you must apply to defer your exam</a>.</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">


<div class="parbase section reference"><div style="display:inline;" class="cq-dd-paragraph"><div class="parbase secondary_navigation secondary-navigation">







<div class="c-sidebar-menu c-secondary-navigation" id="secondary_navigation">

<ul style='display:block;'><li class='open'><a class='' href='/students/exams.html'>Exams</a><div class='arrow '><i></i></div><ul style='display:block;'><li class=''><a class='' href='/students/exams/schedule.html'>Exam schedule</a></li><li class='open'><a class='active' href='/students/exams/conflicts.html'>Exam conflicts</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/students/exams/regulations.html'>Exam regulations</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/students/exams/accommodations.html'>Accommodations</a><div class='arrow '><i></i></div><ul style='display:none;'><li class=''><a class='' href='/students/exams/accommodations/def-note.html'>DEF notations</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/students/exams/accommodations/med-note.html'>MED notations</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/students/exams/accommodations/supplemental.html'>Supplemental examinations</a></li></ul></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/students/exams/external-exams.html'>External exams</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/students/exams/examination-office-request-forms.html'>Examination office request forms</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/students/exams/important-dates.html'>Important dates</a></li></ul></li></ul>
</div>
<script type="text/javascript">
jQuery(function() {
    $ = jQuery;
    $("#secondary_navigation.c-secondary-navigation .arrow").click(function(e) {
        e.preventDefault();
        var $this = $(this);
        $this.toggleClass('open');
        $this.parent().children('ul').slideToggle('fast');
    });
});
</script></div>
</div>
</div>

    (function() {
        var imageDiv = document.getElementById("cq-textimage-jsp-/content/concordia/en/students/exams/schedule/jcr:content/sidebar/box/box-parsys/textimage");

        for (var i = 0; i < tagNodes.length; i++) {

            link.setAttribute('onclick', 'CQ_Analytics.record({event: "imageClick", values: ' + imageEvars + ', collect:  false, options: { obj: this }, componentPath: "concordia/components/textimage"})');
        }
        
    })();
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

                        <span class="sprites-icon-social-5" displayText="LinkedIn" >LinkedIn</span>
                    </a>
                </li>
            </ul>   
        </div>

        <script type="text/javascript">
            jQuery(function() {  
                $ = jQuery;
                socialbar.init();
                jQuery(window).scroll(function(){
                    socialbar.scroll();
                });
    
            });
        </script></div>


            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<H1>Missed exams and DEF notations</H1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2>What to do if you miss a final exam</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>If you missed a final examination due to unforeseeable circumstances beyond your control, you may be able to write it at later date. This page explains when you may apply for a deferred exam and how to do it.</p>
<p>Be sure to review all the university regulations concerning DEF notations in <b>section 16.3.5 in the undergraduate calendar</b>.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase button section">








<a style="margin-bottom:10px;" class="btn  " href="/academics/undergraduate/calendar/current/sec16/16.html#b16.3.10.html" target="_self">Read section 16.3.5</a>

</div>
<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h4>What does a DEF notation mean? </h4>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>A DEF notation on your transcript indicates that you missed a final examination and have permission to write a supplemental exam at a future date. After you write the final exam your final grade in the course will replace the DEF notation on your transcript.&nbsp;</p>

</div></div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Eligibility for DEF notations">
					
                    Eligibility for DEF notations
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>You may apply for a DEF notation if you missed a final exam due to unforeseeable circumstances beyond your control. Unforeseeable and/or extraordinary circumstances may include:</p>
<ul>
<li>A serious illness or severe injury</li>
<li>A recent death in your immediate family</li>
<li>Assuming unexpected responsibilities of an immediate family member due to serious illness</li>
<li>Severe emotional stress</li>
<li>Fire</li>
</ul>
<p>Check your transcript when you apply for a DEF notation.&nbsp; If you missed your final exam your grade must be accompanied by a DNW (Did Not Write) notation.&nbsp; We cannot process if you receive one of the following grades:&nbsp; &nbsp;</p>
<ul>
<li>F</li>
<li>FNS</li>
<li>R</li>
<li>NR</li>
</ul>
<div><i>If you believe you have received a failing grade in error, you must discuss your situation with the instructor.</i></div>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        <a name="apply-def"></a>
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open How to apply for a deferral">
					
                    How to apply for a deferral
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_0" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Be aware that requests for deferred exams can be made in a maximum of three (3) exam sessions during your undergraduate or independent studies at Concordia.</p>
<p>Be sure to review all the university regulations concerning deferred examinations in section 16.3.10 II in the undergraduate calendar.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase button section">








<a style="margin-bottom:10px;" class="btn  " href="/academics/undergraduate/calendar/current/sec16/16#b16.3.10.html" target="_self">Read section 16.3.10 II</a>

</div>
<div class="multi-step section tabs">





<div class="c-stepbystep c-tabs c-tabs-border">

	

	    <ul id="multi_step_tab" class="nav nav-tabs"><li class="active"><a href="#medical-cert" data-toggle="tab">Step 1</a></li><li class=""><a href="#defnote-form" data-toggle="tab">Step 2</a></li><li class=""><a href="#fee" data-toggle="tab">Step 3</a></li><li class=""><a href="#docs" data-toggle="tab">Step 4</a></li><li class=""><a href="#process-req" data-toggle="tab">Step 5</a></li>
	    </ul>

	    <div class="tab-content"> 
	        <div id="medical-cert" class="tab-pane active">
	            

	            <div class="parsys parsys-tabs-0">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>If you missed your exam due to a short-term illness, download and print the&nbsp;<b><a href="/content/dam/concordia/offices/registrar/docs/exams/form4B-med-cert-for-def.pdf" adhocenable="false">Concordia medical certificate</a>.</b></p>
<ul>
<li>You <b>must</b> visit your medical practitioner or <b><a adhocenable="false" href="/students/health.html">Concordia Health Services</a></b>&nbsp;<b>on or before the date</b> of the missed exam. The medical certificate must indicate very clearly that you were unable to be present at the <b>specific date of the missed exam</b>.<b></b></li>
<li>By submitting this note, be advised that you authorize the university to verify its legitimacy. Tampering, altering or modifying the certificate in any way could lead to charges brought against you under the Code of Rights and Responsibilities and/or the Academic Code of Conduct.<b></b></li>
</ul>

</div></div>


</div>

	        </div>
	     
	        <div id="defnote-form" class="tab-pane ">
	            

	            <div class="parsys parsys-tabs-1">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Download and print the&nbsp;<i><a adhocenable="false" href="/content/dam/concordia/offices/registrar/docs/exams/form4-def.pdf">Request for Deferred Notation</a></i> form and the <a adhocenable="false" href="/content/dam/concordia/offices/registrar/docs/exams/form4B-med-cert-for-def.pdf">Medical Form for Deferred Exams</a> if you were ill. You can also pick up the form at the:</p>
<ul>
<li>Temporary Examinations Office (H-439 or MB S2.455)</li>
<li>Birks Student Service Centre (LB-185)</li>
</ul>

</div></div>


</div>

	        </div>
	     
	        <div id="fee" class="tab-pane ">
	            

	            <div class="parsys parsys-tabs-2">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Fill out the <i>Request for âDeferredâ? Notation</i> and return it to the Birks Student Service Centre (LB-185) by the deadline and pay the <b>$25 processing fee</b>.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase table section">




<div class="concordia-table   horizontalLines verticalLines">
    <table width="100%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="1" border="1">
<tbody><tr><td width="50" valign="top"><p><b>Term</b></p>
</td>
<td width="102" valign="top"><p><b>Deadline</b></p>
</td>
</tr><tr><td width="50" valign="top"><p>Fall</p>
</td>
<td width="102" valign="top"><p>January 15</p>
</td>
</tr><tr><td width="50" valign="top"><p>Fall/Winter (6-credits) or Winter</p>
</td>
<td width="102" valign="top"><p>May 15</p>
</td>
</tr><tr><td width="50" valign="top"><p>Summer</p>
</td>
<td width="102" valign="top"><p>August 31</p>
</td>
</tr></tbody></table>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><b>Always submit the request form before the deadline</b>. If you are missing any of the documents to support your request, you may submit them afterwards.</p>

</div></div>


</div>

	        </div>
	     
	        <div id="docs" class="tab-pane ">
	            

	            <div class="parsys parsys-tabs-3">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Collect your supporting documents and submit them as soon as possible. If your situation is related to a health matter, you <b>must submit the Concordia medical certificate</b> for deferred notations with your deferral request. Photocopies of the certificate or a doctorâs note will not be accepted.<br>
 <br>
 If you missed your exam for reasons other than health, you must submit as much relevant information as possible. You may need to provide documentation such as a death certificate, obituary, letter from your employer or a police report.</p>

</div></div>


</div>

	        </div>
	     
	        <div id="process-req" class="tab-pane ">
	            

	            <div class="parsys parsys-tabs-4">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Wait for us to process your request. We begin processing requests as soon as the official examination period is over and your final grade has been recorded. If your request is approved you will receive instruction on when to <a adhocenable="false" href="/students/exams/accommodations/def-note/writing.html">write the deferred examination</a><b>.</b></p>

</div></div>


</div>

	        </div>
	    
	    </div>

        
	    <div class="c-stepbystep-nav">
	        <a id="multi_step_tab_previous-step" class="btn btn-prev disabled">Previous step</a>
	        <a id="multi_step_tab_next-step" class="btn btn-next">Next step</a>
	    </div>
        

	

</div>

<script type="text/javascript">

jQuery(function($){

	$(document).ready(function() { 
        
        var hash = window.location.hash;
        hash && $('ul.nav a[href="' + hash + '"]').tab('show');
        
        $('.nav-tabs a').click(function (e) {
            //$(this).tab('show');
            //var scrollmem = $('body').scrollTop();
            window.location.hash = this.hash;
            //$('html,body').scrollTop(scrollmem);
        }); 
    });
    
	var $next_step = $("#multi_step_tab_next-step");
	var $previous_step = $("#multi_step_tab_previous-step");

	$next_step.click(function(event) {

        $('#multi_step_tab li.active')
          .next()
          .find('a[data-toggle="tab"]')
          .click();

        isLastTab();

    });

    $previous_step.click(function(event) {

    	$('#multi_step_tab li.active')
        .prev()
        .find('a[data-toggle="tab"]')
        .click();

        isFirstTab();
    	
    });

    function isLastTab() {
        var e = $('#multi_step_tab li:last').hasClass('active'); 

        $previous_step.removeClass('disabled');

        if( e ) 
            $next_step.addClass('disabled'); 
    	else 
        	$next_step.removeClass('disabled'); 

    	return e;
    }

    function isFirstTab() {
        var e = $('#multi_step_tab li:first').hasClass('active'); 

        $next_step.removeClass('disabled');

        if( e ) 
            $previous_step.addClass('disabled'); 
        else 
            $previous_step.removeClass('disabled'); 

        return e;
    }

    $("#multi_step_tab a[data-toggle='tab']").on('shown', function (e) {
    
        var isFirstTab = $('#multi_step_tab li:first').hasClass('active'); 
        var isLastTab = $('#multi_step_tab li:last').hasClass('active'); 

        if (isFirstTab) {
            $previous_step.addClass('disabled');
            $next_step.removeClass('disabled');
        } else if (isLastTab) {
            $previous_step.removeClass('disabled');
            $next_step.addClass('disabled');
        } else {
            $previous_step.removeClass('disabled');
            $next_step.removeClass('disabled');
        }

    });

});

</script></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open What we can't do">
					
                    What we can't do
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_1" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>While we make every effort to support students in difficult situations, there are limits to what can do. Unfortunately we cannot:</p>
<ul>
<li>Defer a mid-term</li>
<li>Defer an exam due to personal travel</li>
<li>Defer an exam if you wrote it while feeling unwell</li>
<li>Process a DEF request for a failing grade</li>
<li>Contact your instructor about incorrect grades</li>
<li>Intervene on your behalf for missing or incomplete assignments</li>
</ul>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">


<div class="parbase section reference"><div style="display:inline;" class="cq-dd-paragraph"><div class="parbase secondary_navigation secondary-navigation">







<div class="c-sidebar-menu c-secondary-navigation" id="secondary_navigation">

<ul style='display:block;'><li class='open'><a class='' href='/students/exams/accommodations.html'>Accommodations</a><div class='arrow '><i></i></div><ul style='display:block;'><li class='open'><a class='active' href='/students/exams/accommodations/def-note.html'>DEF notations</a><div class='arrow open'><i></i></div><ul style='display:none;'><li class=''><a class='' href='/students/exams/accommodations/def-note/writing.html'>Writing a deferred exam</a></li></ul></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/students/exams/accommodations/med-note.html'>MED notations</a><div class='arrow '><i></i></div><ul style='display:none;'><li class=''><a class='' href='/students/exams/accommodations/med-note/writing.html'>Writing a replacement exam</a></li></ul></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/students/exams/accommodations/supplemental.html'>Supplemental examinations</a><div class='arrow '><i></i></div><ul style='display:none;'><li class=''><a class='' href='/students/exams/accommodations/supplemental/writing.html'>Writing a supplemental exam</a></li></ul></li></ul></li></ul>
</div>
<script type="text/javascript">
jQuery(function() {
    $ = jQuery;
    $("#secondary_navigation.c-secondary-navigation .arrow").click(function(e) {
        e.preventDefault();
        var $this = $(this);
        $this.toggleClass('open');
        $this.parent().children('ul').slideToggle('fast');
    });
});
</script></div>
</div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    (function() {
        var imageDiv = document.getElementById("cq-textimage-jsp-/content/concordia/en/students/exams/schedule/jcr:content/sidebar/box/box-parsys/textimage");
        var imageEvars = '{ imageLink: "/", imageAsset: "/content/dam/common/icons/125x100/related-office.png", imageTitle: "related\x2Doffice" }';
        var tagNodes = imageDiv.getElementsByTagName('A');

            link.setAttribute('onclick', 'CQ_Analytics.record({event: "imageClick", values: ' + imageEvars + ', collect:  false, options: { obj: this }, componentPath: "concordia/components/textimage"})');
        }
        
    })();

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<H1>MED notations</H1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2>What to do if a long-term medical situation interferes with your final exams</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>If you missed a final examination due to a long-term illness, you may apply to replace you grade with a MED notation. This page explains when you may apply for a MED notation, how to do it, and when you will write your replacement final exam.</p>
<p>Be sure to review all the university regulations concerning MED notations in section 16.3.5 in the undergraduate calendar.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase button section">








<a style="margin-bottom:10px;" class="btn  " href="/academics/undergraduate/calendar/current/sec16/16.html#b16.3.5.html" target="_self">Read section 16.3.5</a>

</div>
<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h4><br />
What does an MED notation mean? </h4>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>A MED notation on your transcript indicates that you unable to write a final examination and/or complete other assignments due to a <b>long-term medical situation</b>. After you write the final exam your final grade in the course will replace the MED notation on your transcript.</p>
<p>A long-term medical situation is an illness or condition that has been ongoing throughout the term and has severely interfered with your ability to complete course assignments or write the final exam.</p>
<p>You <b>cannot apply for a MED notation</b> if you experience a short-term illness <b>just before the start</b> of exams or the exam period, but you may apply for to defer your exam.</p>
<p><a adhocenable="false" href="/students/exams/accommodations/def-note.html">Learn more about DEF notations</a>.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Eligibility for MED notations">
					
                    Eligibility for MED notations
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>You may apply for a MED notation if you missed a final exam due to long-term illness. &nbsp;</p>
<p>Check your transcript when you apply for a MED notation.&nbsp; Your transcript must show:</p>
<ul>
<li>DNW (Did Not Write) if you missed the final exam</li>
<li>INC (Incomplete) if you did not submit all the necessary term work and late completions are permitted</li>
<li>DNW/INC if you missed both the final exam and did not submit all the necessary term work</li>
</ul>
<p>We cannot process your application if you receive one of the following grades:&nbsp; &nbsp;</p>
<ul>
<li>F</li>
<li>FNS</li>
<li>R</li>
<li>NR</li>
</ul>
<p><i>If you believe you have received a failing grade in error, you must discuss your situation with the instructor.</i> </p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        <a name="apply-med"></a>
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open How to apply for an MED notation">
					
                    How to apply for an MED notation
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_0" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Be aware that requests for deferred exams can be made in a maximum of three (3) exam sessions during your undergraduate or independent studies at Concordia.</p>
<p>Be sure to review all the university regulations concerning deferred examinations in section 16.3.10 II in the undergraduate calendar.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase button section">








<a style="margin-bottom:10px;" class="btn  " href="/academics/undergraduate/calendar/current/sec16/16#b16.3.10.html" target="_self">Read section 16.3.10 II</a>

</div>
<div class="multi-step section tabs">





<div class="c-stepbystep c-tabs c-tabs-border">

	

	    <ul id="multi_step_tab" class="nav nav-tabs"><li class="active"><a href="#medical-cert" data-toggle="tab">Step 1</a></li><li class=""><a href="#defnote-form" data-toggle="tab">Step 2</a></li><li class=""><a href="#fee" data-toggle="tab">Step 3</a></li><li class=""><a href="#docs" data-toggle="tab">Step 4</a></li>
	    </ul>

	    <div class="tab-content"> 
	        <div id="medical-cert" class="tab-pane active">
	            

	            <div class="parsys parsys-tabs-0">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Download and print the [link to pdf] <i>Request for âMEDâ? Notation</i> form.&nbsp; You can also pick up the form at the:</p>
<ul>
<li>Temporary Examinations Office (H-439 or MB S2.455)</li>
<li>Birks Student Service Centre (LB-185)</li>
</ul>

</div></div>


</div>

	        </div>
	     
	        <div id="defnote-form" class="tab-pane ">
	            

	            <div class="parsys parsys-tabs-1">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Fill out the <i>Request for âMEDâ? Notation</i> and return it to the Birks Student Service Centre (LB-185) by the deadline and pay the <b>$25 processing fee</b>.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase table section">




<div class="concordia-table   horizontalLines verticalLines">
    <table width="100%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="1" border="1">
<tbody><tr><td width="50" valign="top"><p><b>Term</b></p>
</td>

</td>
</tr><tr><td width="50" valign="top"><p>Fall</p>
</td>
<td width="102" valign="top"><p>January 15</p>
</td>
</tr><tr><td width="50" valign="top"><p>Fall/Winter (6-credits) or Winter</p>
</td>
<td width="102" valign="top"><p>May 15</p>
</td>
</tr><tr><td width="50" valign="top"><p>Summer</p>
</td>
<td width="102" valign="top"><p>August 31</p>
</td>
</tr></tbody></table>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><b>Always submit the request form before the deadline</b>. If you are missing any of the documents to support your request, you may submit them afterwards.</p>

</div></div>


</div>

	        </div>
	     
	        <div id="fee" class="tab-pane ">
	            

	            <div class="parsys parsys-tabs-2">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Collect your supporting documents and submit them as soon as possible. The medical certificate must be on a physicianâs original letterhead. While the nature of your medical condition does not need to be explained, we do require an indication of the range of dates when you were unable to perform schoolwork during the academic year. Photocopies of medical documents <b>will not</b> be accepted.</p>

</div></div>


</div>

	        </div>
	     
	        <div id="docs" class="tab-pane ">
	            

	            <div class="parsys parsys-tabs-3">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Wait for us to process your request. We begin processing requests as soon as the official examination period is over and your final grade has been recorded. If your request is approved we will send you a letter about your MED notation.</p>

</div></div>


</div>

	        </div>
	    
	    </div>

        
	    <div class="c-stepbystep-nav">
	        <a id="multi_step_tab_previous-step" class="btn btn-prev disabled">Previous step</a>
	        <a id="multi_step_tab_next-step" class="btn btn-next">Next step</a>
	    </div>
        

	

</div>

<script type="text/javascript">

jQuery(function($){

	$(document).ready(function() { 
        
        var hash = window.location.hash;
        hash && $('ul.nav a[href="' + hash + '"]').tab('show');
        
        $('.nav-tabs a').click(function (e) {
            //$(this).tab('show');
            //var scrollmem = $('body').scrollTop();
            window.location.hash = this.hash;
            //$('html,body').scrollTop(scrollmem);
        }); 
    });
    
	var $next_step = $("#multi_step_tab_next-step");
	var $previous_step = $("#multi_step_tab_previous-step");

	$next_step.click(function(event) {

        $('#multi_step_tab li.active')
          .next()
          .find('a[data-toggle="tab"]')
          .click();

        isLastTab();

    });

    $previous_step.click(function(event) {

    	$('#multi_step_tab li.active')
        .prev()
        .find('a[data-toggle="tab"]')
        .click();

        isFirstTab();
    	
    });

    function isLastTab() {
        var e = $('#multi_step_tab li:last').hasClass('active'); 

        $previous_step.removeClass('disabled');

        if( e ) 
            $next_step.addClass('disabled'); 
    	else 
        	$next_step.removeClass('disabled'); 

    	return e;
    }

    function isFirstTab() {
        var e = $('#multi_step_tab li:first').hasClass('active'); 

        $next_step.removeClass('disabled');

        if( e ) 
            $previous_step.addClass('disabled'); 
        else 
            $previous_step.removeClass('disabled'); 

        return e;
    }

    $("#multi_step_tab a[data-toggle='tab']").on('shown', function (e) {
    
        var isFirstTab = $('#multi_step_tab li:first').hasClass('active'); 
        var isLastTab = $('#multi_step_tab li:last').hasClass('active'); 

        if (isFirstTab) {
            $previous_step.addClass('disabled');
            $next_step.removeClass('disabled');
        } else if (isLastTab) {
            $previous_step.removeClass('disabled');
            $next_step.addClass('disabled');
        } else {
            $previous_step.removeClass('disabled');
            $next_step.removeClass('disabled');
        }

    });

});

</script></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>You may also visit&nbsp;<a href="/students/health.html" adhocenable="false">Concordiaâs Health Services</a>&nbsp;Department where they can assess your medical condition and offer the appropriate assistance, provided you have been seen or followed at Health Services during the time of the extended illness.</p>
<p>If you repeatedly submit medical certificates, the university reserves the right to refer you to a university-appointed physician for a recommendation.</p>
<p>If your request is approved you have permission to write a <a adhocenable="false" href="/students/exams/accommodations/med-note/writing.html">replacement examination</a>. Be sure to review all the university regulations concerning replacement examinations in section 16.3.10 II in the undergraduate calendar.<b></b></p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase button section">








<a style="margin-bottom:10px;" class="btn  " href="http://registrar.concordia.ca/calendar/16/16.html#b16.3.10" target="_self">Read section 16.3.10 II</a>

</div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>

<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Incomplete course work and INC notations">
					
                    Incomplete course work and INC notations
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_1" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>If your course does not have a final exam and you have outstanding assignments, do apply for a MED notation. If you receive a grade with an âINCâ? notification, assume your request will be approved and do the work. If your request is denied, you may request permission to apply late for authorization to submit the necessary course work.</p>
<p>You must <b>complete any outstanding assignments</b> and submit them by the deadline:</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase table section">




<div class="concordia-table   horizontalLines">
    <table width="100%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="1" border="1">
<tbody><tr><th width="50">Term</th>
<th width="50">Deadline</th>
</tr><tr><td width="50"><p>Fall</p>
</td>
<td width="50"><p>February 15</p>
</td>
</tr><tr><td width="50"><p>Fall/Winter (6-credits) or Winter</p>
</td>
<td width="50"><p>May 30</p>
</td>
</tr><tr><td width="50"><p>Summer</p>
</td>
<td width="50"><p>September 15</p>
</td>
</tr></tbody></table>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Check with your instructor; some may have earlier deadlines than those stated above.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h4>INC notations</h4>
<p>Be sure to review all the university regulations concerning <b>INC notations and late completion of course work</b> in section 16.3.6 in the undergraduate calendar.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase button section">








<a style="margin-bottom:10px;" class="btn  " href="http://registrar.concordia.ca/calendar/16/16.html#b16.3.6" target="_self">Read section 16.3.3</a>

</div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>The MED notation has no grade point value in the calculation of a grade point average, and it stays on your Concordia transcript until you fulfill all the requirements of the course. If you choose not to complete the requirements of the course and it is required for your degree, you would be required to re-register for it at a future date.</p>
<p><a adhocenable="false" href="/students/exams/accommodations/med-note/writing.html">Learn more about writing replacement examinations</a></p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">

<div class="c-sidebar-menu c-secondary-navigation" id="secondary_navigation">

<ul style='display:block;'><li class='open'><a class='' href='/students/exams/accommodations.html'>Accommodations</a><div class='arrow '><i></i></div><ul style='display:block;'><li class=''><a class='' href='/students/exams/accommodations/def-note.html'>DEF notations</a><div class='arrow '><i></i></div><ul style='display:none;'><li class=''><a class='' href='/students/exams/accommodations/def-note/writing.html'>Writing a deferred exam</a></li></ul></li><li class='open'><a class='active' href='/students/exams/accommodations/med-note.html'>MED notations</a><div class='arrow open'><i></i></div><ul style='display:none;'><li class=''><a class='' href='/students/exams/accommodations/med-note/writing.html'>Writing a replacement exam</a></li></ul></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/students/exams/accommodations/supplemental.html'>Supplemental examinations</a><div class='arrow '><i></i></div><ul style='display:none;'><li class=''><a class='' href='/students/exams/accommodations/supplemental/writing.html'>Writing a supplemental exam</a></li></ul></li></ul></li></ul>

jQuery(function() {
    $ = jQuery;
    $("#secondary_navigation.c-secondary-navigation .arrow").click(function(e) {
        e.preventDefault();
        var $this = $(this);
        $this.toggleClass('open');
        $this.parent().children('ul').slideToggle('fast');
    });
});
</script></div>

<div class="c-quicklinks" >

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Term Dates and Deadlines<br />
(Undergraduate &amp; Graduate)<br />
2013-14</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>On this page you will find two tables showing&nbsp;<b>dates and deadlines for the current academic year</b>.&nbsp;</p>
<ol>
<li><b>Standard term </b>dates and deadlines: summer, fall, fall/winter and winter terms</li>
<li><b><a adhocenable="false" href="#nonstandard">Non-standard term</a></b> dates and deadlines: <b>a list of&nbsp;courses </b>with non-standard dates or deadlines</li>
</ol>
<div>&nbsp;</div>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h2>Standard Term Dates and Deadlines</h2>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase table section">

</tr><tr><td bgcolor="white" width="185" align="left"><b>Winter /4</b></td>
<td bgcolor="white" width="138" align="left">Jan. 6 â April 12</td>
<td bgcolor="white" width="135" align="left">April 16 â May 6</td>
<td bgcolor="white" width="107" align="left">January 19**</td>
<td bgcolor="white" width="90" align="left">January 19</td>
<td bgcolor="white" width="88" align="left">March 9</td>
</tr></tbody></table>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>* See&nbsp;Tuition and Fees</p>
<p>**&nbsp;a&nbsp;<b>$75 late registration fee</b>&nbsp;will be charged for registration of /2 or /3 courses made beginning September 3 or /4 courses made beginning January 6 if not already registered for any Fall or Winter 2013-14 courses.</p>
<p><b>Important</b><b>:</b></p>
<ul>
<li>Due to increase of activity on the system and the speed of your internet connection, we recommend you do not wait until the last hour to withdraw from your course(s). All transactions must be completed and confirmed before 12:00&nbsp;a.m. in order to meet the deadlines.<br>
&nbsp;</li>
<li>The&nbsp;<b>DNE</b>&nbsp;deadline date (dropping a course without having to pay for it) for Fall (/2) and Fall/Winter (/3) courses is September 16. For Winter (/4) courses the DNE deadline date is January 19. Students who drop their courses after the DNE date will receive a&nbsp;<b>DISC</b>notation on their record and&nbsp;<b>be responsible for full payment</b>&nbsp;of the tuition and other associated fees.</li>
</ul>

</div></div>
<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">

<p><a name="nonstandard"></a></p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><a name="step1"></a></p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><a name="nonstandard"></a></p>
<h2>Non-Standard Term Dates and Deadlines&nbsp;â 2013<br>
(Undergraduate &amp; Graduate)</h2>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>
