<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Writing a deferred exam</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>This page explains what happens after your submit a request to defer a final examination.</p>
<p>Be sure to review all the university regulations concerning DEF notations and supplemental examinations in <a adhocenable="false" href="/academics/undergraduate/calendar/current/sec16/16.html#b16.3.8">section 16.3.8 in the Undergraduate Calendar</a>.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h3><br>
Was your request approved?</h3>
<p>We consider requests to defer exams under the following conditions:</p>
<ul>
<li>Your grade in the course contains the DNW notation</li>
<li>We have received your <a adhocenable="false" href="/students/exams/accommodations/def-note.html#apply-def"><i>Request for âDeferredâ? Notation</i> form</a> <b>by the deadline</b></li>
<li>We have received your supporting documentation</li>
</ul>
<p>We begin processing requests for âDEFâ? notations as soon as the official examination period is over and your final grade has been recorded. If your request is approved we, the Examinations Office, will send you a letter. You should also make sure that your <a adhocenable="false" href="https://www.myconcordia.ca/">mailing address on the MyConcordia portal</a> is valid.</p>
<p>Please follow up if you donât hear from us within a month of submitting your request. Call us at 848-2424, ext. 2608, 2609 or 2676.&nbsp;</p>

</div></div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        <a name="when-write-final"></a>
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open When you will write your final exam">
					
                    When you will write your final exam
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Be sure to review all the university regulations concerning deferred examinations in section <a adhocenable="false" href="/academics/undergraduate/calendar/current/sec16/16.html#b16.3.10">16.3.10 II in the undergraduate calendar</a>.<b></b></p>
<p>When you write your deferred exam depends on:</p>
<ul>
<li>The date of the original examination</li>
<li>The next session when the course is offered</li>
<li>Your graduation status</li>
</ul>
<p>You will receive a letter from the Examinations Office approximately one month before the deferred exam telling you the date, time and location of your exam.</p>
<p>The Examinations Office will automatically resolve any exam conflicts for you and inform you of the solution in writing. In the event of a conflict, you may have to write an alternate exam or write two exams back-to-back.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h5>Consult the regulations for your faculty</h5>
</div></div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        <a name="arts-science-fine-arts"></a>
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Faculties of Arts and Science and Fine Arts">
					
                    Faculties of Arts and Science and Fine Arts
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>If you missed your exam in <b>December</b></p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase table section">




<div class="concordia-table   verticalLines">
    <table width="100%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="1" border="1">
<tbody><tr><td width="50%">Course offered in January<br>
</td>
<td>Course not offered in January<br>
</td>
</tr><tr><td width="50%">Write with April finals</td>
<td>Write in February (mid-term break)</td>
</tr></tbody></table>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Potential graduates for June would write during the replacement period in February (mid-term break).</p>

</div></div>
<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>If you missed your exam in <b>April</b></p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase table section">




<div class="concordia-table   verticalLines">
    <table width="100%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="1" border="1">
<tbody><tr><td width="33%">Course offered in <b>first </b>summer session<br>
</td>
<td width="33%">Course offered in <b>second </b>summer session</td>
<td>Course <b>not offered</b> in either summer session&nbsp;</td>
</tr><tr><td width="33%">Write with June finals</td>
<td width="33%">Write with August finals</td>
<td>Write in replacement period after August finals</td>
</tr></tbody></table>

</div></div>
<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>If you missed your exam in <b>June</b></p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase table section">




<div class="concordia-table   verticalLines">
    <table width="100%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="1" border="1">
<tbody><tr><td width="33%">For a&nbsp;<b>3-credit course</b></td>
<td width="33%">For a <b>3-credit course</b></td>
<td>For a <b>6-credit course</b>)</td>
</tr><tr><td width="33%">Course <b>offered </b>in September</td>
<td width="33%">Course <b>not offered</b> in September</td>
<td>Write in October replacement period</td>
</tr><tr><td>Write with December finals</td>
<td>Write in October replacement period</td>
<td>&nbsp;</td>
</tr></tbody></table>

</div></div>
<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>If you missed your exam in <b>August</b></p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase table section">




<div class="concordia-table   verticalLines">
    <table width="100%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="1" border="1">
<tbody><tr><td width="50%">Course offered September<br>
</td>
<td width="50%">Course not offered in September</td>
</tr><tr><td width="50%">Write with December finals</td>
<td width="50%">Write&nbsp;&nbsp;in October replacement period</td>
</tr></tbody></table>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Potential graduates for November would write during the replacement period in October.</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        <a name="encs"></a>
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Faculty of Engineering and Computer Science">
					
                    Faculty of Engineering and Computer Science
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_0" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Deferred exams are only written at the end of the session when the course is offered.</p>
<p>If you are a potential graduate and the course for your deferred exam is not offered in the term immediately prior to your graduation, a âspecial examâ? will be provided for you and scheduled during the regular final exam period.</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        <a name="jmsb"></a>
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open John Molson School of Business">
					
                    John Molson School of Business
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_1" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Deferred exams are only written at the end of the session when the course is offered.</p>
<p>If you are a potential graduate and the course for your deferred exam is not offered in the term immediately prior to your graduation, a âspecial examâ? will be provided for you and scheduled during the regular final exam period.</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        <a name="after-write-def"></a>
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open After you write the deferred exam">
					
                    After you write the deferred exam
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_0" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Your exam will be evaluated and a grade submitted to the Office of the Registrar. The new grade submitted for you will replace the DEF notation on your record.</p>
<p>A deferred examination counts for the same weight in the course evaluation scheme and covers the same course material as the original examination.</p>
<p>If you fail a course after writing a deferred examination you may have one opportunity to write a supplemental examination during the next scheduled supplemental examination period. To have this privilege you must meet all the criteria for writing a supplemental exam and receive an original grade other than FNS.</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        <a name="dont-write-def"></a>
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open If you donât write the deferred exam">
					
                    If you donât write the deferred exam
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_1" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>If you choose not to write the deferred exam, your âDEFâ? notation will be replaced by the original grade submitted for you and it will be calculated in your grade point average. You also forfeit the chance to write the missed exam. You must repeat the course if it is a requirement of your degree.</p>
<p>An examination cannot normally be deferred a second time.&nbsp; If you were prevented from writing the deferred exam <b>due to extraordinary circumstances</b>, you may apply to the University Examinations Committee for a retroactive discontinue notation (DISC) in the course. You would have to submit a second&nbsp;<a href="/content/dam/concordia/offices/registrar/docs/exams/form4-def.pdf" adhocenable="false">Request for a DEF notation application form</a>&nbsp;along with the fee and provide supporting evidence. Please review the steps for <a adhocenable="false" href="/students/exams/accommodations/def-note.html#apply-def">how to apply for a DEF notation</a>.&nbsp;</p>
<p>You may make requests for deferred examinations in a maximum of three exam sessions during your undergraduate or independent studies at Concordia.&nbsp; Requests which exceed this number will be submitted to the University Examinations Committee for consideration only if they have been the consequence of extraordinary circumstances.</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">

    });

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Writing a supplemental exam</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2>What happens after you request a supplemental exam</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Be sure to review all the university regulations concerning supplemental examinations in section <a adhocenable="false" href="http://registrar.concordia.ca/calendar/16/16.html#b16.3.10">16.3.10 II in the undergraduate calendar</a>.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h3><br>
Was your request approved?</h3>
<p>We usually send notification about two weeks after the deadline.</p>
<p><a adhocenable="false" href="/students/exams/accommodations/supplemental.html">If your request is approved</a> we, the Examinations Office, will send you a letter. You should also make sure that your mailing address on the <a adhocenable="false" href="https://www.myconcordia.ca/">MyConcordia portal</a> is <b>valid</b>.</p>
<p>Please follow up if you donât hear from us within a month of submitting your request. Call us at 848-2424, ext. 2608, 2609 or 2676.</p>
<p>If your request is <b>refused</b> because you do not satisfy the criteria, <b>we will credit your student account</b> in the amount of the fee paid. You <b>will not get your money back</b> if your request is approved but <b>you decide not to write</b> the supplemental exam.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open When you will write your supplemental exam">
					
                    When you will write your supplemental exam
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Be sure to review all the university regulations concerning supplemental examinations in section <u><a href="http://registrar.concordia.ca/calendar/16/16.html#b16.3.10">16.3.10 Section II in the undergraduate calendar</a></u> [link to calendar]<b></b></p>
<p>You will receive a letter from the Examinations Office <b>approximately three weeks</b> before the supplemental exam telling you the <b>date, time and location</b> of your exam. In general, supplemental exams are held at the following times:</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase table section">




<div class="concordia-table  ">
    <table width="100%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="1" border="1">
<tbody><tr><th width="50">Term</th>
<th width="50">Exam period</th>
</tr><tr><td width="239" valign="top"><p>Fall, Fall/Winter, Winter courses</p>
</td>
<td width="194" valign="top"><p>August</p>
</td>
</tr><tr><td width="239" valign="top"><p>Summer </p>
</td>
<td width="194" valign="top"><p>October</p>
</td>
</tr><tr><td width="239" valign="top"><p>For potential June graduates</p>
</td>
<td width="194" valign="top"><p>February mid-term break</p>
</td>
</tr></tbody></table>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open After you write your supplemental exam">
					
                    After you write your supplemental exam
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_0" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Your instructor will evaluate your supplemental exam and submit your grade to the Office of the Registrar. Your original <b>failing grade remains on your record</b> and a <b>second entry</b> is made on your record showing the result of the supplemental. Both grades are calculated in your grade point average.</p>
<p>If you fail a supplemental examination you will receive a grade of âRâ? in the course. If you do not write a supplemental examination, your student record remains unchanged.</p>
<p>If you do not write the supplemental exam when scheduled, you forfeit the chance to write the supplemental and you must repeat the course if it is a requirement for your degree. However, a missed supplemental exam will not appear on your transcript.</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open If you were unable to write your supplemental exam">
					
                    If you were unable to write your supplemental exam
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_1" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>If extraordinary circumstances prevented you from writing the supplemental examination, you may apply to the University Examinations Committee. Please <b>refer to the&nbsp;</b><a adhocenable="false" href="/students/exams/accommodations/def-note.html#apply-def">Request for âDEFâ? notation section</a> for further information.</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">


<div class="parbase section reference"><div style="display:inline;" class="cq-dd-paragraph"><div class="parbase secondary_navigation secondary-navigation">







<div class="c-sidebar-menu c-secondary-navigation" id="secondary_navigation">

<ul style='display:block;'><li class='open'><a class='' href='/students/exams/accommodations/supplemental.html'>Supplemental examinations</a><div class='arrow '><i></i></div><ul style='display:block;'><li class='open'><a class='active' href='/students/exams/accommodations/supplemental/writing.html'>Writing a supplemental exam</a></li></ul></li></ul>
</div>
<script type="text/javascript">
jQuery(function() {
    $ = jQuery;
    $("#secondary_navigation.c-secondary-navigation .arrow").click(function(e) {
        e.preventDefault();
        var $this = $(this);
        $this.toggleClass('open');
        $this.parent().children('ul').slideToggle('fast');
    });
});
</script></div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="parbase section reference"><div style="display:inline;" class="cq-dd-paragraph"><div class="parbase box">









<div class="c-sidebar-calltoaction bloc link-color-dark " style=" color: # !important;   ">


    <h2 class="section-header" style='color: # !important; '></h2>
    <div class="parsys">


<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="parbase textimage section">



<div class="image " id="cq-textimage-jsp-/content/concordia/en/students/exams/schedule/jcr:content/sidebar/box/box-parsys/textimage" style="width:auto;"><img title="related-office" alt="related-office" class="cq-dd-image" src="/content/concordia/en/students/exams/schedule/_jcr_content/sidebar/box/box-parsys/textimage/image.img.png/1384709434257.png"></div>
        
<script type="text/javascript">
    (function() {
        var imageDiv = document.getElementById("cq-textimage-jsp-/content/concordia/en/students/exams/schedule/jcr:content/sidebar/box/box-parsys/textimage");
        var imageEvars = '{ imageLink: "/", imageAsset: "/content/dam/common/icons/125x100/related-office.png", imageTitle: "related\x2Doffice" }';
        var tagNodes = imageDiv.getElementsByTagName('A');
        for (var i = 0; i < tagNodes.length; i++) {
            var link = tagNodes.item(i); 
            link.setAttribute('onclick', 'CQ_Analytics.record({event: "imageClick", values: ' + imageEvars + ', collect:  false, options: { obj: this }, componentPath: "concordia/components/textimage"})');
        }
        
    })();
</script>
        <div class="rte"><div class="text"><h3>Connect with us</h3>
<p><a adhocenable="false" href="/offices/registrar/staff-contact.html#exam">Examination Office</a></p>
</div></div>
<div class="clear"></div></div>
<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>

</div>
</div>


</div>

            </div>

        </div>

    </div>
    
</section>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

                <a href="/students/exams/accommodations/med-note/writing.html" onclick="CQ_Analytics.record({event:'followBreadcrumb',values: { breadcrumbPath: '/content/concordia/en/students/exams/accommodations/med-note/writing' },collect: false,options: { obj: this },componentPath: 'concordia/components/breadcrumb'})">
                    Writing a replacement exam
                </a>
	        </li>
	        
</ul></div>

    </div>

</header>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Writing a replacement exam</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>This page explains what happens after you request an MED notation.</p>
<p>Be sure to review all the university regulations concerning MED notations and supplemental examinations in <a adhocenable="false" href="/academics/undergraduate/calendar/current/sec16/16.html#b16.3.5">section 16.3.5 in the undergraduate calendar</a>.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h3><br>
Was your request approved?</h3>
<p>We consider requests to defer exams under the following conditions:</p>
<ul>
<li>Your grade in the course contains the DNW notation</li>
<li>We have received your&nbsp;<a adhocenable="false" href="/students/exams/accommodations/med-note.html#apply-med"><i>Request for âMEDâ? Notation</i>&nbsp;form</a>&nbsp;<b>by the deadline</b></li>
<li>We have received your supporting documentation</li>
</ul>
<p>We begin processing requests for âMEDâ? notations as soon as the official examination period is over and your final grade has been recorded. If your request is approved we, the Examinations Office, will send you a letter.&nbsp;You should also make sure that your&nbsp;<a href="https://www.myconcordia.ca/">mailing address on the MyConcordia portal</a>&nbsp;is valid.</p>
<p>Please follow up if you donât hear from us within a month of submitting your request. Call us at 848-2424, ext. 2608, 2609 or 2676.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        <a name="when-write-replacement"></a>
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open When you will write your replacement exam">
					
                    When you will write your replacement exam
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Be sure to review all the university regulations concerning replacement examinations in section <u><a href="/academics/undergraduate/calendar/current/sec16/16.html#b16.3.10" adhocenable="false">16.3.10 II in the undergraduate calendar</a>.</u><b></b></p>
<p>When you write your replacement exam depends on:</p>
<ul>
<li>The date of the original examination</li>
<li>The next session when the course is offered</li>
<li>Your graduation status</li>
</ul>
<p>You will receive a letter from the Examinations Office approximately one month before the replacement exam telling you the date, time and location of your exam.</p>
<p>The Examinations Office will automatically resolve any exam conflicts for you and inform you of the solution in writing. In the event of a conflict, you may have to write an alternate exam or write two exams back-to-back.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h5>Consult the regulations for your faculty</h5>
</div></div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        <a name="arts-science-fine-arts"></a>
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Faculties of Arts and Science and Fine Arts">
					
                    Faculties of Arts and Science and Fine Arts
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>If you missed your exam in <b>December</b></p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase table section">




<div class="concordia-table   verticalLines">
    <table width="100%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="1" border="1">
<tbody><tr><td width="50%">Course offered in January<br>
</td>
<td>Course not offered in January<br>
</td>
</tr><tr><td width="50%">Write with April finals</td>
<td>Write in February (mid-term break)</td>
</tr></tbody></table>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Potential graduates for June would write during the replacement period in February (mid-term break).</p>

</div></div>
<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>If you missed your exam in <b>April</b></p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase table section">




<div class="concordia-table   verticalLines">
    <table width="100%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="1" border="1">
<tbody><tr><td width="33%">Course offered in <b>first </b>summer session<br>
</td>
<td width="33%">Course offered in <b>second </b>summer session</td>
<td>Course <b>not offered</b> in either summer session&nbsp;</td>
</tr><tr><td width="33%">Write with June finals</td>
<td width="33%">Write with August finals</td>
<td>Write in replacement period after August finals</td>
</tr></tbody></table>

</div></div>
<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>If you missed your exam in <b>June</b></p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase table section">




<div class="concordia-table   verticalLines">
    <table width="100%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="1" border="1">
<tbody><tr><td width="33%">For a&nbsp;<b>3-credit course</b></td>
<td width="33%">For a <b>3-credit course</b></td>
<td>For a <b>6-credit course</b>)</td>
</tr><tr><td width="33%">Course <b>offered </b>in September</td>
<td width="33%">Course <b>not offered</b> in September</td>
<td>Write in October replacement period</td>
</tr><tr><td>Write with December finals</td>
<td>Write in October replacement period</td>
<td>&nbsp;</td>
</tr></tbody></table>

</div></div>
<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>If you missed your exam in <b>August</b></p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase table section">




<div class="concordia-table   verticalLines">
    <table width="100%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="1" border="1">
<tbody><tr><td width="50%">Course offered September<br>
</td>
<td width="50%">Course not offered in September</td>
</tr><tr><td width="50%">Write with December finals</td>
<td width="50%">Write&nbsp;&nbsp;in October replacement period</td>
</tr></tbody></table>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Potential graduates for November would write during the replacement period in October.</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        <a name="encs"></a>
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Faculty of Engineering and Computer Science">
					
                    Faculty of Engineering and Computer Science
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_0" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Deferred exams are only written at the end of the session when the course is offered.</p>
<p>If you are a potential graduate and the course for your deferred exam is not offered in the term immediately prior to your graduation, a âspecial examâ? will be provided for you and scheduled during the regular final exam period.</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        <a name="jmsb"></a>
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open John Molson School of Business">
					
                    John Molson School of Business
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_1" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Deferred exams are only written at the end of the session when the course is offered.</p>
<p>If you are a potential graduate and the course for your deferred exam is not offered in the term immediately prior to your graduation, a âspecial examâ? will be provided for you and scheduled during the regular final exam period.</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        <a name="after-write-replacement"></a>
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open After you write the replacement exam">
					
                    After you write the replacement exam
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_0" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Your exam will be evaluated and a grade submitted to the Office of the Registrar. The new grade submitted for you will replace the MED notation on your record.</p>
<p>A replacement examination counts for the same weight in the course evaluation scheme and covers the same course material as the original examination.</p>
<p>If you fail a course after writing a replacement examination you may have one opportunity to write a supplemental examination during the next scheduled supplemental examination period. To have this privilege you must meet all the criteria for writing a supplemental exam and receive an original grade other than FNS.</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        <a name="dont-write-replacement"></a>
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open If you donât write the replacement exam">
					
                    If you donât write the replacement exam
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_1" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>It depends on the situation. If you choose not to write the replacement exam, your âMEDâ? notation will stay on your record and the course will not be calculated in your grade point average. You also forfeit the chance to write the missed exam. You must repeat the course if it is a requirement of your degree.</p>
<p>If you were prevented from writing the replacement exam <b>due to extraordinary circumstances</b>, you may apply to the University Examinations Committee. You would be required to provide documentary evidence in support of your request and submit a second âRequest for a âMEDâ? notationâ? application form along with the fee. Please <a adhocenable="false" href="/students/exams/accommodations/med-note.html">refer to the deadlines to apply for a MED notation</a>.</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">


<div class="parbase section reference"><div style="display:inline;" class="cq-dd-paragraph"><div class="parbase secondary_navigation secondary-navigation">

</div>

        $this.parent().children('ul').slideToggle('fast');
    });
});

    }
});
</script>
</div>


</footer>
    </div>

</body>
</html>
</IIR>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

<div class="page-header parbase section"> 






<div class="c-intro row">
    <h1 class="span8 section-header">Exams</h1>

    
    <div class="span8">
        <p>Examinations are an important part of university life. Review this section carefully and you'll successfully navigate your way through this academic rite of passage.</p>

    </div>
	<div class="span4">
                        <a class="btn btn-block btn-large bg-light-grey" href="/students/exams/important-dates.html">
                    
                    Dates you need to know
                    </a>
                        <a class="btn btn-block btn-large bg-light-grey" href="/offices/registrar.html">
                    
                    Contact us
                    </a></div>
</div></div>
<div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h4>Writing your exams</h4>
</div></div>
<div class="parsys_column row-fluid cq-colctrl-lt3"><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt3-c0 span4"><div class="parbase button section">

    <hr>
</div>

<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2 class="section-header ">Special cases</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>What to do if you need special accomodations to write your exams.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parsys_column row-fluid cq-colctrl-lt3"><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt3-c0 span4"><div class="parbase button section">

</div>
</div></div><div style="clear:both"></div><div class="section separator">




    <hr>
</div>
<div class="parsys_column row-fluid cq-colctrl-lt0"><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt0-c0 span6 paddingRight rightSeparator "><div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2 class="section-header ">Did you know...</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<div style="padding: 10px 0px; line-height: 36px; font-size: 36px; font-family: GillSansMTPro; font-weight: bold; color: rgb(137, 137, 137); text-align: left;">1,200 exams</div>
<div style="padding: 10px 0px; line-height: 30px; font-size: 30px; font-family: GillSansMTProLight; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); text-align: left;">scheduled for each fall and winter term</div>

</div></div>
</div><div class="parsys_column cq-colctrl-lt0-c1 span6"><div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2 class="section-header ">Where to find us</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="tiles section">





<div class="row-fluid">


    <div class="span6" style='margin-left:0px !important;'>
        <div class="parsys tiles_tiles_parsys_0">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><i>Permanent location</i>:</p>
<p><b>Examinations Office</b><br>
Concordia University<br>
<a href="/maps/sgw-campus.html?building=GM" adhocenable="false">GM-210.00</a><br>
<a href="https://maps.google.com/maps?q=1550+Boulevard+de+Maisonneuve+Ouest,+Montr%C3%A9al,+Communaut%C3%A9-Urbaine-de-Montr%C3%A9al,+Qu%C3%A9bec+H3G+2E9,+Canada&amp;hl=en&amp;ie=UTF8&amp;sll=45.497511,-73.578143&amp;sspn=0.005941,0.012295&amp;hnear=1550+Boulevard+de+Maisonneuve+Ouest,+Montr%C3%A9al,+Communaut%C3%A9-Urbaine-de-Montr%C3%A9al,+Qu%C3%A9bec+H3H+2M8,+Canada&amp;t=m&amp;z=16" adhocenable="false">1550 De Maisonneuve Blvd. West</a><br>
</p>

</div></div>


</div>

    </div>
    
    <div class="span6" >
        <div class="parsys tiles_tiles_parsys_1">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><i>Temporary location during final exam periods (April &amp; December)</i>:</p>
<p><b>Examinations Office</b><br>
Concordia University<br>
Room&nbsp;<a href="/maps/sgw-campus.html?building=H" adhocenable="false">H-439</a>&nbsp;or <a href="/maps/sgw-campus.html?building=MB" adhocenable="false">MB-S2.445</a>&nbsp;<br>
<a href="https://maps.google.com/maps?q=1550+Boulevard+de+Maisonneuve+Ouest,+Montr%C3%A9al,+Communaut%C3%A9-Urbaine-de-Montr%C3%A9al,+Qu%C3%A9bec+H3G+2E9,+Canada&amp;hl=en&amp;ie=UTF8&amp;sll=45.497511,-73.578143&amp;sspn=0.005941,0.012295&amp;hnear=1550+Boulevard+de+Maisonneuve+Ouest,+Montr%C3%A9al,+Communaut%C3%A9-Urbaine-de-Montr%C3%A9al,+Qu%C3%A9bec+H3H+2M8,+Canada&amp;t=m&amp;z=16" adhocenable="false">1455 De Maisonneuve Blvd. West</a></p>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

			ga.src = ('https:' == document.location.protocol ? 'https://ssl' : 'http://www') + '.google-analytics.com/ga.js';
			var s = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0]; s.parentNode.insertBefore(ga, s);
		})();
		
    </script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

        </script></div>


            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Supplemental examinations</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2>What you can do if you fail a course</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>If you failed a final exam and receive a failing grade in a course, you may be able to write a supplemental examination. This page explains when you may apply for a supplemental exam and how to do it.</p>
<p>Be sure to review all the university regulations concerning supplemental examinations in section 16.3.10 section II and III in the undergraduate calendar.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase button section">








<a style="margin-bottom:10px;" class="btn  " href="/academics/undergraduate/calendar/current/sec16/16.html#b16.3.10.html" target="_self">Read section 16.3.10</a>

</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        <a name="what-is-supplmental"></a>
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open What a supplemental examination means">
					
                    What a supplemental examination means
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>A supplemental examination gives students who have failed a course a second chance to re-write a final exam without re-registering for it.&nbsp;</p>
<p>A supplemental examination <b>does not replace your final exam</b> and <b>does not change your final grade</b> in the course. However, if you write a supplemental exam:</p>
<ul>
<li>The original grade for the course (F/FDNW) will remain <b>permanently</b> on your student transcript.</li>
<li>A <b>second entry</b> for the course appears on your transcript, with your supplemental exam grade counted towards your new grade.</li>
<li><b>Both grades</b> (the original F/FDNW <b>and</b> the passing grade) count towards your cumulative and final graduation GPA.<u></u></li>
<li>&nbsp;If you fail the supplemental exam, <b>both failure grades </b>will be counted in the calculation of the cumulative and final graduation GPA.<br>
&nbsp;</li>
</ul>
<h3>Consider repeating the course</h3>
<p>If you repeat the course and pass, both grades (the original F/FDNW and the passing grade) appear on your transcript â but <b>only the passing grade</b> will be counted towards your GPA.<u></u></p>
<p>Read more about repeating courses in section <a href="/academics/undergraduate/calendar/current/sec16/16.html#b16.3.13" adhocenable="false">16.3.13 of the Undergraduate Calendar</a>.</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Eligibility for supplemental exams">
					
                    Eligibility for supplemental exams
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_0" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>You may apply for a supplemental examination if you meet the following requirements:</p>
<ol>
<li>You must be in good academic standing with; your last annual grade point average must be at least 2.00.</li>
<li>You must have a grade of F or F/DNW in the course.</li>
<li>You have not yet written a supplemental exam for the same course.</li>
</ol>
<p>You may not apply for a supplemental examination if you:</p>
<ul>
<li>Are on Probation or Conditional Standing</li>
<li>Receive a grade of A, B, C, D, FNS, R, or NR in the course</li>
</ul>
<p>Each Faculty or School decides which courses will offer a supplemental exam, and not all faculties offer them. The John Molson School of Business and the Faculty of Engineering and Computer Science <b>do not</b> offer supplemental examinations. The only two exceptions to this rule are the following courses:</p>
<ul>
<li>COMP 201</li>
<li>COMP 218</li>
</ul>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        <a name="apply-supplemental"></a>
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open How to apply for a supplemental exam">
					
                    How to apply for a supplemental exam
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_1" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Download and print the [link to pdf] <i>Request for a supplemental examination</i> form.&nbsp; Return it to the <b>Birks Student Service Centre</b> (LB-185) by the deadline and pay the <b>$35 processing fee</b>.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase table section">




<div class="concordia-table  ">
    <table width="100%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="1" border="1">
<tbody><tr><th width="50">Term</th>
<th width="50">Deadline</th>
</tr><tr><td width="50">Fall/Winter</td>
<td width="120" valign="top"><p>June 15</p>
</td>
</tr><tr><td width="50">Summer</td>
<td width="120" valign="top"><p>September 16</p>
</td>
</tr><tr><td width="50">Fall&nbsp;(graduating students only)</td>
<td width="120" valign="top"><p>February 1</p>
</td>
</tr></tbody></table>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Be aware that you may only write <b>one supplemental examination</b> for a course, whether or not you repeat it.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase button section">








<a style="margin-bottom:10px;" class="btn  " href="/students/exams/accommodations/supplemental/writing.html" target="_self">Writing supplemental exams</a>

</div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">


<div class="parbase section reference"><div style="display:inline;" class="cq-dd-paragraph"><div class="parbase secondary_navigation secondary-navigation">







<div class="c-sidebar-menu c-secondary-navigation" id="secondary_navigation">

<ul style='display:block;'><li class='open'><a class='' href='/students/exams/accommodations.html'>Accommodations</a><div class='arrow '><i></i></div><ul style='display:block;'><li class=''><a class='' href='/students/exams/accommodations/def-note.html'>DEF notations</a><div class='arrow '><i></i></div><ul style='display:none;'><li class=''><a class='' href='/students/exams/accommodations/def-note/writing.html'>Writing a deferred exam</a></li></ul></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/students/exams/accommodations/med-note.html'>MED notations</a><div class='arrow '><i></i></div><ul style='display:none;'><li class=''><a class='' href='/students/exams/accommodations/med-note/writing.html'>Writing a replacement exam</a></li></ul></li><li class='open'><a class='active' href='/students/exams/accommodations/supplemental.html'>Supplemental examinations</a><div class='arrow open'><i></i></div><ul style='display:none;'><li class=''><a class='' href='/students/exams/accommodations/supplemental/writing.html'>Writing a supplemental exam</a></li></ul></li></ul></li></ul>
</div>
<script type="text/javascript">
jQuery(function() {
    $ = jQuery;
    $("#secondary_navigation.c-secondary-navigation .arrow").click(function(e) {
        e.preventDefault();
        var $this = $(this);
        $this.toggleClass('open');
        $this.parent().children('ul').slideToggle('fast');
    });
});
</script></div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="parbase section reference"><div style="display:inline;" class="cq-dd-paragraph"><div class="parbase box">

    <h2 class="section-header" style='color: # !important; '></h2>
    <div class="parsys">

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

                </li>

                    <a href="#" title="Twitter" class="st_twitter_custom">
                    	<span class="sprites-icon-social-2" displayText="Twitter" >Twitter</span>
                    </a>
                </li>
                <li>
                    <a href="#" title="LinkedIn" class="st_linkedin_custom">
                        <span class="sprites-icon-social-5" displayText="LinkedIn" >LinkedIn</span>
                    </a>
                </li>
            </ul>   
        </div>

        <script type="text/javascript">
            jQuery(function() {  
                $ = jQuery;
                socialbar.init();
                jQuery(window).scroll(function(){
                    socialbar.scroll();
                });
    
            });
        </script></div>


            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>External exams</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>An external exam is an examination that is written at a location outside the instution where you are a student.</p>
<p>In certain cases, students may write their Concordia exams at another location. Concordia can also proctor exams in Montreal for students from other accredited institutions.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="section tabs">










    <script type="text/javascript">
	$ = jQuery;
	$(document).ready(function() {
	    $('#tabs a:first').tab('show');
	    var hash = window.location.hash;
	    if (hash == undefined || hash == ""){
	      var previouslyActive = getCookie("concordia-component-tab-active-tab");
          if (previouslyActive != undefined) hash = previouslyActive;
	    }
	    hash && $('ul.nav a[href="' + hash + '"]').tab('show');

	    $('.nav-tabs a').click(function (e) {
	        $(this).tab('show');
	        var scrollmem = $('body').scrollTop();
	        window.location.hash = this.hash;
	        $('html,body').scrollTop(scrollmem);
	        setCookie("concordia-component-tab-active-tab", this.hash, 1);
	    });
	});
        /** COOKIE GETTER AND SETTER FUNCTIONS **/
    function setCookie(c_name,value,exdays){
        var exdate=new Date();
        exdate.setDate(exdate.getDate() + exdays);
        var c_value=escape(value) + ((exdays==null) ? "" : "; expires="+exdate.toUTCString());
        document.cookie=c_name + "=" + c_value;
    }
    function getCookie(c_name){
      var c_value=document.cookie;
      var c_start=c_value.indexOf(" " + c_name + "=");
      if (c_start == -1)	{
        c_start=c_value.indexOf(c_name + "=");
      }
      if (c_start == -1){
        c_value=null;
      } else {
        c_start=c_value.indexOf("=", c_start) + 1;
        var c_end=c_value.indexOf(";", c_start);
        if (c_end == -1){
          c_end=c_value.length;
        }
        c_value=unescape(c_value.substring(c_start,c_end));
      }
      return c_value;
    }
	</script>
	
	<div class="c-tabs">
    
	    <ul class="nav nav-tabs" id="tabs">
	        
		          <li><a href="#tab0" data-toggle="tab">Write a Concordia exam externally</a></li>
		        
	        
		          <li><a href="#tab1" data-toggle="tab">Write an external exam at Concordia</a></li>
		        
	        
	    </ul>
	    <div class="tab-content">
	        <div class="tab-pane" id="tab0">
	           
	           <div class="parsys parsys-tabs-0">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><br>
We expect all students to be available to write final exams and should avoid making travel plans until after the final examination schedule is available. However, you may request to write your exam at an external institution if you are faced with <b>unforeseeable events beyond your control</b> that make it impossible for you to be in Montreal for your exam.</p>
<p><b>If your course is offered by eConcordia, <a href="http://www.econcordia.com/" adhocenable="false">contact them directly</a></b></p>

</div></div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        <a name="request-external-exam"></a>
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open How to request an external exam">
					
                    How to request an external exam
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Download and print the â<a href="/content/dam/concordia/offices/registrar/docs/exams/form30.pdf" adhocenable="false">Request to Write a Concordia University exam at an External Institution form</a>. Fill it out and return it to the <a href="/offices/birks.html" adhocenable="false">Birks Student Service Centre</a> (LB185) by the deadline and pay the <b>$10 processing fee</b>.</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase table section">




<div class="concordia-table  ">
    <table width="100%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="1" border="1">
<tbody><tr><th width="50%" valign="top"><p>Final examination period</p>
</th>
<th width="50%" valign="top"><p>Deadline</p>
</th>
</tr><tr><td width="50%" valign="top"><p>December</p>
</td>
<td width="50%" valign="top"><p>November 15</p>
</td>
</tr><tr><td width="50%" valign="top"><p>April-May</p>
</td>
<td width="50%" valign="top"><p>April 1</p>
</td>
</tr><tr><td width="50%" valign="top"><p>June</p>
</td>
<td width="50%" valign="top"><p>June 1</p>
</td>
</tr><tr><td width="50%" valign="top"><p>August</p>
</td>
<td width="50%" valign="top"><p>August 1</p>
</td>
</tr></tbody></table>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><b>You must provide</b> all the following information on the request form:&nbsp;</p>
<ul>
<li>All the reasons and evidence why you must write the exam outside of Concordia</li>
<li>The name of the institution where you would like to write the exam</li>
<li>The name of a Registrarâs Office contact at that institution</li>
<li>The mailing address</li>
<li>The telephone number</li>
<li>The fax number</li>
<li>The e-mail of the contact person</li>
</ul>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Approval process">
					
                    Approval process
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_0" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>If you are permitted to write an exam at an external location it means we must send the exam to that institution. Before we can send out the exam, we must evaluate your request and consider the following:</p>
<ul>
<li>We review your reason for being outside Montreal.</li>
<li>We need to confirm that the <b>institution</b> you have selected is <b>accredited.</b></li>
<li>We need to confirm that the <b>contact name provided is an employee</b> of the chosen institution.</li>
<li><b>We must obtain the exam from your instructor.</b><ul>
<li>Occasionally instructors do not agree to provide us with an exam in advance to send to an external location. If you must write your exam outside of Montreal, we strongly encourage you to speak with your instructor while still in Montreal.</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li>We confirm that the institution will administer the exam <b>at the same date and time as it is scheduled at Concordia</b>, taking into account relevant time differences.<ul>
<li>If the external institution cannot administer your exam at the exact same time and date as Concordia, you must obtain written authorization from your instructor granting permission for the exam to be proctored at a different time and/or date.</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="accordion-panel section">





<div class="c-accordion toggable">
    <div class="item ">
        
        <div class="group panel">
            <h3 class="title">
                <a name="legend-expand" title="Open Invigilation costs">
					
                    Invigilation costs
                </a>
            </h3> 
            <div class="arrow"></div>
        </div>
        <div class="content row-fluid accordion_accordion_panel_1" style="display: none;">
            <div class="span12">
                <div class="parsys">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>If the external institution charges a fee for invigilation, you would be responsible for paying this cost.</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>
</div>


</div>

	        </div>
	        <div class="tab-pane" id="tab1">
	           
	           <div class="parsys parsys-tabs-1">


<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><br>
If you are enrolled at&nbsp;<b>another</b>&nbsp;<b>university or college</b> but need to write an examination in Montreal, we can help you.&nbsp;</p>
<p><b>Our fee for proctoring another institutionâs exam is $100 per exam.</b><br>
<br>
</p>

</div></div>
<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h5>How to write your exam at Concordia</h5>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<ol>
<li>Download and print the <a href="/content/dam/concordia/offices/registrar/docs/exams/form29-external-exam.pdf" adhocenable="false">Request to write an External Examination at Concordia</a> form. You can also find this form at the&nbsp;<a href="/students/birks.html" adhocenable="false">Birks Student Service Centre</a>&nbsp;(<a href="/maps/buildings/lb.html" adhocenable="false">LB-185</a>).</li>
<li>Fill it out and submit the form and <b>the $100.00 fee</b> to the <b>Birks Student Service Centre</b>.</li>
<li>We review your information provided and will notify you when we have:<ol>
<li>A date and time</li>
<li>Reserved a classroom</li>
<li>Hired an invigilator to proctor the exam for you.&nbsp;</li>
</ol>
</li>
<li>Contact your home university and make arrangements for them to <a href="#examaddress">send us your exam</a> by the appropriate date. <i>This is your responsibility.<br>
&nbsp;</i></li>
</ol>

</div></div>
<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h5>When we schedule exams</h5>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>If the date of your exam falls within <a adhocenable="false" href="/students/exams/schedule.html">Concordiaâs examination period</a>, you will write your exam in one of the following time blocks:</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase table section">




<div class="concordia-table   horizontalLines verticalLines">
    <table width="100%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="1" border="1">
<tbody><tr><th width="319" valign="top"><p><b>Monday to Friday</b></p>
</th>
<th width="319" valign="top"><p><b>Saturday and Sunday</b></p>
</th>
</tr><tr><td width="319" valign="top"><ul>
<li>9:00 am â12:00 pm</li>
<li>2:00 â 5:00 pm</li>
<li>7:00 â 10:00 pm</li>
</ul>
</td>
<td width="319" valign="top"><ul>
<li>9:00 am â 12:00 pm</li>
<li>2:00 â 5:00 pm</li>
</ul>
</td>
</tr></tbody></table>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>If the date of your exam falls <b>during any time of the academic year outside Concordiaâs examination period</b>, you will write your exam in one of the following time blocks:</p>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase table section">




<div class="concordia-table   horizontalLines verticalLines">
    <table width="50%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="1" border="1">
<tbody><tr><th width="30%" valign="top"><p><b>Monday to Friday*</b></p>
</th>
</tr><tr><td width="325" valign="top"><ul>
<li>9:00 am â12:00 pm</li>
<li>1:30 â 4:30 pm</li>
</ul>
</td>
</tr><tr><td width="325" valign="top"><p>*Mornings only on Fridays during the summer.</p>
</td>
</tr></tbody></table>

</div></div>
<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2 class="section-header ">Contact us</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p><a name="examaddress"></a></p>
<p>Ask your university to send your exam to the following address:</p>
<p>Examinations Office â GM 210<br>
Concordia University<br>
1455 De Maisonneuve Blvd. W.<br>
Montreal, Quebec, Canada<br>
H3G 1M8</p>
<p>Please e-mail us at <a href="mailto:examsoffice@concordia.ca">examsoffice@concordia.ca</a> for any questions.</p>

</div></div>


</div>

	        </div>
	    </div>
	</div>
	</div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">

    (function() {

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

                    	<span class="sprites-icon-social-1" displayText="Facebook" st_image='http://www.concordia.ca/content/concordia/en/offices/birks/attestation.img.png/1373376322683.png'>Facebook</span>
                    </a>
                </li>
                <li>
                    <a href="#" title="Twitter" class="st_twitter_custom">
                    	<span class="sprites-icon-social-2" displayText="Twitter" st_image='http://www.concordia.ca/content/concordia/en/offices/birks/attestation.img.png/1373376322683.png'>Twitter</span>
                    </a>
                </li>
                <li>
                    <a href="#" title="LinkedIn" class="st_linkedin_custom">
                        <span class="sprites-icon-social-5" displayText="LinkedIn" st_image='http://www.concordia.ca/content/concordia/en/offices/birks/attestation.img.png/1373376322683.png'>LinkedIn</span>
                    </a>
                </li>
            </ul>   
        </div>

        <script type="text/javascript">
            jQuery(function() {  
                $ = jQuery;
                socialbar.init();
                jQuery(window).scroll(function(){
                    socialbar.scroll();
                });
    
            });
        </script></div>


            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Official letters and forms</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2>Letters of Attestation &amp; authorized forms</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>Need a <a adhocenable="false" href="#letter-attestation">Letter of Attestation</a> or an <a adhocenable="false" href="#authorized-form">authorized form</a>? <b>Follow these three steps</b>:</p>
<ol>
<li>Download and print out the <a adhocenable="false" href="http://registrar.concordia.ca/forms/LetterRequestForm.pdf">Letter/Form Request (PDF)</a></li>
<li>Complete the relevant sections</li>
<li>Bring the printed form to Birks, along with any required documents<br>
&nbsp;</li>
</ol>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h3>Examples</h3>
<p><a name="letter-attestation"></a>Examples of attestation letters might include:</p>
<ul>
<li>Proof of full-time or part-time status</li>
<li>Certification of graduation</li>
<li>Immigration/Visa extension</li>
<li>Military Exemption</li>
<li>Social assistance requirements</li>
</ul>
<p><a name="authorized-form"></a>Examples of forms might include:</p>
<ul>
<li>Canadian Scholarship Trust (CST)</li>
<li>University Scholarship (USC)</li>
<li>Heritage Fund</li>
<li>Various insurance forms<br>
&nbsp;</li>
</ul>

</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<h3>Fee</h3>
<p><b>Each letter or form costs $15. </b>Because of the volume of requests we receive, please allow a minimum of <b>five (5) working days</b> to process your request.</p>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">


<div class="parbase secondary-navigation section">







<div class="c-sidebar-menu c-secondary-navigation" id="secondary_navigation">

<ul style='display:block;'><li class='open'><a class='' href='/offices/birks.html'>Birks</a><div class='arrow '><i></i></div><ul style='display:block;'><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/birks/student-id.html'>Student ID cards</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/birks/opus-transit-card.html'>Reduced-fare public transit cards</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/birks/transcripts.html'>Transcript requests</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/birks/financial-aid.html'>Financial aid & awards services</a></li><li class='open'><a class='active' href='/offices/birks/attestation.html'>Official letters and forms</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/birks/final-exams.html'>Final exam conflicts & special requests</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/birks/tuition-and-fees.html'>Tuition and fees</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/birks/certify-diploma.html'>Certification of diploma</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/birks/identity-documents.html'>Studying in QuÃ©bec</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/birks/welcome-centre.html'>Welcome Centre</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/birks/personalized-timetable.html'>Personalized class schedule</a></li></ul></li></ul>
</div>
<script type="text/javascript">
jQuery(function() {
    $ = jQuery;
    $("#secondary_navigation.c-secondary-navigation .arrow").click(function(e) {
        e.preventDefault();
        var $this = $(this);
        $this.toggleClass('open');
        $this.parent().children('ul').slideToggle('fast');
    });
});
</script></div>


</div>

            </div>

        </div>

    </div>
    
</section>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

            <div class="span8">
                <div class="title title-main">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h1>Tuition and fees</h1>
</div></div>

                <div class="parsys content-main">


<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2>You have many payment choices</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>You will likely find it faster and more efficient<b> to pay tuition and fees online. </b>You are always welcome to visit Birks to pay your tuition or get advice.</p>
<p>To pay tuition at Birks, bring your student ID and one of the following methods of payment:<br>
personal or certified cheque</p>
<ul>
<li>Personal or certified cheque</li>
<li>Money order</li>
<li>Bank draft</li>
<li>Debit card (Interac)<br>
&nbsp;</li>
</ul>

</div></div>
<div class="title section">





<div class="section-header-wrapper">
<h2 class="section-header ">Need a receipt or refund?</h2>
</div></div>
<div class="parbase wysiwyg section">



<div class="rte">
<p>You can request receipts and refunds online via your <a adhocenable="false" href="http://myconcordia.ca">MyConcordia portal</a>. Log into the portal if you want to obtain:</p>
<ul>
<li><b>Tuition receipt</b>: Choose Student Account Services, then Receipts Request</li>
<li><b>Income tax receipt</b> (for tuition): Choose Student Account Services, then Tuition (Tax) Receipt</li>
<li><b>Refunds:</b> Choose Student Account Services, then Cheque Refund Request</li>
</ul>

</div></div>


</div>

            </div>
            
            <div class="span4">
                <div class="parsys sidebar">


<div class="parbase secondary-navigation section">







<div class="c-sidebar-menu c-secondary-navigation" id="secondary_navigation">

<ul style='display:block;'><li class='open'><a class='' href='/offices/birks.html'>Birks</a><div class='arrow '><i></i></div><ul style='display:block;'><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/birks/student-id.html'>Student ID cards</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/birks/opus-transit-card.html'>Reduced-fare public transit cards</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/birks/transcripts.html'>Transcript requests</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/birks/financial-aid.html'>Financial aid & awards services</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/birks/attestation.html'>Official letters and forms</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/birks/final-exams.html'>Final exam conflicts & special requests</a></li><li class='open'><a class='active' href='/offices/birks/tuition-and-fees.html'>Tuition and fees</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/birks/certify-diploma.html'>Certification of diploma</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/birks/identity-documents.html'>Studying in QuÃ©bec</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/birks/welcome-centre.html'>Welcome Centre</a></li><li class=''><a class='' href='/offices/birks/personalized-timetable.html'>Personalized class schedule</a></li></ul></li></ul>
</div>
<script type="text/javascript">
jQuery(function() {
    $ = jQuery;
    $("#secondary_navigation.c-secondary-navigation .arrow").click(function(e) {
        e.preventDefault();
        var $this = $(this);
        $this.toggleClass('open');
        $this.parent().children('ul').slideToggle('fast');
    });
});
</script></div>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

   <div class="content" style="">
        <div class="left">
            <h4>Directions</h4>
            <p>Find directions using Google Maps</p>

<script type="text/javascript">
    var $dropdowns = $('.nav li.dropdown');
    $dropdowns
        .on('mouseover', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverTimeout')) {
                $this.prop('hoverTimeout', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverTimeout')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverIntent', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.addClass('open');
            }, 0));
        })
        .on('mouseleave', function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            $this.siblings('.open').removeClass('open');

            if ($this.prop('hoverIntent')) {
                $this.prop('hoverIntent', clearTimeout($this.prop('hoverIntent')));
            }

            $this.prop('hoverTimeout', setTimeout(function() {
                $this.removeClass('open');
            }, 300));
        });
</script>

            	<li class="dropdown active">
